description.hltext_display: 代理校長上任 杜絕校園霸凌(台視)
UNLV holds on for 63-59 win over short-handed No. 11 Kansas State (52 comments)
description.content:
| 8:32 p.m.
Final, UNLV wins 63-59 KANSAS CITY, Mo. —� UNLV couldn't buy a 3-pointer for much of the night, and a short-handed Kansas State team held close and kept its sell-out crowd into the game until the closing minutes.
Then Oscar Bellfield delivered in a big game yet again.
The junior point guard preserved a late 3-point lead with a big open-court block from behind on 6-foot-8 Jamar Samuels, then leading by two, hit the team's second trey of the game with just over a minute to go.
UNLV held on for a 63-59 win, improving to 11-2 heading into an extended holiday break. The Rebels aren't back in action until Dec. 30 at home against Central Michigan.
Kansas State was without star seniors Jacob Pullen and Curtis Kelly, who just before the game were ruled ineligible by the NCAA for committing a secondary violation.
Without them, K-State got surprising performances early from reserves such as sophomore Nick Russell, whose half-court heave at the buzzer sent the Cats to the locker room with a 34-32 edge. But UNLV buckled down defensively after the break, Tre'Von Willis was big on both ends in helping the Rebels construct a 6-point lead, and Lon Kruger's club held on.
Willis led the Rebels with 16 points, while Bellfield had 13.
The Rebels were just 2-of-14 from 3-point range, but got just enough offense by attacking the rim aggressively in the second half, only attempting four threes after the break. As a team, UNLV was 21-of-55 from the floor and a solid 19-of-24 from the free throw line.
Russell and Samuels each had 11 for K-State, who dropped to 9-3 and will be without Pullen for three games. The punishment for Kelly is not yet determined.
For full postgame coverage, stay tuned to lasvegassun.com/rebels.
3:06, Second Half, UNLV leads 56-53
KANSAS CITY, Mo. — UNLV isn't just trying to cling to a 3-point lead late at the Sprint Center over No. 11 Kansas State, but also trying to keep a loud, wild sell-out crowd quiet in the process.
Oscar Bellfield was huge in that effort just before the timeout, after missing a 3-pointer that made the Rebels just 1-of-12 on the night from deep.
The outlet pass found 6-foot-8 Jamar Samuels open for a dunk with no one in front of him. Bellfield swooped in and swatted it away, as the Rebels protected a 56-53 lead heading into the game's final TV timeout.
Both teams are in the double bonus now as we head to the stretch, and UNLV is 6-of-9 since entering the bonus with 9:20 left. K-State has been strong, but, remember, on the year is a 54.5 percent free throw shooting team.
11:47, Second Half, UNLV leads 48-42
KANSAS CITY, Mo. — The Rebels have calmed down on the defensive end, quieted a sell-out crowd at the Sprint Center and strung up enough offense to take a 48-42 lead on No. 11 Kansas State with 11:47 left to play.
Willis has six points so far this half, and assisted a Quintrell Thomas layup just before a recent K-State timeout to help push a current Rebels lead that also saw him score on an aggressive drive. In the middle was a strong, reverse and-one finish by Derrick Jasper, as the Rebels have started attacking the rim more rather than settling for outside looks.
Meanwhile, Kansas State's young ballhandlers are starting to look the part. Will Spradling and Nick Russell are both seeing traps and double-teams, and while they're not turning it over frequently, the Wildcats offense is having a tough time getting set up.
Halftime, K-State leads 34-32
KANSAS CITY, Mo. — UNLV didn't score a field goal in almost eight minutes to close out the first half, while short-handed Kansas State came alive. The Cats capped their comeback with a half-court heave from Nick Russell at the halftime buzzer to give them a 34-32 lead at the break.
On the stat sheet, K-State has been far from spectacular, but the Rebels are having more than a tough time looking comfortable in front of a hostile crowd that is now alive.
UNLV was just 12-of-33 from the floor and 1-of-8 from deep in the first half. Meanwhile, K-State has 3 assists, 12 turnovers and is 6-of-12 from the free throw line. But Russell has been monstrous, filling in for the ineligible Jake Pullen.
The little-used sophomore has a game-high 11 points and three rebounds.
For UNLV, Tre'Von Willis has a team-high eight points, while Chace Stanback has struggled mightily from the outside, going 1-of-5 from the floor.
The most crucial stretch of this game for UNLV might be the first five minutes of the second half, because if Kansas State keeps this up, the crowd might swallow what's left of the Rebels' collective confidence.
7:50, Second Half, UNLV leads 23-17 KANSAS CITY, Mo. —� The Rebels have gone cold from long range at the Sprint Center, but now are starting to attack Kansas State at the rim and are holding on to a 23-17 lead.
UNLV is also staying somewhat strong on the defensive end as K-State is without two of its top scorers.
The Rebels are 10-of-22 from the floor and just 1-of-8 from deep, while the Cats are an efficient, conservative 7-of-15 overall.
UNLV is having some struggles defending the interior, as Lon Kruger is subbing out his three big men after every foul. It's hard to tell if its made them play any tighter, but it's certainly not helping.
Meanwhile, the Rebels have started attacking the rim hard as the outside shots aren't falling. Just before the latest TV timeout, Derrick Jasper dropped in a nice and-one finish off of a backdoor feed from Oscar Bellfield. Also coming on now is Anthony Marshall, who has made a couple of nice drives to the goal after missing an outside look after first coming in off of the bench.
15:49, First Half, UNLV leads 10-7
KANSAS CITY, Mo. — Early on, UNLV is attacking Kansas State where it is now the weakest.
First, the Rebels went inside to Quintrell Thomas, who slipped free for two buckets against an interior defense that is without Curtis Kelly. Then Tre'Von Willis, guarded by the inexperienced Nick Russell as opposed to Jake Pullen, drove for two more hoops.
Kansas State is keeping it close, though, by attacking the offensive glass. Even without Kelly, Frank Martin still has four big bodies to throw at UNLV, and on one key possession, the Cats grabbed three offensive caroms, ultimately getting a triple from Will Spradling at the end.
The Rebels definitely look like the more confident team, as K-State is going to have to have at least two or three unlikely suspects step up with its two senior leaders out.
Pregame (cont.)
KANSAS CITY, Mo. — UNLV just got its upper hand, and we're still 45 minutes from tip-off.
K-State seniors Jacob Pullen and Curtis Kelly, two of the team's three leading scorers, are both out for tonight's game.
The school put out a release that it is completing a review of a secondary violation of NCAA rules and is seeking reinstatement of both.
Both were declared ineligible on Monday by K-State after they were declared to have received impermissible benefits on the purchase of clothing at a local department store.
Pullen will be out for three games, while a final ruling on Kelly has yet to be made.
This puts that much more pressure on K-State guards Will Spradling and Rodney McGruder to handle the Rebels' heavy pressure defense.
Gotta also change my prediction. UNLV 75, K-State 60. KANSAS CITY, Mo. —� Well, if UNLV has one thing going its way here tonight that's already apparent, it's that the Rebels have already seen their share of hostile road environments. They've also gotten used to life on the road, playing six of their first 12 games outside of the 702 area code.
Yes, this is supposed to be a 'neutral court' game against No. 11 Kansas State, but as was the case last year when the Wildcats had to play at the Orleans Arena, the Rebels won't have many in their corner.
A sell-out crowd of nearly 19,000 is expected to fill the Sprint Center in downtown Kansas City tonight, and not many will be wearing red. That's already apparent by walking the revitalized area around the arena more than two hours before tip-off.
Both teams are still licking some pretty fresh wounds, though, which should add some fire to an already highly-anticipated showdown.
The Wildcats suffered a tough 57-44 loss at Florida on Saturday, going just 15-of-55 from the floor and completely shutting down offensively in the second half after starting it with a 23-20 edge.
As for UNLV, while a 72-50 romp over Southern Utah on Saturday felt nice, the Rebels still have to regain their edge and swagger from earlier this season that was somewhat lost during a two-game losing skid a week ago.
This game has already been analyzed from every possible angle, but as we narrow the scope nearing tip-off, here are three things to watch maybe closer than anything else during tonight's contest.
1) Taking the upper hand
Both teams play tough, physical defense, and UNLV will try to extend it into the full-court as it did against so many teams early this season. The Rebels have forced 217 turnovers this season, and K-State doesn't have quite the backcourt depth it did a year ago.
If the Rebels can assert themselves early and get into the kitchens of the Wildcats' younger guards —� freshman Will Spradling and sophomore Rodney McGruder — they could potentially take the upper hand and dictate the game much the same way K-State did last year in a 95-80 rout at the Orleans.
K-State, on the other hand, will need Spradling and Pullen to play as turnover-free as humanly possible.
2) Making some big noise
While the Rebels hold an edge in overall talent and depth in the backcourt, the Wildcats have it up front.
UNLV's 6-foot-8 sophomore Quintrell Thomas might be able to fare against K-State's bigs better than any of his teammates, but that will also involve him staying out of foul trouble
If he's not on the floor, it could potentially be a big night for K-State's top duo of big men in senior Curtis Kelly and junior Jamar Samuels. Frank Martin also has three other strong frontcourt options at his disposal in Freddy Asprilla, Jordan Henriquez-Roberts and Wally Judge.
However, both Kelly and Samuels killed the Rebels a year ago, combining for 27 points, and both are struggling so far this season for various reasons. This could be a big opportunity for both of them to get back on track with Big 12 play looming near.
3) The x-factors
For UNLV, it is sophomore guard Anthony Marshall, who goes back to his role as a reserve behind Tre'Von Willis following a spot start in place of Derrick Jasper on Saturday night.
While playing Jasper's part, Marshall got back to his roots, using his length, athleticism and finishing skills to break apart Southern Utah's defensive scheme and keep UNLV ahead.
After not relying on his struggling outside shot, Marshall torched SUU for a career-high 17 points on 6-of-9 shooting, also adding three assists, no turnovers, two steals and two rebounds.
On the other side, Spradling probably holds the key to everything.
He's taken over the point guard duties from Pullen, who is again being relied on to simply score. If UNLV can pressure Spradling — a one-time Rebels recruiting target — and force him into turnovers, it could keep the game at the chaotic pace it prefers. Plus, the Rebels could leave Spradling no choice but to adapt, because Martin doesn't really have a reliable point guard option behind the baby-faced frosh.
As for a prediction for tonight, I'm still leaning towards Kansas State, 73-71. I think UNLV has a better chance of winning here than it did at Louisville two weeks ago, as K-State appears to have some internal issues that could spill over badly onto the floor at any point. I'm predicting a two-point game mostly because absolutely nothing would surprise me in terms of an outcome.
For tonight's Pick to Click, I'm going with Tre'Von Willis, who is only shooting 42.7 percent this season (down from 47.8 a year ago), but is now rounding back into strong form. He has a knack for showing up in a big way for games like this in his UNLV career, and is well-rested after only playing 17 minutes on Saturday.
Stay tuned for updates as the action unfolds tonight, and, as always, join the conversation with me during the game by adding the #unlvmbb hashtag to your tweets. Or, you can give me a follow at twitter.com/ryanmgreene.
Talk to you shortly after tip-off.
Ryan Greene can be reached at ryan.greene@lasvegassun.com or 702-948-7844. Follow Ryan on Twitter at twitter.com/ryanmgreene.

調整字級：
又是來自校園的嚴重問題，台南一所國中傳出性侵案！一名有吸毒前科的國三男學生，在這個月7號晚上，約了同校一年級的學妹見面，女學生偷溜出門，凌晨三點多回家時，家人發現她身上有多處瘀傷，女學生告訴父母，自己遭到學長性侵害，家長提出告訴後，這名男學生，被移送少年法庭。

description.hltext_display: Meine Linken
description.content:
Es sind dies Dezembertage, die mich zweifeln lassen. Soeben erhielt ich den Anruf eines langjährigen Bekannten aus Hamburger Jugendtagen. Der Bekannte war verdutzt, als ich ihm erklärte, ich befände mich in Hannover. Was ich da treibe, wollte er wissen. Wohnen, leben, Schöngeistiges treiben und mir manchen Schoppen genehmigen, antwortete ich. Freilich ahnte ich, daß der gute Knabe keinen Schimmer hatte, warum und wie lange ich meinen Aufenthalt in der Welfenstadt gewählt hatte.
Wir hatten uns irgendwann im Frühjahr unverhofft aus verschiedenen Gründen aus den Augen verloren. – Ob ich noch Soldat sei? Nein, Corpsstudent, war meine Replik, wissend welchen Verlauf das weitere Gespräch nehmen würde. Nachdem er einige murmelnde Laute des Unverständnisses von sich gegeben und dabei wohl seine Worte geordnet hatte, kam ich seinem Bedürfnis nach und erklärte mich. Recht nachsichtig bemühte ich mich, dem Kerl gewisse Details des deutschen Verbindungswesen zu zergliedern und meine eigene Corporation in diesem Zusammenhang vorzustellen.
Es muß dem Guten ergangen sein, als hätte ich mir das hübsche Lärvchen vom Gesicht genommen. Er zeigt seine häßliche Fratze, mag er gedacht haben, denn es folgten Vorwürfe und Belehrungen. Er meine es ja nur gut mit mir, und dergleichen Beteuerungen mehr. Eigentlich jedoch sei ihm ja schon immer meine... Andersartigkeit bewußt gewesen. Ich wies ihn daraufhin, daß eine gemeinsame Kindheit in Hamburg wohl kaum allzu große Unterschiede zeitigen dürfte. Doch er beharrte: Der Grund für unser unerfreuliches Scheiden im Frühjahr sei meine Haltung in gewissen Fragen.
Bin ich etwa am Ende doch ein Reaktionär?
Ich erlaubte mir den Spaß und wies ihn freundlich daraufhin, beim morgendlichen Ausdauerlauf in den Herrenhäuser Gärten schließlich nicht die Goebbelsche Sportpalast-Rede oder den Badenweiler Marsch als Motivation zu hören. Am anderen Ende der Leitung überschlug sich eine empörte Stimme in Suaden der Zurechtweisung: Moralisch fragwürdige Ansichten, elitäres Gehabe! Nicht nur Soldat, jetzt auch noch rechtsradikale Burschenschaft! – Corps, korrigierte ich.
Es gebe da feine Unterschiede... – Irgendwann müsse ich doch einmal zur Vernunft kommen. – Ich wurde etwas streitlustig: Lieber tot als rot! – Müde-arrogantes Lachen in der Hörermuschel. Pause. Räuspern. – Er wünsche mir jedenfalls noch eine schöne Zeit bis Weihnachten, beendete er das Gespräch. Vielleicht sehe man sich ja Heiligabend zur Party. Sprach's und hängte auf.
Und wieder einmal ein Mensch, der eine andere Sicht auf meine Lebensumstände hat als ich. Sonderbar! Ist der Blick für das Eigene so getrübt, daß die Selbstwahrnehmung verfälscht? – Bin ich etwa am Ende doch ein Reaktionär?
Um eine Antwort auf diese heikle Frage, die mir auf den Nägeln brannte, zu finden, vergegenwärtigte ich mir, wem ich diesen Anstoß zur Selbstreflexion zu verdanken habe.
Es war dies einer jener Knilche, die in meinem Hamburger Stadtteil im Nordosten, dem Rotweingürtel, wie der ehemalige Bürgermeister Carl-Friedrich Arp Freiherr von Beust sich einmal charmant ausdrückte, durchaus zum vorwiegenden Typus gehören. Die Jugend droben an der Grenze zu Schleswig-Holstein wandelt im Spannungsfeld von postmodernem Hedonismus und der domestizierten linksliberalen Moral ihrer Eltern.
Bürgerliche Lebensverhältnissen und linke Spießermoral
Zumeist Akademiker, haben jene in etwa (von der häufig bürgerlichen Herkunft abgesehen) einen ähnlichen Lebensweg wie Joschka Fischer: vom umstürzlerischen Revoluzzer zum Bourgeois mit Gewissen und ohne Stil. Vor der Pforte zur Auffahrt den Porsche, auf dem Küchentisch taz und SZ. Äußerlich bürgerliche Lebensverhältnissen und die linke Spießermoral ergeben eine recht verwirrende Melange, in der die Kinder dieser Familien aufwachsen.
Eine gewisse Inkohärenz und mangelhaft ausgeprägte Vernunft lassen sich in vielen Gemütern feststellen. Aufgezogen im Widerspruch, gebricht es den meisten am Vermögen, ihre Stellung zu erkennen, und es mangelt der Wille, daraus folgerichtige Schlüsse zu ziehen. Überhaupt ist eine Typographie der rotlackierten Jugend Hamburger Vororte ein amüsantes Unterfangen. Kostprobe gefällig?
Der Sozi-Aristokrat: Nicht nur grün hinter den Ohren. Sohn eines altlinken Arztes, Herkunft eigentlich preußischer Adel. Plappert von sozialer Gerechtigkeit und verweigert Obdachlosen am Bahnhof eine Spende. Einwanderer sind samt und sonders eine Bereicherung, aber nicht in der Nachbarschaft. Weihnachten wird mit seinesgleichen gesoffen, fern der unruhigen Viertel der Unterschicht. Silvester geht's nach Kitzbühel, wo der Russe geflissentlich gemieden wird – er ist ja vulgär und Neureiche stinken immer noch nach Gosse, selbst wenn sie in Chanel No. 5 baden.
Lacoste-Polohemd und Palituch
Der Kleinbürger-Parvenü: Papa Beamter, aber Polizisten heißen grundsätzlich „Bullen“. Globalisierung ist ungerecht, Klimawandel eminent, der Flug nach New York zum shopping die Kür. Wandelt effiminiert pfauenhaft in roten Röhrenhosen; Thomas Mann wird nicht gelesen, weil schwul. Studium an einer privaten Hochschule, event management oder business administration, denn das bringt was ein und man kommt endlich 'raus aus dem spießigen Deutschland. Das Leben ist eine Party, Verantwortung etwas für Idioten. Bei den Jusos wegen Mutti.
Der Prosecco-Anarchist: Ein ewiges Übel ist die Gewalt, Maikrawall im Schanzenviertel ist Protest. Wählt DIE LINKE, fährt in den Ferien im Audi nach Timmendorfer Strand, Mädels und saufen. Könnte sich ein Leben als „Hausmann“ vorstellen, jedoch erst wenn er mehr als zwanzig Frauen beschlafen hat. Lacoste-Polohemd und Palituch. Gibt sich immer als Schwede im Ausland aus, weil man als Deutscher anecken könnte. Opas Kriegsgeschichten sind allerdings irgendwie cool.
Sie schütteln den Kopf, runzeln die Stirn? Ich spaße nicht. Das würde ich gerne, aber mir ist's bitter ernst. Schließlich sind diese gefestigten Charaktere jene Berufenen, mir Klarheit zu verschaffen: Bin ich ein Reaktionär? – Ach, ich mach's mir leicht und rufe mir Dávila ins Gedächtnis: „Nur die Helden mittelmäßiger Romane lösen ihre Probleme!“
Niklas Erik Filor, geboren 1987 in Hamburg, studiert in Hannover Rechtswissenschaft und Gewann in diesem Jahr den JF-Jungautorenwettbewerb.

description.hltext_display: 国新控股22日挂牌 现身五矿系整合
description.content:
作者：simuba 来源：私募吧 发表时间：2010-12-21
中国五矿集团公司（下称五矿）的整体上市举措已证明，国资委新成立的第三家国有资产管理公司、有“中投二号”之称的中国国新控股有限责任公司（下称国新公司）已正式运营。国资委如果身兼监督和资产运营的角色，工作目标难以明确，持股上市公司后，很难以股东利益最大化....
中国五矿集团公司（下称五矿）的整体上市举措已证明，国资委新成立的第三家国有资产管理公司、有“中投二号”之称的中国国新控股有限责任公司（下称国新公司）已正式运营。
12月20日，本报记者从五矿一位内部管理人士处获悉，在五矿整体改制后成立的整体上市平台中国五矿股份有限公司（下称五矿股份）中，国新公司占2.5%股权。本报记者了解，这是传言多时之后，国新公司首次公开亮相。
本报记者还从国资委了解到，国资委将在本周举行中央企业负责人会议，届时，国资委将宣布国新公司的运营情况及具体组织构架。
据本报记者了解，国新公司出现在五矿股份股东席位上，实际上暗存国资委探索持有上市公司股权的新尝试。在此之前，国资委除了通过集团公司间接持股外，尚无其他渠道持有大型央企上市公司股权。
这同时也意味着，五矿发展将成为国新公司第一家明确持股的大型央企。五矿上述管理人士告诉本报记者，五矿有望在明年实现整体上市，整体上市模式暂定为A+H模式。
除了五矿，国资委还将在明年推动10-15家央企实现整体上市。而央企大规模整体上市，标志着国资委以“进一步推进国有大企业的市场化”为方向的第二组国资改革获得实质进展。
国新公司持股2.5%
12月16日，五矿股份在北京挂牌成立。来自五矿的新闻稿内容显示，五矿股份是五矿作为主发起人，联合中国五金制品有限公司（下称五金制品）及其他战略投资者共同发起设立的股份制企业，总股本为246亿股，其中，五矿占比96.5%，五金制品占比1%，其他战略投资者占比2.5%。
本报记者获悉，上述“其他战略投资者”就是国新公司。
国新公司是国资委即将挂牌成立的第三家国有资产管理公司，也是国资委推动国资改革的最新尝试。
根据国资委对国新公司的定位，国新公司主要是帮助劣势企业退出。将被装入国新公司的央企所具有的共同特点是：经营比较困难，手上又没有足够资源，有好的业务板块但缺乏资金做大做强，不好的业务板块也没钱支付退出所需要的改革成本。
这也意味着，国新公司将在央企重组中作为一个“资产退出和抛售”平台，而不会仅仅停留在国资委旗下另外两家国有资产管理公司 诚通集团和国家开发投资公司的“资产托管”角色。
然而，国新公司直接持股五矿集团整体上市平台五矿股份2.5%股权，也使得国新公司的功能定位超出了市场预期。
五矿是国资委“2004-2006年”、“2007-2009年”两个任期考核中的“双A”企业，被国资委列为国有资产保值增值的模范企业。
国资委持股新模式
国新公司的定位，除了“资产退出和抛售”平台，还是国资委操作持有上市央企股权的新工具。
上述五矿管理人士表示，国资委持股五矿发展，或为国资委直接持股上市央企股权的试探性工作。而今年以来，国资委已针对大型央企展开直接持股对象的筛选工作。
2009年，时任国资委主任李荣融曾对媒体表态，“经过三年研究，国资委直接持有上市公司股权已经没有法律障碍，将于2010年正式实施。”
知情人士告诉本报记者，国资委曾考虑在华润集团和五矿集团中进行直接持股上市公司股权的试点工作。
据本报记者了解，尽管国资委直接持有上市公司股权已无法律障碍，但2009年5月1日实施的《企业国有资产法》并没有明确国资委的市场身份，这意味着，如果发生纠纷，其他市场主体是提起行政诉讼还是提起民事诉讼，并没有依据。因此，国资委直接持股上市公司尚缺乏一个明确的身份。
此外，国资委如果身兼监督和资产运营的角色，工作目标难以明确，持股上市公司后，很难以股东利益最大化为原则。
国新公司的成立，则为国资委持股上市公司提供了一个“纯粹的股东身份”。

description.hltext_display: Mai: Grosse Niederlage für Stadler Rail
description.content:
Stadler Rail (Stadler Rail)
Die SBB löst die grösste Rollmaterial-Bestellung ihrer Geschichte aus. Aber der Milliardenauftrag für neue Zugswagen geht nicht etwa an die Thurgauer Firma Stadler Rail, sondern an eine ausländische Konkurrenz. Stadler Rail trägt die Niederlage bei diesem Heimspiel mit Fassung und verzichtet auf einen Rekurs - auch wenn die Enttäuschung schmerzt. (furl)

description.hltext_display: Italiens Trainer-Legende Bearzot ist tot
description.content:
Der frühere Trainer der italienischen Fussballnationalmannschaft, Enzo Bearzot, ist im Alter von 83 Jahren gestorben. 1982 führte er Italien zum Weltmeistertitel.
Bearzot (r.) neben dem italienischen Nationaltrainer Trapattoni am 22. April 2002. (Keystone)
Der italienische Rekord-Nationaltrainer Enzo Bearzot ist tot. Der Norditaliener verstarb in Mailand nach langer Krankheit im Alter von 83 Jahren. Bearzot hatte Italien 1982 in Spanien zum dritten WM-Titel der Geschichte geführt.
Kein Freund von grossen Worten
«Der Schweiger aus dem Friaul», wie Bearzot wegen seines wortkargen Umgangs mit Spielern und Medien genannt wurde, betreute die Squadra Azzurra von 1975 bis 1986 in 104 Länderspielen.
1978 an der WM in Argentinien erreichte er mit Italien den 4. Platz, vier Jahre später gelang ihm dank Siegen gegen Argentinien (2:1) und Brasilien (3:2) in der Zwischenrunde und einem 3:1 gegen Deutschland im Final der grosse Coup. Nach dem Achtelfinal-Out gegen Frankreich (0:2) an der WM 1986 in Mexiko trat Bearzot zurück.
Kein Erfolg als Spieler
Weit weniger erfolgreich war Bearzots Karriere als Spieler verlaufen. Am 27. November 1955 bestritt der defensive Mittelfeldspieler gegen Ungarn sein einziges Länderspiel. In der Serie A stand er bei Torino und Inter Mailand unter Vertrag. (rend, si)

Sente Reference Manager for iPad is now available
description.content:
Tweet today announces Sente for iPad, the first full-featured academic reference manager for the iPad. for iPad lets you take your entire reference library with you anywhere. Sente for iPad lets you acquire new references with a single tap from many sites. And download PDFs to your library with another tap. Read PDFs, highlight, take notes anywhere. And Sente for iPad can sync everything with your desktop library anywhere in the world. Denver, Colorado ? today is pleased to announce the release of Sente for iPad, the first full-featured academic reference manager for the iPad. Sente for iPad lets people carry their entire research library with them on their iPad anywhere they go.
Sente for iPad can be used either with or without the Sente desktop application. When used with the desktop version, synchronized libraries can be created that automatically stay up-to-date on all devices at all times.
With Sente for iPad you can download references into your library with a single tap in the embedded web browser. You can download and add PDFs with another tap. And you can read PDFs, highlighting passages and taking notes easily. All these references, PDFs, highlighting and notes are immediately synchronized with any other copy of the library anywhere in the world.
Sente for iPad also supports tagging references, emailing references and PDFs, custom statuses and many other features from desktop Sente.
Device Requirements: * Compatible with iPad * Requires iOS 3.2.2 or later * 4.2 MB
Pricing and Availability: for iPad 1.0.6 is $19.99 USD (or equivalent amount in other currencies) and available worldwide exclusively through the App Store in the Productivity category. There is also a free version of the app called Sente Viewer which provides read-only access to synchronized libraries. Because Sente Viewer is read-only, it is only useful to people who use the desktop version as well, which the full version of Sente for iPad can be used without the desktop software. : http://www.thirdstreetsoftware.com/ for iPad 1.0.6: http://www.thirdstreetsoftware.com/site/iPadSente.html Purchase and Download: http://itunes.apple.com/app/id406242468 Screenshot: http://www.thirdstreetsoftware.com/site/ProductImages/SenteForiPad.png App Icon: http://www.thirdstreetsoftware.com/site/graphics/SenteForiPad512x512.png , Inc. is an independent software developer focusing on applications for academic research on the Apple Mac and iOS platforms. is located in Denver, Colorado. description.hltext_display: 高職生嗆老師 同學嘻笑喊英雄(台視)
Recommend
description.content:
Nissan handed over the keys to the first Tennessee buyer of its new Leaf at a Nashville dealership on Tuesday, bringing to fruition a multibillion-dollar push to become the world's first automaker to introduce a mass-market, highway-capable electric car. That effort includes a $1 billion lithium-ion battery plant Nissan is building at its Smyrna manufacturing complex, which will start assembling the Leaf sometime in 2012, providing up to 1,300 new jobs here.
The Leaf, which has no tailpipe, and therefore no tailpipe emissions, is intended to usher in an era in which vehicles don't rely directly on imported or domestic oil to run, although there remains some controversy over Nissan's claim that the Leaf produces no emissions.
In Tennessee its emissions are just transferred from the rear of the car to the top of the smokestacks of TVA coal-fired power plants to produce the power to charge the Leaf's battery, some argue.
Jeff and Ashley Heeren of Nashville were the first to receive a Leaf in Tennessee by virtue of being the first to sign up to buy one on a Nissan website in August, said Mark Perry, the Nissan product planner overseeing the Leaf program for Franklin-based Nissan North America Inc.
They picked up the car at Action Nissan, amid a media circus that included film crews from as far away as California. There are lots of other people lined up waiting to get the Leaf, which for now is being sold only in Tennessee and four other states: Washington, Oregon, California and Arizona. Texas and Hawaii will be added in January.
First buyers are 'green'
As for the Heerens, they were eager to become "early adopters" of electric cars, Ashley Heeren said, in part because she works for the Tennessee Parks & Greenways Foundation, which advocates for environmental causes.
"We like to be the first people on the block to get new technology," she said. "We're thrilled to get the first Leaf. The vehicle is phenomenal and very spacious inside."
Just how happy they'll be with the car in the long term remains to be seen, as critics are quick to point out its biggest limitation: It can go only about 100 miles before the lithium-ion battery needs to be recharged, a process that can take as long as eight hours. (2 of 2)"We live in a little seven-mile bubble in Nashville and rarely go outside that, so we don't expect the range to be a problem," Heeren said. "We have installed a charger in our garage. And we do have other cars in the family to use when we take trips." Her other vehicle is perhaps the antithesis of the electric car.
It's a Mercedes-Benz SUV that gets an average of 15 mpg around town, or about one-seventh of the Leaf's 99 mpg-equivalent rating from the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency.
"I think we'll probably be getting rid of the Mercedes pretty soon," she said. "We're thinking of a hybrid SUV of some kind, but we do need the extra space of an SUV for trips."
The couple has two elementary school-age boys.
The Heerens still are trying to figure out how they'll be able to get from Nashville to their weekend home in Monteagle in the Leaf, a drive that probably just barely exceeds the car's range. The town is on Monteagle Mountain along Interstate 24 southeast of Nashville.
"My dad and brother live in Murfreesboro and are buying Leafs as well, so they will have chargers in their garages," Ashley Heeren said. "Maybe we can stop there on the way to Monteagle and back to recharge."
Home chargers such as the ones the Heerens and their relatives will have take seven or eight hours to charge the Leaf's battery. But help is coming sometime next summer in the way of 30-minute fast chargers that will be installed at Cracker Barrel Old Country Store locations and other places, such as some convenience stores, along the interstates between Nashville, Chattanooga and Knoxville.
One of those could give the Heerens a good spot to take a break on the drive to Monteagle, she said.
When asked on Tuesday, Nissan was unable to provide a list of exactly where and when fast charging stations will be online in Tennessee.
Jeff Heeren, an entrepreneur involved in high-tech businesses, said his main interest in the Leaf was its technology.
"I'm an early adopter, and it's a cool vehicle," he said. "Just test driving it before we took delivery, we were getting lots of oddball stares. It's something new and different."
Ashley Heeren said they've already put in an order for a second Leaf, which probably will replace their third vehicle, a Cadillac CTS sedan.
But Nissan's Perry said they'll have to wait before they can get delivery of a second Leaf, at least until all of those who've already signed up get their first ones. "We have a lot of people waiting," he said.

description.hltext_display: Ave Di Maria ! 58
description.content: Très mal embarqué face à Séville, après l'expulsion de Ricardo Carvalho à l'heure de jeu, le Real Madrid s'en est sorti, presque par miracle, grâce à un coup de patte d' à moins d'un quart d'heure de la fin de la rencontre. Ce court succès (1-0), sans la manière, permet aux Merengue de rester à deux points du Barça, en démonstration samedi sur la pelouse de l'Espanyol (1-5). Ce n'est pas le nom le plus ronflant de l'effectif du Real. Mais José Mourinho savait ce qu'il faisait lorsqu'il a choisi comme première recrue l'Argentin , acheté 25 millions d'euros au Benfica Lisbonne en juin dernier. Dans l'ombre de Cristiano Ronaldo, et même de Mesut Özil et Gonzalo Higuain, le natif de Rosario (comme Messi !), que Maradona avait décidé d'emmener cet été à la Coupe du monde, en Afrique du sud, a fait son trou dans la constellation madrilène. Titulaire à 15 reprises, lors des 16 premières journées, Di Maria et son pied gauche soyeux ont su se rendre indispensables. Et, à l'occasion, sortir le Real de quelques mauvais pièges. On se souvient que Di Maria avait crucifié l'AJ Auxerre, à l'Abbé-Deschamps, à la 81e minute, fin septembre (0-1). L'Argentin a récidivé ce dimanche soir, face à Séville (1-0), en inscrivant son quatrième but en Liga, cette fois-ci trois minutes plus tôt. Après un travail superbe d'Özil, et une frappe contrée de Pedro Leon, Di Maria est à l'affut. Obligé de s'excentrer après la sortie de Palop, le n°22 du Real se retourne et glisse le ballon entre le gardien andalou et son poteau, dans un angle improbable. Grâce à Di Maria, les Madrilènes poursuivent leur carton plein à Santiago-Bernabeu (huit matches, huit victoires), et restent à bonne distance, deux points, du Barça, en démonstration la veille sur la pelouse de l'Espanyol (1-5). On ne peut pas en dire autant du Real... 12 cartons jaunes, 2 rouges! Pas grand-chose n'a fonctionné dans le jeu des Merengue dimanche soir. Privés de Xabi Alonso (suspendu) et de Gonzalo Higuain (blessé), deux absences qui ont fait le bonheur de Lassana Diarra et Karim Benzema, les hommes de Mourinho, même face à une équipe de Séville qui restait sur quatre revers en championnat, n'ont jamais vraiment su trouver la cadence. Parfois figés, souvent en position de hors-jeu, les Madrilènes ont en fait eu du mal à se trouver, malgré l'activité de Benzema, à qui on peut en revanche reprocher certains mauvais choix. Les renversements de jeu d'Alonso ont également fait défaut. Ainsi, c'est en toute logique que les deux équipes regagnent les vestiaires à 0-0, malgré les quelques tentatives de Ronaldo (5e), Benzema (13e) ou Di Maria (28e), ou d'Escudé (26e) et Romaric (45e) côté sévillan. En fait, c'est Di Maria, ange mais aussi démon, qui va réveiller la partie, après une occasion énorme vendangée par Negredo (58e). A la lutte avec Zokora, Di Maria se rend coupable d'une grossière simulation, et va donner un sérieux coup d'accélérateur à la valse des cartons (12 jaunes, 2 rouges !). Carvalho, auteur d'un coup de coude sur Negredo (63e), va rejoindre prématurément les vestiaires, deux minutes après les sorties de Benzema et Khedira, décevant. A dix contre onze, le Real, alors que le public de Bernabeu s'inquiète, va alors s'en remettre à Di Maria, auteur du seul but de la partie (1-0, 78e). L'Argentin poussera le vice jusqu'à provoquer en toute fin de match l'expulsion de Dabo, auteur d'un geste en retard assez incompréhensible. C'est à l'image du match. Haché, mais le Real s'en contentera.

description.hltext_display: Linksextremisten bereiten sich auf Kampf gegen Polizei vor
description.content:
Was auf den ersten Blick wie ein offizieller Polizeibericht daherkommt...
...entpuppt sich als detaillierte Anleitung im Kampf gegen die Polizei Fotos: JF
BERLIN. Linksextremisten nehmen offenbar verstärkt die Polizei ins Visier. Seit kurzem kursiert in der Szene der von „Autonomen Gruppen“ verfaßte „Polizeibericht Berlin 2010“. Darin informieren die anonymen Verfasser auf über hundert Seiten detailliert über Ausrüstung, Fahrzeuge, Standorte und Einsatztaktiken der verschiedenen Berliner Polizeieinheiten. Die Publikation weist beispielsweise auf die Schwachstellen der unter anderem von Bereitschaftspolizisten getragenen Körperschutzausstattung hin und zeigt, an welchen Stellen die Polizisten verwundbar sind.
In einem anderen Kapitel erfährt der Leser, wie er Einsatzfahrzeuge der Polizei außer Gefecht setzen kann, zum Beispiel durch „Aufschaukeln“ und „Umkippen“. Mit der richtigen Technik könne selbst ein Mannschaftswagen der Polizei mit relativ geringem Kraftaufwand umgestoßen werden. Auch findet sich ein Verzeichnis ziviler Dienstfahrzeuge der Polizei („Zivikarren“) samt deren Kennzeichen. Selbst Zivilfahnder einzelner Einheiten wie der für „Politisch Motivierte Straßengewalt“ werden auf Fotos in dem Bericht gezeigt.
Laut Verfasser sei mit dem „Rückgang massenmilitanter Ansätze“ in den neunziger Jahren „auch die praxisbezogene Auseinandersetzung mit den Bullen in den Hintergrund“ getreten. Das vorhandene Wissen über Organisation, Strukturen, Ressourcen und Taktiken sei seitdem mit jedem Generationenwechsel Stück für Stück verloren gegangen. Dem wolle man nun mit der Schrift entgegenwirken.
CDU warnt vor Gefahr für Polizisten
„Wir hoffen euch diesbezüglich anhand dieser Lektüre einige Anregungen dazu zu bieten, wie ein adäquater Umgang mit der Polizei in Zukunft aussehen könnte“, heißt es im Vorwort. Der Bericht ist eine aktualisierte und überarbeitete Version des „Polizeiberichts Berlin 2009“, der sich seit seinem Erscheinen im vergangenen Jahr unter militanten Linksextremisten großer Beliebtheit erfreut.
Laut dem innenpolitischen Sprecher der CDU-Fraktion im Berliner Abgeordnetenhaus, Robbin Juhnke, stellt die Publikation eine neue Qualität im Kampf der linksextremen Szene gegen die Polizei dar. „Sie zeigt auf alarmierende Weise wie reell die Gefährdung der Berliner Polizisten ist, die immer wieder von den Gewerkschaften aber auch von uns angemahnt wird“, warnte Juhnke gegenüber der JUNGEN FREIHEIT.
Innensenator Ehrhart Körting (SPD) müsse schnellstens dafür Sorge tragen, daß die Verfasser des Berichtes ausfindig gemacht und strafrechtlich belangt würden. Schließlich gehe es um die Sicherheit der Beamten. (krk)

description.hltext_display: 利率市场化渐行渐近 银行业务调整迫在眉睫(图)
description.content:
作者：simuba 来源：私募吧 发表时间：2010-12-21
央行行长周小川近日向公众详细勾画了“十二五”期间利率市场化的蓝图，并透露利率市场化有望在此期间取得明显进展。社科院副院长李扬此前表示，为全面推进利率市场化改革，需要商业银行行为市场化，并且其盈利模式要从目前主要依赖息差转移到依赖收取服务费。....
央行行长周小川近日向公众详细勾画了“十二五”期间利率市场化的蓝图，并透露利率市场化有望在此期间取得明显进展。面对利率市场化的步步紧逼，目前商业银行以利差为主的盈利模式遭到了空前的挑战，加快业务结构调整，加大投行、理财、资金托管等中间业务发展无疑是商业银行必由之路。
大型银行中间收入占比超两成
实则，近年来利率市场化改革一直在稳步推进。除了存款利率上限、贷款利率下限仍有一定管制外，货币市场、债券市场利率已经全部放开，市场基准利率建设等逐步深入，中央银行利率调控机制不断完善，这也为继续稳步推进利率市场化改革奠定了良好基础。
社科院副院长李扬此前表示，为全面推进利率市场化改革，需要商业银行行为市场化，并且其盈利模式要从目前主要依赖息差转移到依赖收取服务费。周小川在17日的《财经》年会上也要求，商业银行在经营过程中应该逐步减少对利差收入在总收入或者在创造利润中所占的比重。
而商业银行也早已感知到未来的趋势，尤其是一些大型银行在过去的几年里已经先行做出业务调整。据工商银行风险管理部统计，近年来我国商业银行的营业收入中，净利息收入的占比不断下降：2006年工、农、中、建、交5家大型银行净利息收入占营业收入的比例为89.5%，今年上半年该比例已经下降至77.3%。
同时，非利息收入占营业收入的比例持续提高，中间业务收入已成为银行收入的重要来源。上半年，上述5家银行的手续费佣金收入占营业收入的平均比例为20.9%，比2006年的10.2%提升了一倍以上。而且，多数银行的中间业务都是“以量取胜”，收费项目及基础费率并无明显增加。工行风险管理部预计，我国商业银行非利息收入占比仍将有进一步提升的空间。
中小银行转型更为紧迫
对市场嗅觉灵敏的中小银行也在采取行动。而且跟大型银行相比，由于其资金议价能力低等先天性原因，其改变业务结构的需求显得更迫切。
大连银行常务副行长许文接受记者采访时表示，面对利率市场化这一趋势，银行必须要做出业务转型，如果继续固守过去传统的经营模式和传统业务，未来必将面临严峻考验。尤其是明年货币政策逐步收紧，会对商业银行，特别是中小银行的盈利能力带来压力。经过多年发展，目前该行中间业务已达到10%左右，但仍较国际银行业30%-50%的占比有明显差距。
招行行长马蔚华在近期也称，我国银行95%以上的收入来源于利差，因此银行需要改变目前的收入结构，大力发展非利差收入等资本消耗较小的业务。今年上半年，该行宣布“二次转型”，即大力发展资本消耗较小的中间业务。今年10月该行高调推出面向创新型成长企业投行业务的“千鹰展翼计划”，正是其实施“二次转型”的一个注脚。
银联信分析师钟加勇建议，除提高已有资金收益率外，银行应大力拓展类似现金管理、超级网银和支付等新型的中间业务，通过产品革新摆脱传统的资本消耗型经营模式，探索新型资本管理之路。
而规模更为“迷你”的农商行也在积极地摸索，试图从中间业务中分得一杯羹。据记者了解，两年前东部地区一家农商行从招行投行部引入职业经理人团队，两年间该行投行业务利润已经接近总利润的三分之一。随着该项业务的超常规发展，这位职业经理人已升任该行副行长。
业务转型阻力重重
值得注意的是，尽管业务转型是早晚的事情，但在净息差依然是商业银行最主要盈利来源的现实情况下，转型之路面临着重重阻力。
一位城商行高层对记者表示，“尽管董事会都支持银行转型，但转型如太快，就会影响当期的利润，也会影响上市进程，因此如何将眼前的盈利与长远发展结合起来，是一个难题。”事实上，尽管银行都在谈转型，但说得多做得少，最重要的原因就在于银行舍不得放弃眼前利益，做大型客户投入少效益快，尽管过分依赖利差盈利模式面临巨大的风险，但是并没有得到充分重视。

description.hltext_display: Forex: GBP/USD picking up, approaches 1.5500
description.content:
FXstreet.com (Barcelona) - Pound's decline from 1.5900 area last week, extended to a fresh 3-month low at 1.5435 yesterday, were the pair found support to pick up during Asian trading, reaching 1.5500 area ahead of London session opening.
On the upside, immediate resistance lies at 1.5490 (Daily Pivot Point/session high), and above here, 1.5565/75 (Dec 20/21 highs) and 1.5665 (Dec 17 highs). On the downside, support levels remain at 1.5450 (Dec 17 low) and below here, 1.5435 (Dec 21 low) and 1.5345 (Sept 14 low).
The pair's bias is negative, according to Ian Coleman, technical analyst at FXstreet.com, although bears are losing momentum: " All indicators are still bearish but we can see them rising (Red Line). I would look to 15508 today for signals of another push lower but would trade with extreme caution."

description.hltext_display: Patel Engineering forays into independent power transmission
description.content:
Patel Engineering has successfully bid and bagged the project from REC Transmission Projects Company through a tariff based competitive bidding on build-operate-own-maintain (BOOM) basis for establishment of 765 kv transmission system associated with Krishnapattanam Ultra Mega Power Plant.
This transmission system project is for the execution of the synchronous interconnection between the southern region and western region spanning 210 kms from Raichur to Sholapur for a period of 38 years. The project is bagged by the consortium of BS TransComm and Simplex Infrastructure and Patel Engineering who is the lead member. The estimated cost of the project is around Rs 300 crore and the completion of the project is by March 2014 and the operation period is for 35 years.
The company made this announcement after the trading hours on 21 December 2010.
Powered by Capital Market - Live News

description.hltext_display: ONGC announces framework agreement with SISTEMA
description.content:
ONGC Videsh (ONGC) has signed a framework agreement on cooperation in hydrocarbon sector at Delhi with Sistema, the largest diversified public financial corporation in Russia and CIS during the official visit of the President of the Russian Federation, Dmitry Medvedev to India.
Within the agreement, the two companies agreed to consider opportunities for a potential transaction involving (i) Sistema's majority stake in JSC Bashneft and 49% stake in RussNeft, each of which owns and operates numerous fields and refining assets in Russia, (ii) ONGC Videsh's 100% stake in Imperial Energy Corp., which owns and operates fields in Russia and (iii) Any other oil and gas assets which the aforesaid companies may acquire before definitive agreements are signed. The parties further agree to consider joint investments in each other's existing and future exploratory assets in certain third countries. ONGC proposes to lead a consortium of Indian oil sector PSUs to consider acquiring the stake offered by Sistema under the agreement.
The company made this announcement after the trading hours on 21 December 2010.
Powered by Capital Market - Live News

description.hltext_display: Reliance Industries and SIBUR in a joint venture for Butyl rubber prod...
description.content:
Reliance Industries and the leading Russian petrochemical company SIBUR have announced a joint venture for the production of butyl rubber in India. The joint venture facility will have an initial capacity of 1,00,000 tonnes of butyl rubber at RIL's integrated refining-cum-petrochemical site in Jamnagar, India and is expected to be commissioned by 2013. Estimated investment in the project will be US$ 450 million. The plant will initially produce regular butyl rubber and is expected to manufacture other types of butyl rubber specialities in the future. SIBUR will provide its proprietary technology for butyl rubber polymerization and finishing, while RIL will supply monomers and provide the JV with world-class infrastructure and utilities. RIL will have a majority stake in the joint venture.
The company made this announcement before the trading hours on 22 December 2010.
Powered by Capital Market - Live News

description.hltext_display: Online retailers eye year-end market
description.content:
Taobao, Asia's largest online trading platform, has launched a year-end sales promotion with the largest discounts of the year, hexun.com reports.
The promotional campaign, held on the website qiang.taobao.com from midnight on December 21 to December 24, covers a wide range of commodities with an average discount of 50 percent plus free delivery.
Other online trading websites in the country also expressed strong interests in the year-end market. Tianya.cn, for instance, launched similar sales activities with half-price discounts before the coming Christmas and New Year festival.
The huge discounts have attracted hordes of customers, and kicked off this year's biggest online shopping festival, the report said.
Taobao's business volume for female apparel amounted to 10 million yuan (1.5 million U.S. dollars) in the first 24 minutes of the campaign, and the sales of three online stores dealing with the category reached 1 million yuan in the first half an hour.
Chocolates, roses, and candies, as well as jewelry are among the best-selling products, said Taobao.
According to the Ministry of Commerce, the e-commerce transaction volume of Mainland China reached 258 billion yuan (38.7 billion U.S. dollars) in 2009 with 105.8 percent year-on-year growth. The country had 108 million internet users involved in online shopping by the end of 2009.

description.hltext_display: Save the date 8 of February
Soldaten in Afghanistan können wieder ARD empfangen
description.content:
Foto: Peter Boudgoust Foto: Ronald Gläser
BERLIN. Die ARD wird nun doch wieder ihr Programm nach Afghanistan übertragen. Damit revidiert der Sender seine Entscheidung vom Juni 2010, als die Übertragung aus Kostengründen eingestellt worden ist. Ursache für die überraschende Wende ist eine Protestwelle von Politikern und Soldaten, die von der Bild-Zeitung losgetreten worden ist.
So hat das Blatt eine Kampagne („Das Erste ist das letzte“) gestartet. Zahlreiche Fachpolitiker mehrerer Parteien haben sich ähnlich ablehnend dazu geäußert. Beispielsweise forderte der Wehrbeauftragte des Deutschen Bundestages Helmut Königshaus (FDP) „mehr Patriotismus“ von der öffentlich-rechtlichen Sendeanstalt.
Skandalöse Begründung
Als besonders skandalös wurde die Begründung der ARD für die vorübergehende Abschaltung der Übertragung kritisiert: Kosteneinsparungen. Die ARD gab den Preis für die Nutzung eines Übertragungssatelliten mit einer Million Euro an. Auf der anderen Seite kassiert der Sender GEZ-Gebühren aber auch dann von den Soldaten, wenn sie im Afghanistaneinsatz sind. Bei 4.500 Soldaten kommen so mehrere Hunderttausend Euro zusammen. Insgesamt hat die ARD ein Budget von über sechs Milliarden Euro.
Ein Angebot, die Sendungen des Ersten über Bundeswehrkanäle zu senden, hat die ARD obendrein „aus rechtlichen Gründen“ abgelehnt. Angeblich habe sie bereits seit geraumer Zeit nach einer Lösung für die „rechtlichen Probleme“ gesucht, teilte der Sender jetzt mit. Nun habe er sich zu einer „Blitzaktion“ entschlossen. ARD-Chef Peter Boudgoust sagte am Dienstag: „Was jetzt zählt ist das Ergebnis, alles andere kann später geklärt werden.“ (rg)

description.hltext_display: Dr Reddy's Laboratories to collaborate with R-Pharma Russia
description.content:
Dr. Reddy's entered into licensing, technology transfer, manufacturing and marketing agreement with R- Pharma, a Russian pharmaceutical company which is into R&D, manufacturing, promotion and distribution of pharmaceuticals used in hospital and specialty care, which has revenues of 26.7 bn RUR in 2009.
The Russian pharmaceutical market is one of the largest in the world with total revenues of US $ 15.3 billion in 2009, which is anticipated to remain on a path of dynamic growth due to multiple initiatives by the Russian government. The '2020 pharmaceutical programme' by the government aims at strengthening domestic manufactures which ensures 50% of pharmaceuticals circulated with domestic origin in Russia by 2020.
Dr.Reddy's collaboration with R-Pharma is in the area of high technology and agreed to work upon profit sharing model. In addition, it will entail licensing of manufacturing know-how of products by Dr. Reddy's, local manufacturing of products in Russia, co-development of high technology products and knowledge sharing between both parties at regular intervals.
Commenting on the agreement, Satish Reddy, Managing Director and COO, Dr. Reddy's said, “We are excited about this collaboration as it helps us to deepen our engagement with Russia, one of our key markets. The agreement allows us to bring innovative medicines to the Russian people with active collaboration of a local pharmaceutical company R-Pharma. It will also allow Dr.Reddy's to import and market R-Pharm products in India according to agreed terms. The collaboration demonstrates our commitment to play a leading role in supporting the Russian government's policy of Pharma 2020”
Dr.Reddy's is the largest Indian Pharmaceutical Company in Russia and also fastest growing international branded generic company by volume, entered in to Russian market in 1992. Omez, Nise, Ketorol and Ciprolet are top four brands in the Russian market and ranked No1 in their respective segments.
Powered by Capital Market - Live News

description.hltext_display: MVNO viability questioned
英欧央行为爱尔兰银行业保驾护航
description.content:
作者：simuba 来源：私募吧 发表时间：2010-12-21
英国央行将在必要时向欧洲央行提供最多100亿英镑。英国央行同时指出，未来该国金融体系面对的风险不断增加，可能受到欧债危机加剧以及新兴市场资产泡沫和垃圾债券的冲击。....
英国央行将在必要时向欧洲央行提供最多100亿英镑。图为英国央行在伦敦的总部大楼。新华社图片
□本报记者 陈听雨
英国央行与欧洲央行12月17日联合宣布，已签订一项临时流动性互换安排，允许双方进行英镑与欧元互换。根据该项安排，英国央行可在必要时向欧洲央行提供最多100亿英镑，并换取同等价值的欧元，以满足欧元区银行系统的临时英镑流动性需要。
该协议将于2011年9月到期。欧洲央行特别指出：“作为预防措施，爱尔兰央行可以通过这项安排随时得到英镑，满足该国金融系统对英镑的临时流动性要求。”
不过，在为爱尔兰银行系统“保驾护航”的同时，英国金融体系自身风险也在悄然上升。英国央行同日称，该国金融体系的风险正在增加，银行业将在2011年面临更大的融资挑战。
爱尔兰银行业流动性不足
分析人士认为，英欧央行签订临时流动性互换安排，显示出爱尔兰银行业英镑流动性不足的信号。
随着债务危机升级，爱尔兰银行业在存款外流和融资成本激增的双重打击下，对欧洲央行的流动性支持愈发依赖。国际评级机构穆迪投资者服务公司预计，迄今为止，爱尔兰6家受政府担保的银行从欧洲央行和爱尔兰央行获得的借款分别已超过900亿欧元和400亿欧元。
荷兰国际集团投资级债券战略主管帕德赖克・加尔维称：“不能仅从表面理解欧洲央行与英国央行的临时流动性互换安排，这项工具暗示着爱尔兰银行业对英镑存在需求。”
爱尔兰政府于11月正式接受了欧盟和国际货币基金组织(IMF)总额达850亿欧元的联合援助，作为计划的一部分，英国也向爱尔兰提供了双边贷款。
IMF17日警告称，除非爱尔兰政府采取进一步措施削减开支或提高税收，否则将无法实现在2015年以前将财政赤字削减至占国内生产总值(GDP)3%水平的目标。IMF预计，2014年爱尔兰财政赤字将占GDP的5.1%，2015年该比值将下降至4.8%，但仍高于3%的目标。IMF同时指出，欧盟援助计划面临巨大风险，爱尔兰可能无力如期偿还援金。
IMF认为，2010年爱尔兰经济将出现萎缩，并于明年开始温和复苏。该机构预计，明年爱尔兰GDP将增长1.0%，2012年则增长1.9%，2013年和2014年GDP将分别实现2.4%和3.0%的增幅。
IMF还对爱尔兰债务危机的溢出效应表示担忧。该机构指出，如果爱尔兰财政压力“无序爆发”，可能会给西班牙、希腊以及葡萄牙造成破坏性影响，甚至波及美国和英国经济复苏以及市场稳定。
由于欧债危机阴云持续不散，且于17日结束的2010年最后一次欧盟领导人峰会未能出台更加积极有效的危机应对方法，欧洲股市17日收低，银行股领跌。爱尔兰ISEQ指数下跌0.5%，爱尔兰银行暴跌14%，爱尔兰联合银行下挫1.1%。投资者对爱尔兰的担忧还拖累英国银行股跳水，莱斯银行下跌3.6%，苏格兰皇家银行下跌5.7%。
欧元汇率同样延续跌势。当日，欧元兑美元下跌0.4%，盘中跌至1.3133的两周低点。分析人士预计，本周欧元可能继续走软,在未来两周内，欧元可能跌至1.2600美元位置。
英国银行业或“自身难保”
英国央行17日发布金融稳定报告称，该国金融体系比较强劲，但其面对的风险也在增加。
英国央行指出，截至目前，欧债危机对主要欧洲国家金融体系的影响有限。由于英国未融入欧元体系，因此一年来，英国金融市场的状况得到了逐步改善。
不过，英国央行同时指出，未来该国金融体系面对的风险不断增加，可能受到欧债危机加剧以及新兴市场资产泡沫和垃圾债券的冲击。
英国央行表示，假如国内经济形势恶化，且央行实施加息举措，银行业将在未来几年内出现巨大的不良贷款损失，但规模仍然可控。

description.hltext_display: Tata Chemicals forays into branded pulses
description.content:
Tata Chemicals unveiled as India's first National brand of pulses-'I-Shakti Dals' and has launched four popular varieties of pulses (chana, toor, urad and moong) in the Indian market. The pulses range has been reasonably priced between Rs 95 to Rs 100 per kg in retail shops.

description.hltext_display: 遊覽車7死車禍 運將判2年(中央社)
description.content:
（中央社記者陳朝福高雄22日電）去年10月發生的7死仙儷通運公司遊覽車車禍，司機許恩榮被依業務過失致死罪，遭判刑有期徒刑2年。
高雄地方法院今天發布的判決書指出，被告為仙儷通運公司遊覽車司機，民國98年10月10日駕駛營業大客車，載運旅客自台北南下，準備前往屏東小琉球旅遊。
判決書表示，大客車行經國道3號385公里的高雄縣大樹鄉路段，以時速120公里行駛，失控追撞同方向的小貨車後，再擦撞公路護欄，衝出道路邊坡翻覆，造成7死、21傷。
判決書表示，承審法官開庭審理，認為被告肇事後，向抵達現場處理的員警坦承犯行，符合自首條件，依法減刑，且與部分死者家屬和受傷乘客達成和解，審結判處有期徒刑2年。

description.hltext_display: BRIEF: Tax-aide volunteers will train to assist
Lamode Crony内美外也美
description.content:
追溯1993年，在欧美调整型内衣行业叱咤风云的法国品牌——Lamode Crony，以龙卷风之势登陆大马，让许多女性为之着迷，迅即稳坐大马调整型内衣龙头宝座。
天然原料打造深度研发 务求提升效果及舒适感
Lamode Crony，这个法国自创品牌的生产基地是在澳洲，其产品已在全球四十多个国家注册，同时还在许多国家进行直营以及分销代理。
该公司亚太区秘书长连纯雅表示，这个以叶子概念所打造的调整型内衣，能够迅速获得消费者青睐，主要是因为它采用源自欧洲的天然原料打造，再加上深度研发，务求提升效果以及强调舒适感，才能赢取良好口碑。
从1993年至今，该公司已累积10万名会员，巫裔占约85%、华裔占约15%，以及印裔占约1%。
缺乏穿内衣正确知
连纯雅说：“基本上，很多人都缺乏穿内衣的正确知识，她们只是依据自己所好，在购物中心选购中意的内衣，却没有想到久而久之，这会影响她们的身材。”
此时，她的脑海里突然浮现这一幕，遂与记者分享：“前阵子，有一位老婆婆和一名少妇相伴前来，我以为是这名少妇想购买调整型内衣，殊不知原来是老婆婆的调整型内衣已经旧了，所以特意前来购买一件全新的。”
正因为有客户的鼎力支持，目前Crony已在全马设立30间分行，该公司坚信客户会坚持购买品质上等的产品。
提倡穿得轻松与健康 睡眠内衣卖得满堂红
为了避免产品老化，该公司不断加强研发，并于半年前推出了一款睡眠内衣，提倡穿得轻松与健康，引起消费者的积极回响，在本地卖得满堂红。
连纯雅表示，Crony是一家非常注重研发的公司，单单是在亚太区，便投入100万令吉作为研发成本。
“基于我们积极开发有潜力的产品，截至目前，大马的营业额已比去年同期劲扬57%，其中有90%来自调整型内衣业务的贡献，护肤品业务及保健品业务则分别占8%及2%。”
健康体重管理健美馆 明年开业为顾客服务
诚如连纯雅所说，或许正因为Crony是以销售调整型内衣为主，而奠定其市场地位，所以才会让消费者忽略该公司旗下的护肤品与保健品。
有鉴于此，该公司将在明年1月1日推出“健康体重管理健美馆”（Crony Spa），主要提供健康、体重管理、瘦身与美容服务。
以宣导产品为主
连纯雅说：“这个健美馆主要是针对客户需求，提供个别疗程，对症下药。”
她补充：“健康体重管理健美馆是以宣导产品为主，服务是赠送的，我们希望秉持健康经营概念，即不签署配套与不采取会员制，所以除非是客户亲自开口询问，美容师才会提供咨询。
“我们还会为首次亲临尝试的客户提供免费服务，若客户购买产品还享有现金回退。”
她指出，该公司早在欧洲推行这种健康经营理念，并且在今年初将之引进台湾，获得市场热烈回响。
“自从公司采取这种经营措施后，视乎让客户卸下了销售压力，获得不俗的口碑，台湾分店从早上8点30分，就有人陆续排队，门庭若市。”
与表现特出直销商合营商店
鉴于公司直销商已经累积一定的客户量，为了顾及他们对公司营业额所作出的贡献，举凡在营业额贡献方面表现特出的直销商，将可以合营方式与公司携手经营商店。
连纯雅表示：“这将是我们的未来经营方式，只要他们的表现标青，那么他们只需付出一点钱，就可换取该店的股权，这是公司回馈直销商的管道之一。”
不考虑特许经营模式
尽管如此，该公司并不考虑特许经营模式，以保护辛苦建立起来的品牌形象与名气。
“未来10年，公司都会把主力放在商店上。我深信在1年至1年半内，护肤品和保健品业务对公司总营业额的贡献，将可超越调整型内衣，假设无法如愿，两者贡献应该也可以平起平坐。”
不提倡机器塑身
连纯雅表示，该公司并不提倡机器塑身，希望鼓励客户通过天然保健品，再配上调整型内衣，控制体重，进而塑造黄金比例的身型。
据她所说，该公司为了促进护肤品与保健品业务，花费了一年半时间筹备健康体重管理健美馆。
“我们非常重视这个长期计划，因为我们是在海外采取这种经营方式，并确定可行后才引进大马，希望让客户重新认识我们的保健品与护肤品，从中受惠。
“在第一轮改革计划中，会先由公司成立商店，希望半年内，将位于雪州梳邦再也的第一间商店炒热，然后下半年分别在槟城和巴生增设两间分店。”
她披露，该公司希望在2012年，开设5至10间分店，预计每间分店的投资成本是介于20万至25万令吉。
从事直销业务公司 须拥完整研发计划
多层行销业务（MLM），可以称为直销，是一个常被广泛讨论，且常被误解的主题。
有人喜欢直销，因为它可以带来丰厚收入，但也有人对它嗤之以鼻，觉得它烦不胜烦。
对于直销，连纯雅给予一种正面肯定，并认为最主要还是胥视商品属性，应该以规模化方式经营。
不同产品有不同通路
她说：“直销经营环境已经大不如前，随便设立一个制度，引进一、两个产品，就可以称为直销，做得好就活，做不好便跑，造成了许多问题。
“这不止是经营者有风险，从事这个行业的人同样面对风险。”
因此，连纯雅将之视为另外一个通路，并且开辟了另外一条通路。
“我们认为，假设这条通路已经不适合这个产品使用，那么就不能太勉强，因为这不止会让直销商赚不到钱，公司也必须承受高风险。
“所以，对于不同的产品，我们必须采用不同的通路去对待它。”
同时，连纯雅还认为，只要从事直销业务的公司，拥有一套完整的研发和计划，这门生意是值得发展的。
她说：“这个社会有太多人需要赚快钱了，这种风气在欧洲非常盛行，也只有大型直销公司才能存活，小型直销公司是不会被鼓励和存活的。
人人可创业风险较低
“亚洲可能感受不到这种情况。在亚洲，直销的经营概念是人人可以创业，风险比较低，让许多人实现梦想，这是我一直以来抱着正面与肯定想法。”
此外，她也认为，直销有助于解决社会问题（如失业），以及让许多人通过参与培训课程，培养正面看法。
“许多人可以在这里找到他们的空间和舞台，让他们发挥自己的能力。”
鼓励年轻人加入直销业
对于想创业的年轻人，连纯雅的建议是：“年轻人值得从事直销行业，可借此了解多层行销业务的精髓，包括人性哲学、心理学、行销技巧以及人生观念和态度。
“他们必须在集合上述精髓后，才能成为一个很棒的直销商。”
她指出，尽管直销行业最难学的是管理能力，可是只要他们在这个行业越久，交际应酬越多，便能够培养出与别人的相处之道、交际能力以及待人处事之道等。
她续说：“不管这些年轻人是否有意长期从事直销行业，或者视之为终身事业，他们都需要了解以及应该接受多层行销业务公司的正统培训，因为这些都对日后创业有帮助，将让他们受益无穷。”
从连纯雅的角度来看，基于直销公司成为了许多人的培训平台，这等于为政府解决了许多问题，包括失业率以及培训人才等，所以政府必须大力扶持这些公司。

description.hltext_display: "Chuck" Star Yvonne Strahovski Teams Up with PETA
description.author: ACCESSHOLLYWOOD.COM EDITORIAL STAFF
description.content:
"Chuck" star Yvonne Strahovski is fighting for her best friends – namely, her rescued dogs, Chazzie and Wilbur – in a new campaign she's launched with PETA.
The trio has teamed up for a brand-new "Adopt, Don't Buy" PETA campaign. In the ad, which was shot by top celebrity photographer Robert Sebree, Strahovski appears as Chazzie's and Wilbur's guardian angel below the words, "Be an Angel for Animals. Always Adopt. Never Buy."
"There are just so many dogs that are just as gorgeous — whether they're mixed or purebred or whatever — they're all gorgeous, and they all have personalities, and they all need a home," Strahovski said. "I come home from a hard day at work, and I see these two happy faces when I walk in the door, and it's unconditional love.
"There's something like … 7 to 8 million animals that are homeless, and half of those dogs get euthanized, and it's really sad."
The holiday season is an especially rough time of year for unwanted animals. Buying a cat or a dog from a pet store or breeder is a death sentence for an animal awaiting adoption in a shelter. According to PETA, shelters see a spike in homeless animals every year after the holidays as families find themselves unable to care for the puppies and kittens they purchased as gifts.
PETA advises that during the busy holiday season, animals should never be given as surprise gifts. Caring for a dog can be a 20-year commitment, so the decision to take a dog home should be carefully weighed by the whole family and never be made on a whim.
Copyright 2010 by NBC Universal, Inc. All rights reserved.
Related Content from AccessHollywood.com:
More from Access: [ PETA Animals Chuck ]
Copyright Access Hollywood
First Published: Dec 21, 2010 3:01 PM EST

description.hltext_display: IBM EXTENDS SUPPORT FOR NEC AND NETEZZA
description.content:
Tweet JOINTLY-DEVELOPED DATA WAREHOUSE APPLIANCES
Japan’s Shikoku Coca Cola Win Demonstrates Demand for Appliances Offering Simplified Business Analytics
ARMONK, N.Y., TOKYO, Japan & MARLBOROUGH, Mass., — 22 December 2010: IBM (NYSE: IBM) and NEC (TSE: 6701; NEC) today announced an extended agreement to jointly develop NEC-branded data warehouse appliances.
Under the agreement, NEC will continue to sell the jointly-developed data warehouse appliances worldwide, the first of which – InfoFrame DWH Appliance – became generally available in June of 2010. As part of today?s news, the two companies also announce that Japan’s Shikoku Coca Cola has selected NEC’s InfoFrame DWH Appliance to gain faster insight into their business information.
“Our support of NEC and the Netezza partnership is another example of IBM’’s commitment to helping clients simplify their information management demands for better business outcomes,” said Arvind Krishna, general manager, IBM Information Management.
“Our relationship with Netezza allows NEC to market essential products that deliver fast, cost efficient analytic solutions globally, and we are pleased that this relationship will continue,” said Takao Maruyama, Associate SVP, IT Hardware at NEC.
The NEC-branded jointly-developed appliances combine Netezza’s streaming architecture and analytical database software with NEC’s server and storage platforms. With over 500 data warehouse customers and experience deploying Netezza’s products to over 25 top firms in Japan alone, NEC is well positioned to further grow its data warehouse business with appliances jointly developed with Netezza. About NEC Corporation NEC Corporation is a leader in the integration of IT and network technologies that benefit businesses and people around the world. By providing a combination of products and solutions that cross utilize the company’s experience and global resources, NEC’s advanced technologies meet the complex and ever-changing needs of its customers. NEC brings more than 100 years of expertise in technological innovation to empower people, businesses and society. For more information, visit NEC at http://www.nec.com.
About Netezza Netezza, an IBM Company and a global leader in data warehouse, analytic and monitoring appliances that dramatically simplify high-performance analytics across an extended enterprise. Netezza?s technology enables organizations to process enormous amounts of captured data at exceptional speed, providing a significant competitive and operational advantage in today?s data-intensive industries, including digital media, energy, financial services, government, health and life sciences, retail and telecommunications. For more information about Netezza, please visit www.netezza.com. About IBM For Information on Demand and IBM Information Management, please visit: http://www.ibm.com/software/data/information-on-demand/ For more information on IBM Business Analytics, please visit the online press kit: http://www.ibm.com/press/us/en/presskit/27163.wss Follow IBM and Analytics on Twitter: http://twitter.com/ibmbizanalytics Follow IBM analytics on Tumblr: http://smarterplanet.tumblr.com/tagged/new_intelligence IBM YouTube Analytics Channel: http://www.youtube.com/user/ibmbusinessanalytics For more information on IBM Smarter Systems: http://www-03.ibm.com/systems/smarter/ # # # Contacts: Glen Zimmerman Netezza Media Relations gzimmerman } netezza(.)com

description.hltext_display: 邹黄入职董事会国美分裂风险暂除
description.content:
作者：simuba 来源：私募吧 发表时间：2010-12-21
大概前段时间国美电器(00493.HK)创始人与董事会的矛盾让人产生了审美疲劳，17日召开的特别股东大会，关注度明显下降。不出所料，创始大股东黄光裕终于在董事会安插下两名自己人：亲信邹晓春、胞妹黄燕虹。....
王如晨
大概前段时间国美电器(00493.HK)创始人与董事会的矛盾让人产生了审美疲劳，17日召开的特别股东大会，关注度明显下降。
不出所料，创始大股东黄光裕终于在董事会安插下两名自己人：亲信邹晓春、胞妹黄燕虹。他们高票入职国美董事会，前者担任执行董事，后者任非执行董事。由此，国美董事会从11人扩至13人。
这也是上个月10日国美董事会与黄光裕方面谅解协议的落实。在此前否决董事会增发授权的基础上，代言人重新进入董事会，黄光裕方面显然如愿以偿。据悉，陈晓以时间冲突为由，没能出席当天的会议。
国美电器“一分为二”的风险暂时得以解除。黄光裕一方代理人王永峰表示，随着邹、黄二人顺利进入董事会，创始股东将继续让国美托管非上市门店。而在一封发给媒体的“表态函”中，新任执行董事邹晓春说：“创始股东将通过一切可行的途径，和董事会成员积极洽商，尽可能地本着不分拆母集团的方向，来解决业已存在的阻碍企业发展的问题。”
之前黄光裕一方反击董事会的言论，大致围绕着公司发展策略与董事长陈晓的去留上。黄光裕一方认为国美必须首先保持规模优势，然后再提高单店利润，而过去一年多，由于遭遇过资金链断裂危机，国美电器收缩迹象明显。他们曾强烈要求陈晓赶快离开。
邹晓春对香港媒体表示，自己将参与国美日常经营，至于董事长陈晓的去留，新的董事会将会协调解决。王永峰透露，目前邹晓春并没有竞选国美董事长的计划。
但“表态函”同样透露着一种权力角逐味道。邹晓春表示，国美最佳的公司治理方案应该是在创始股东的“参与及指导”下，保证公司保持行业领先地位和业务的快速发展，加强公司治理，保障全体股东利益的一种平衡。
短期内陈晓会选择离开吗？他的手机号码已经无法拨通。国美电器发言人赵彤甚至表示，已经很长时间没有跟他直接联系了。
尽管如此，业内人士认为，假如陈晓真的选择离开，对于国美电器来说，短期内应该会构成负面冲击。因为，即便有创始人背后撑腰，邹晓春担任董事长还欠缺行业经验与个人号召力。

未戴安全帽被拍照 高職生烙10人毆警(畫新聞)
description.content:
畫新聞 ╱畫新聞 2010-12-22 15:27
討論 (+)
調整字級：
【畫新聞╱ 圖‧Anya 文‧泰倫╱綜合報導】
據《聯合報》報導，20日晚上，宜蘭縣1名20歲的高職夜校生莊智崴，因騎機車未戴安全帽，被穿著便衣執行交通違規的2名交通隊員警和1名替代役男拍照，莊男再繞回原處，再找來5輛機車共10人毆警，雖然員警李啟南高喊「我是警察」，但他們仍手持棍棒將替代役男打得頭破血流，重傷送醫。員警最後也掏槍將其中3人制伏。
替代役男陳慶郁當時邊跑邊被打向附近民宅試圖求救，但這群青少年追打的結果，造成頭部輕微腦震盪，有8公分長撕裂傷，2名員警鄭儒鴻與李啟南則受到輕傷。莊智崴事後到案聲稱被人踹一腳，但不知道他們是警察，而員警回應當時執行的地點離機車有一段距離，根本不可能會踢到。
除了當場制伏25歲的張家榮、18歲的薛宇軒及20歲的林家豪，警方事後也逮捕到3人，分別為莊智崴、黃俊達（24歲）及林介文（19歲），依殺人未遂、妨害公務罪嫌送辦。剩下5人還要再追查。

description.hltext_display: Federer wins 1st charity match with Nadal
description.content:
Swiss tennis star Roger Federer won his first Match for Africa exhibition event against Spanish rival Rafael Nadal in Zurich on Monday.
The match raised more than 2 million francs for the Federer Foundation, which aims to shore up disabled children in Ethiopia, Tanzania, Zimbabwe and South Africa.
The pair will be in Madrid on Wednesday for a return match in another show of support for the Federer Foundation.

description.hltext_display: Dr Reddy's scrip hits month low on BSE; slips over 4 pc
Getting ready for Swedish Love Stories in Milan
Promoter: Pacquiao to fight Mosley on May 7
description.content:
Manny Pacquiao plans to fight Sugar Shane Mosley in his next bout May 7 in Las Vegas.
Promoter Bob Arum told The Associated Press on Tuesday night that the deal will be done after Mosley's lawyers approve the final paperwork for the WBO welterweight title fight at the MGM Grand Garden Arena.
Arum says Pacquiao chose the bout because Mosley is the most accomplished and famous boxer in the field of candidates, which included Juan Manuel Marquez and welterweight champion Andre Berto.
"He's the most recognizable name, and it's a difficult fight for him," said Arum, who met with Pacquiao in the Philippines last week. "People are also saying, 'Well, why hasn't he fought an African-American fighter?' He's doing that, but mostly it's because Mosley is the biggest name."
Pacquiao also realizes a potential superbout with Floyd Mayweather Jr. is likely still impossible because of the Mayweather family's various legal troubles.
Pacquiao (52-3-2, 38 KOs) is on top of the boxing world after trouncing Antonio Margarito in a one-sided decision in Texas on Nov. 13. The 32-year-old Filipino congressman has won 13 straight fights while claiming world titles in an astonishing eight weight classes, most recently taking the WBC 154-pound belt with his win over Margarito.
Arum realizes he could have trouble selling a fight against a nearly 40-year-old opponent who will be nearly 2 1/2 years removed from his last victory when he faces Pacquiao, but he believes Mosley's skill and speed will challenge Pacquiao.
"That was obviously a negative, but Shane Mosley is capable of doing great things," Arum said.
Mosley (46-6-1, 39 KOs) is near the tail end of a remarkable career that began in 1993. The former three-division champion has won just two of his past five fights, getting walloped by Mayweather in an unanimous decision last May before fighting to a dull draw with Sergio Mora on Sept. 18.
The deal further cements Mosley's acrimonious split from Golden Boy, Oscar De La Hoya's promotional company.
Mosley was a founding partner in Golden Boy, but he has cut ties with the organization since his draw with Mora last September, even refusing to answer phone calls from Golden Boy CEO Richard Schaefer. Mosley apparently was angry that Golden Boy pushed Marquez, the talented Mexican champion, as Pacquiao's next opponent.
Golden Boy and Top Rank, Arum's promotion, are involved in a bitter rivalry. The companies have become unwilling to match any of their fighters against each other, which likely proved to be an insurmountable obstacle for Golden Boy's Marquez.
Pacquiao and Marquez have fought twice before, with a draw in 2004 and a split-decision win for Pacquiao in 2008. Both fights were thrilling contests that easily could have been decided for Marquez, who has been campaigning for a third bout since moments after their second fight ended.
After straying to suburban Dallas for his victories this year over Joshua Clottey and Margarito in cavernous Cowboys Stadium, Pacquiao is eager to return to Las Vegas, where his fights always attract thousands of fans eager to pump gambling money into Nevada's struggling gaming industry.
"It's great to do a promotion where I can sleep in my own bed," Arum said.
Mosley didn't immediately return a call to his cell phone.

S'pore inmates score with data entry job for ministry
气候适宜成本不高 香椰种植业前景俏
description.content:
务农其实是一件很辛苦的事，但为了不荒废仅仅的二亩地，他毅然选择种植香椰。如今，他的辛劳已经有了回报，而他栽种的香椰，椰水更让人喝后回味无穷。
来自彭亨州双溪兰新村的俞秀君，是一名摩托店业者，但也拥有自己的芭园。
2000年俞秀君心血来潮，把不大不小的二亩低洼地拿来种植香椰，到了今天，每星期可出产至少400至500粒香椰。
他说，在种植前，他曾经为了有限的土地感到懊恼，不算大也不算小的空间，不知该种什么才好。
如果选择开展蔬果种植业，也必须拥有足够的人手，包括聘请外劳打理。很多的因素需顾及。
后来，农耕领域中的不少朋友为他指引，告诉他可发展种植香椰业。
清暑解渴
因为我国是典型的热带季候，适宜种植椰树，同时，此果生产投资少、管理费用低。尤其是椰水具有滋补、清暑解渴的功效，主治暑热类渴，津液不足。看到效益潜在，在太太的鼓励下，也下决定种植香椰。
椰子对土质的要求不严，能在各种类型土壤上生长。
由于其芭场位置属于低洼区，拥有足够的水份和阳光供椰子生长。
当然，从第一次种植的懵懵懂懂到后来的熟练，他掌握好了椰园的一切。
俞秀君促农业部 加强推动椰子种植业
俞秀君说，香椰其实具有很多发挥潜能的市场，除了一般的食用，也可研制成为椰油，或是椰壳加工成为精湛奇巧的椰雕等。
因此，在这方面，他希望政府或是农业部可再进一步在这方面作出探讨，加强宣传推动本地椰子种植业。
例如旅游部长拿督斯里黄燕燕日前在双溪兰举办的美食节活动，他也“应节”成为了参展的一分子。
他希望政府也能在宣传方面下些工夫，将本地的土产优质水果推广至世界各角落。
品质要求严格
为果业奠定了丰收的基础，一分耕耘一分收获的原则必须要坚持。
以俞秀君密集的收成量来说，他必须每个月定期施肥，椰树才能够拥有足够的养分达到“高产量”的目标。
尤其在果实长大期间，要保证有足够的水分和养分，以满足果实发育的生理需要。
“除了在果实发育初期施肥，果树成长后的施肥灌溉对果实的产量和品质有一定的影响关连，不能有任何忽略。若营养不良，将会对果树生长构成影响。”
这是他对自己的种植物有严格要求，也因为如此，他在消费者心中维持了长期的信誉。
村内老字号
目前，俞秀君的香椰一般都载到县内的土产店销售，适应各层次的顾客选购。
椰水清甜果肉香滑
由于椰水清甜，果肉香滑色纯，引起消费者共鸣。
要是遇上感冒、水痘或是骨痛热症的“季节”，各地客商纷沓而来，零售销量则会相应增加。
由于已经成了村内的香椰业“老字号”，在酷热的天气里，村民们都会纷纷向他订购。
大家都是老街坊，俞秀君也习惯了这样的作业方式。
在市场销售顺畅的情况下，平日忙于摩托店维修工作的他，接到订单时，就会带着太太和孩子们到椰园采果，以便可以交货予订户。
受访者档案
业者：俞秀君

Pressemeldung anzeigen Um die Meldung anzeigen zu können, benötigen Sie den kostenlosen Adobe Reader. Über Mit der Erfahrung aus mehreren hundert Archivprojekten ist die DMI eines der führenden Unternehmen für Archivierung in Deutschland. Die Unternehmensgeschichte verweist auf eine über vierzigjährige Erfahrung als Spezialist für die Archivierung sensibelster und langfristig zu bewahrender Daten/Dokumente. Das und die innovative Dynamik begründen die marktführende Stellung im komplexesten aller Archivbereiche, dem Gesundheitswesen. description.hltext_display: Rio Tinto near deal on $3.8 billion Riversdale bid - source
description.content:
SYDNEY (Reuters) - Global miner Rio Tinto is finalising a $3.8 billion (2.4 billion pounds) takeover bid for Africa-focussed Riversdale , according to sources, upping an earlier offer as it seeks to gain key coking coal supplies amid soaring demand from India and China.
Rio Tinto (RIO.L) is locked in talks with Australian-listed Riversdale Mining over a A$16 per share takeover offer but a final deal has not yet been completed because of some last minute wrangling over price, one source familiar with the matter said Wednesday.
An announcement is expected either later Wednesday or Thursday, one source said, confirming media reports that Rio Tinto had offered around A$16 per share for Riversdale. The two sources could not be identified as they were not authorised to speak to the media.
A A$16 per share bid would be a 13.5 percent premium to Riversdale's close on December 3 before news of Rio's interest was announced, but lower than its last trading price of A$16.30.
Shares in Riversdale, which said earlier this month it was talking to Rio about a A$15 per share offer, were placed in a trading halt on Tuesday after newspaper reports about a new offer.
There was some speculation Rio may offer up to A$16.50 but one of the sources said Wednesday the price was closer to A$$16.00.
Spokesmen for both Riversdale and Rio Tinto declined to comment. A successful bid for Mozambique-based Riversdale would give it access to what is expected to be the world's second-largest coal exporting market in coming years.
Rio is currently underweight in the commodity. Its large reserves of thermal coking coal have relatively low costs and are well situated to serve China and India's booming markets.
"With Mozambique emerging as a potentially substantial supplier, the trend will obviously be upwards if you're talking about Africa as a whole," said Andrew Harrington, an analyst with Patersons Securities in Sydney.
Riversdale may eventually supply 5-10 percent of the global market for the key steel-making material, analysts say.
Chinese firms have been investing heavily in coal mines in countries like Australia, South Africa, Indonesia and Russia to meet growing demand, while Indian companies are also stepping up their efforts to secure raw materials.
Riversdale was also being eyed by other large mining companies, potentially sparking a bidding war, according to sources close to the deal, although some analysts said they may be unable to match a A$16 per share bid.
Potential interested parties include Anglo American (AAL.L), ArcelorMittal and Xstrata (XTA.L), they said.
Five state-run Indian firms also last week confirmed they were considering an offer. Brazil's Vale , which owns nearby coal mines on Mozambique was not expected to bid.
"Never say never. Tata is the most likely or other similar Indian groups have to be a possibility. Anyone with significant exposure in that area already is less likely," said Tim Barker, manager of the natural resources fund for BT Financial Group.
Riversdale's large shareholders are seen as potential obstacles to a deal. India's Tata Steel owns about 24 percent of Riversdale. Brazilian steelmaker CSN and U.S. Investment firm Passport Capital are also large shareholders.
Rio was making the offer alone and not part of a joint venture with another party, one source said. Rio Tinto is back on the acquisition trail after the global economic downturn froze its expansion plans. It took on $40 billion in debt to buy Canadian aluminium maker Alcan in 2007 and was forced to sell assets and new equity to lower its gearing.
Last month, the Anglo-Australian mining giant said it was set to nearly triple capital spending, to $11 billion in 2011.
Unlike cash-rich BHP Billiton (BLT.L), which recently made an unsuccessful $39 billion bid for fertiliser giant Potash
, Rio has been off the acquisition trail in recent years as it sought to repair its balance sheet.
BHP is not expected to bid for Riversdale as it has its own coal unit in South Africa.
A successful bid would cap off a boom year for mergers and acquisitions involving Australian-listed firms. Another coal miner Whitehaven Coal has also invited interested bidders to conduct due diligence on the company.
UBS is advising Riversdale on the deal and Rio Tinto is being advised by Macquarie .
(Additional reporting by Arada Kultawanich in BANGKOK and Rebekah Kebede in PERTH; Editing by Balazs Koranyi and Lincoln Feast)

description.hltext_display: Post a Comment
description.content:
Nissan handed over the keys to the first Tennessee buyer of its new Leaf at a Nashville dealership on Tuesday, bringing to fruition a multibillion-dollar push to become the world's first automaker to introduce a mass-market, highway-capable electric car. That effort includes a $1 billion lithium-ion battery plant Nissan is building at its Smyrna manufacturing complex, which will start assembling the Leaf sometime in 2012, providing up to 1,300 new jobs here.
The Leaf, which has no tailpipe, and therefore no tailpipe emissions, is intended to usher in an era in which vehicles don't rely directly on imported or domestic oil to run, although there remains some controversy over Nissan's claim that the Leaf produces no emissions.
In Tennessee its emissions are just transferred from the rear of the car to the top of the smokestacks of TVA coal-fired power plants to produce the power to charge the Leaf's battery, some argue.
Jeff and Ashley Heeren of Nashville were the first to receive a Leaf in Tennessee by virtue of being the first to sign up to buy one on a Nissan website in August, said Mark Perry, the Nissan product planner overseeing the Leaf program for Franklin-based Nissan North America Inc.
They picked up the car at Action Nissan, amid a media circus that included film crews from as far away as California. There are lots of other people lined up waiting to get the Leaf, which for now is being sold only in Tennessee and four other states: Washington, Oregon, California and Arizona. Texas and Hawaii will be added in January.
First buyers are 'green'
As for the Heerens, they were eager to become "early adopters" of electric cars, Ashley Heeren said, in part because she works for the Tennessee Parks & Greenways Foundation, which advocates for environmental causes.
"We like to be the first people on the block to get new technology," she said. "We're thrilled to get the first Leaf. The vehicle is phenomenal and very spacious inside."
Just how happy they'll be with the car in the long term remains to be seen, as critics are quick to point out its biggest limitation: It can go only about 100 miles before the lithium-ion battery needs to be recharged, a process that can take as long as eight hours. (2 of 2)"We live in a little seven-mile bubble in Nashville and rarely go outside that, so we don't expect the range to be a problem," Heeren said. "We have installed a charger in our garage. And we do have other cars in the family to use when we take trips." Her other vehicle is perhaps the antithesis of the electric car.
It's a Mercedes-Benz SUV that gets an average of 15 mpg around town, or about one-seventh of the Leaf's 99 mpg-equivalent rating from the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency.
"I think we'll probably be getting rid of the Mercedes pretty soon," she said. "We're thinking of a hybrid SUV of some kind, but we do need the extra space of an SUV for trips."
The couple has two elementary school-age boys.
The Heerens still are trying to figure out how they'll be able to get from Nashville to their weekend home in Monteagle in the Leaf, a drive that probably just barely exceeds the car's range. The town is on Monteagle Mountain along Interstate 24 southeast of Nashville.
"My dad and brother live in Murfreesboro and are buying Leafs as well, so they will have chargers in their garages," Ashley Heeren said. "Maybe we can stop there on the way to Monteagle and back to recharge."
Home chargers such as the ones the Heerens and their relatives will have take seven or eight hours to charge the Leaf's battery. But help is coming sometime next summer in the way of 30-minute fast chargers that will be installed at Cracker Barrel Old Country Store locations and other places, such as some convenience stores, along the interstates between Nashville, Chattanooga and Knoxville.
One of those could give the Heerens a good spot to take a break on the drive to Monteagle, she said.
When asked on Tuesday, Nissan was unable to provide a list of exactly where and when fast charging stations will be online in Tennessee.
Jeff Heeren, an entrepreneur involved in high-tech businesses, said his main interest in the Leaf was its technology.
"I'm an early adopter, and it's a cool vehicle," he said. "Just test driving it before we took delivery, we were getting lots of oddball stares. It's something new and different."
Ashley Heeren said they've already put in an order for a second Leaf, which probably will replace their third vehicle, a Cadillac CTS sedan.
But Nissan's Perry said they'll have to wait before they can get delivery of a second Leaf, at least until all of those who've already signed up get their first ones. "We have a lot of people waiting," he said.

company.name: Cracker Barrel Old Country Store, Inc.

description.hltext_display: House sends food safety bill to Obama
description.content:
WASHINGTON -- The House has passed a sweeping bill aimed at making food safer following recent outbreaks in peanuts, eggs and produce, sending it to President Barack Obama for his signature.
The legislation passed Tuesday would give the government broad new powers to inspect processing plants, order recalls and impose stricter standards for imported foods.
The food safety bill has faced several false starts since the House first passed it in July 2009. Most recently, the Senate passed the bill in November, including tax provisions that were supposed to originate in the House under the constitution, threatening completion of the bill.
Democratic leader Harry Reid gave the legislation a last-minute reprieve Sunday by working with Republicans to pass a standalone food safety bill by voice vote, sending it to the House.

description.hltext_display: Daetwyler with Renewal of Major Contract
description.content:
, The Daetwyler Group announces the early extension of its Rubber Division's successful collaboration with Nespresso till 2015. The new contract regulates the delivery of products worth more than CHF 200 million in total.
The Daetwyler Rubber Division, operating in the market as Daetwyler Rubber, is a leading specialist for custom designed sealing, insulation and vibration control solutions. Daetwyler Rubber is a global development partner and recognised component maker for the automotive supply, construction and other industries.

description.hltext_display: Lib Dem Ministers' Fears Caught On Tape
description.content:
A string of Liberal Democrat ministers have been secretly recorded using phrases such as "train wreck" and "deeply damaging" to describe Government policies.
Scotland Secretary Michael Moore, pensions minister Steve Webb and business minister Ed Davey are the latest politicians to be taped by Daily Telegraph reporters posing as constituents.
Mr Moore described the increase in tuition fees to a maximum £9,000 as "the biggest, ugliest, most horrific thing in all of this... a car crash, a train wreck", the paper said.
He told the undercover reporters: "I've just done the worst crime a politician can commit, the reason most folk distrust us as a breed. I've had to break a pledge and very, very publicly."
Mr Moore said the move was "deeply damaging" to Lib Dems, who had promised to abolish fees.
Mr Webb expressed "worries" about the child benefit cut which will hit couples where one partner earns just over the £42,000 higher-rate threshold.
Mr Davey said plans to limit housing benefit would hit some of the poorest in society.
"Their housing benefit cuts are going to mean, in my view, if they go through, that some people who are on the breadline will be put below the breadline," he said.
Mr Moore was also quoted as saying the coalition had "marginalised" the Conservative right wing, which, he said, "hate us with a passion - and I can't say it's unreciprocated".
Insisting that Lib Dem ministers "remain passionately Liberal Democrat", the Scottish Secretary said some Conservative ministers were "on a different planet".
Mr Webb said Lib Dems had acted behind the scenes to stop a lot of Tory proposals.
But he admitted they risked looking "too cosy" with their coalition partners by hiding their differences in public.
All three spoke to reporters posing as voters from the MPs' local area.
The same tactic led to Mr Cable having to apologise and deny he would quit the coalition and "bring down the Government".
It later emerged he had also "declared war" on Rupert Murdoch's bid to take ownership of BSkyB, the parent company of Sky News, despite being required to remain objective on the issue.
