description.hltext_display: 【フィギュアスケート】高橋大輔に迫る織田信成と小塚崇彦。三つ巴が楽しみな全日本選手権展望
description.author: sportiva
description.content:
[2010年12月22日(水)]
青嶋ひろの●取材・文 text by Aoshima Hirono
岸本 勉●撮影 photo by Kishimoto Tsutomu
世界チャンピオン、高橋大輔が４位。中国杯、フランス・エリック杯と連勝した小塚崇彦が３位。そして昨季、世界選手権ではショートプログラム落ちで心配されていた織田信成が２位――。
グランプリファイナルでの日本男子３人の順位を見て、これでずいぶん全日本選手権が楽しみになった、と思った。
シーズン前には、バンクーバー五輪銅メダリストにして世界チャンピオンの高橋が、気力充実。プログラムも刺激的なものを2本そろえてきて、向かうところ敵なし。実際、ジャンプミスが目立ったにもかかわらず、ＮＨＫ杯、スケートアメリカは貫録で2連勝。今年はファイナルと世界選手権の二冠も夢ではない、との声も高かった。
その日本人３選手が崩れる中、ファイナルを制したのはカナダのパトリック・チャン。しかし彼に続く織田、小塚、ふたりの日本勢も、今季の躍進は目覚ましいものがあると感じた。
よく知られているように、高橋大輔はトータルバランスのいい選手だ。４回転ジャンプも調子のいい時にはフリーで２度成功するほどの力を持っているし、ステップワークは世界一。観客にたっぷりアピールする力もあれば、スケーティングスキルも高い。
すべてにおいてハイレベルをキープしているからこそ、男子の歴代最高得点保持もできている。「高橋がひとつやふたつミスしても、国内の他の選手はそうそう追いつけない」−−そんな状況が、ここ数年は続いてきた。
しかし今シーズン、その高橋の総合力に拮抗するまで、突出した武器を磨いてきたのが、織田信成と小塚崇彦だ。
ファイナルではフリーでチャンに逆転を許したものの、ショートプログラム１位につけた織田信成。得点源は４回転−３回転の連続ジャンプの成功だった。
「今、たくさんのスケーターが４回転を跳んでいるし、今シーズンは絶対に必要なジャンプだと思いました。もちろん今後も入れていきたいです。僕の場合、４回転を入れないと高い得点がとれない。今回も本当に成功させたくて跳びたくて……集中したんです」（織田）
もともと織田のジャンプは、飛距離も高さもある。猫のように体重を感じさせない軽々とした着氷の美しさも、高く評価されてきた。このクオリティを維持しつつ、世界でも数人しか跳べない４回転−３回転のコンビネーションを成功させたとあれば、いくらでも高得点は期待できるだろう。
このまま４回転コンビネーションを見せ続けていけば、高橋はもちろん、エフゲニー・プルシェンコ（ロシア）やブライアン・ジュベール（フランス）を上回る４回転巧者として世界に認められる存在になれそうだ。
一方で、小塚崇彦が持っている「高橋を越えるポイント」は、スケーティング。滑りそのものの技術については、ジュニアのころから突出した評価を受けてきた小塚だが、昨年あたりからその技術が、完成の域に近づいてきたようだ。
「佐藤（信夫）先生には『氷に吸いついてるようなスケートを、みんなに見せてあげるように滑りなさい』と言われています。演技後半は疲れてきますが、いつもそのことを心がけて。今シーズンは、試合のたびごとに評価を上げてもらっていることも、実感しています」
かつて彼のスケートは、「玄人受けする」と言われていた。高橋のような派手なアピール力はないが、足元の技術でとことんまで魅せる。だからスケーティングに最大の魅力を感じるジャッジやファンに受ける選手なのだ、と。彼によく贈られていた讃辞は、「すごい」というより「巧い」。その「巧さのスケーティング」が、見る人すべてに快感を覚えさせるまでのクオリティに、この１年で大きく進化しているのだ。
高橋とは全く違うベクトルで「魅せる」スケーターへ。それが世界のジャッジにも認められた結果が、今季のGPシリーズ２連勝であり、ファイナルでの銅メダル獲得だろう。
織田信成はジャンプで、小塚崇彦はスケーティングで、世界トップの実力をつけた今、高橋大輔といえど、下手なミスをすれば全日本チャンピオンの座は危ない。日本の男子シングルはそこまで刺激的な状況になってきている。
グランプリファイナルではパトリック・チャンの後塵を拝しはしたが、日本男子3人ともがそれぞれの得意分野でチャン以上の力を持っているし、またそれぞれがジャンプだけの選手、スケーティングだけの選手というわけでもない。今年は3人全員が世界チャンピオンを狙える……そう言いきれる充実感が、現在の彼らには感じる。
「オリンピックが終わって何人かの選手が抜けて……でも男子のレベルが落ちたとは感じませんね。特に日本では！ みんなが４回転を決めているし、プログラムの内容も濃くなってきている。これは……失敗したものの負け、かな」（高橋）
高橋がこう言うように、楽しみなのが、23日から始まる全日本選手権だ。高橋、織田、小塚の、誰が優勝してもおかしくない。全員世界メダリスト級、誰が勝つかわからない――。そんな、これまでの全日本選手権男子シングルでは味わったことがない、エキサイティングな試合を見ることができるだろう。

description.hltext_display: Borse europee in leggero rialzo. Minimo storico dell'euro sul franco svizzero
description.author: Cronologia articolo22 dicembre
description.content:
Avvio in leggero ribasso per le Borse europee che avviano le contrattazioni appena sopra la parità. e guadagnano circa lo 0,20%. Invariati invece il Dax30 di Francoforte e il Cac40 di Parigi. Poco prima dell'apertura degli scambi sono stati diffusi i dati sui prezzi alle importazioni in Germania, cresciuti in novembre dell'1,2% rispetto al mese precedente, ben al di sopra del rialzo dello 0,5% atteso dagli analisti. Su base annua l'incremento è stato del 10%, anche in questo caso superiore alle attese del consensus (9,3%). Chiusura in lieve ribasso per la che ha risentito del dato deludente sul surplus della bilancia commerciale in novembre (-55% su anno) e ha pagato lo scotto delle prese di beneficio dopo i rialzi degli ultimi giorni. In chiusura il Nikkei 225 ha perso lo 0,23% a 10.346 punti mentre il Topix ha ceduto lo 0,05% a 905,78 punti.
In giornata sono arrivate anche le previsioni sulla crescita del Pil (Prodotto interno lordo) nel 2011, visto in rialzo dell'1,5% ma in netto rallentamento rispetto al +3,1% atteso per il 2010.
C'è attesa per l'apertura dei mercati europei che ieri hanno messo a segno un'altra seduta in convincente rialzo a cui ha fatto seguito la i cui indici sono tornati sui massimi del 2008, sui valori precedenti il crack di . Euro al minimo sul franco svizzero
Sul fronte dei cambi resta debole l'euro, complici le tensioni sul debito dei paesi dell'Eurozona. La divisa europea viene scambiata sopra 1,31 dollari, dopo aver aggiornato il minimo storico sul franco svizzero a 1,2534. L'euro passa di mano a 1,3140 dollari: euro/yen a 109,96 e dollaro/yen a 83,70.

description.hltext_display: Boys Basketball: Franklin's Kessler a cardiac kid
description.content: Senior guard Tyler Kessler buried two 3-pointers within 1.7 seconds to play as Franklin came from behind to take a thrilling 79-78 decision from Hockomock League host Stoughton in overtime.

description.hltext_display: 12月22日病毒播报：木马病毒模拟操控安全软件
description.content:
中国IDC评述网12月22日报道：在今天的病毒里，需要谨慎防范“克隆先生”变种hmc和“密匪”变种mc。
英文名称：Packed.Klone.hmc
中文名称：“克隆先生”变种hmc
病毒长度：178176字节
病毒类型：木马
危险级别：★★
影响平台：Win 9X/ME/NT/2000/XP/2003
MD5 校验：ab7103666a7016771ad7eedf042bf278
特征描述：
Packed.Klone.hmc“克隆先生”变种hmc是“克隆先生”家族中的最新成员之一，采用高级语言编写，经过加壳保护处理。“克隆先生”变种hmc运行后，会在被感染系统的“%SystemRoot%\system32\”文件夹下释放恶意DLL组件“mgking0.dll”、“arking0.dll”以及恶意文件“arking.exe”，还会自我复制到被感染系统的“%SystemRoot%\system32\”文件夹下，重新命名为“mgking0.exe”。以上文件的属性会被设置为“系统、隐藏、只读”。“克隆先生”变种hmc运行时，会将恶意代码插入到系统桌面程序“explorer.exe”进程中隐秘运行，同时在后台执行恶意操作，以此隐藏自我，防止被轻易地查杀。其会通过尝试恢复系统服务描述表（SSDT）的方式试图破坏被感染系统中安全软件的自我保护、系统监视、主动防御等功能，严重影响了这些软件的正常运行，给用户造成了更多的威胁。其还会自动模拟点击某安全软件弹出窗口中的“跳过”和“允许”按钮，以此达到绕过监控的目的。在被感染系统的后台连接骇客指定的远程站点，下载指定的恶意程序并自动调用运行。其所下载的恶意软件可能为网络游戏盗号木马、远程控制后门或恶意广告程序（流氓软件）等，会给用户造成不同程度的损失。另外，“克隆先生”变种hmc会在被感染系统注册表启动项中添加键值，以此实现开机自动运行。

description.hltext_display: Baby Video Monitors - Ways to Get the Most for Your Money
description.content: The baby video monitor is one of those items of baby equipment that most parents who have one would definitely agree is essential. Baby video monitor technology has advanced very quickly and you should take advantage of this. A baby video monitor is an essential item for several reasons. The main one of course is the fact that you can keep an eye on your baby from another room. There are several benefits as a result of this. The first is that if you have heard a noise and you want to find out if your baby needs attention, you don't need to enter the room and disturb your baby. The other is that you can get on with other jobs knowing that you can monitor your baby anytime.As a result you get peace of mind and don't have to worry about whether your baby needs attention or not, the picture tells it all. There is also the advantage that you don't have to get out of bed in the middle of the night. It might be that your baby is just a bit restless. If you were to go into the nursery you run the risk of waking your baby up. Viewing the picture on the monitor on the other hand is straightforward and once you have checked everything is alright, you can go straight back to sleep.There are lots of video baby monitors on the market and it is worthwhile comparing them so that you can choose the monitor that has all the features that you want. For example, some have warning LED lights that illuminate when your baby is crying. This can be an useful eye-catcher in the event that you are watching TV and have turned the volume of the monitor down. Another great feature available with some models is the ability to remotely turn lullabies on with the music acting as a calming influence that will help settle your baby. It is recommended to get a handheld monitor that you can easily carry around your home. Some come with belt clips which are ideal for ensuring you are never far from the equipment.Don't worry about watching pictures while the light is turned off. Some models have night vision which uses a couple of low power LED lights to provide a very soft light in the nursery. The camera technology will handle the low ambient light and will still present you with a clear picture, albeit black and white in this mode. Pictures will revert to color when there is sufficient brightness.One crucial issue to mention concerns signal quality and reception. You must only buy a video baby monitor from one of the top brands such as Summer Infant or Philips. These have the best signal reception performance and are less likely to be susceptible to interference. In fact if I had to recommend a particular model, I would probably go for the Summer Infant Day and Night Handheld Color Video Monitor. This has a 1.8-inch screen that provides superb pictures of your precious baby. Rechargeable batteries in the handheld unit allow you to move around your home without difficulty.No matter which baby video monitor you buy, you will never tire of watching your beautiful baby as he or she rests.

description.hltext_display: 熱刺拒放莫迪歷投車路士
description.author: Tong Mu
description.content:
車路士� �隊安察洛� �希望簽下莫迪歷，但安察洛� �的如意算盤只打了一天就告失敗。熱刺主席列維強調，莫迪歷這樣� �心球員是非賣品。 媒體分析指出，作為熱刺的當家球星，莫迪歷的身價已比當初有了大幅度的上漲。在當下這個轉會市� �裡，車仔不掏出3000萬鎊，� �本無法與熱刺談轉會。不過，聽聞車仔對莫迪歷感興趣，熱刺的主席列維很快就做出了回應：「我不會甩賣任何的� �級球員。」 從熱刺最近兩年的運營來看，車仔想如當年的曼聯和利物浦那樣扮演挖角者的角色已不現實。如今的熱刺已躋身歐聯賽� �，而且主席列維的資金供給非常及時。 莫迪歷是非賣品，但手拿高薪卻無法打上正選的羅比� �尼卻是可以離隊的球員。《每日電訊� �》透露，羅比� �尼的轉會申請已獲得了老列納的批准。而韋斯咸、伯明翰、愛華� �和維拉都對該位愛爾蘭人虎視眈眈。除了羅比� �尼，後備球員奧哈拉亦將於一月離隊，他的目的地也可能是韋斯咸。
更多新聞： 車路士明夏收購� �號目標曝光 艾迪巴約唔肯走要爭正選 熱刺欲1500萬求購紐卡� 射手 車路士� �隊安察洛� �希望簽下莫迪歷，但安察洛� �的如意算盤只打了一天就告失敗……

description.hltext_display: Petranského sa chcú zbaviť
description.content:
diskutujteVYTLAČIŤ UPOZORNITE NA CHYBU Pošlite: E-MAILOM na facebook VYBRALI.SME | ďalšie Začala sa diskusia o fungovaní Ústavu pamäti národa. Výsledkom bude zrejme aj výmena jeho šéfa, nominanta SNS.
BRATISLAVA. Ústav pamäti národa pod vedením Ivana Petranského si neplní svoje poslanie, zločiny komunizmu prestali byť hlavnou témou.
K takémuto záveru dospela v pondelok pracovná skupina expertov, ktorú zvolala premiérka Iveta Radičová. Komisia má zefektívniť činnosť ústavu a nadviazať na časy, keď ho viedol Ján Langoš.
„Chceme, aby mal ústav ako inštitúcia väčšiu autoritu. Jeho výstupy by mali mať preventívny, represívny aj sankčný dosah," povedal člen skupiny, poslanec KDH Pavol Hrušovský.
Napríklad, ak ústav o niekom zverejní, že vedome spolupracoval s komunistickým alebo s fašistickým režimom, nemal by už pôsobiť vo verejnej funkcii.
Aj Pelíšky priniesli viac
Hrušovskému sa tiež nepáči, že ústav sa viac zaoberá slovenským štátom, od ktorého navyše nemá dostatočný odstup.
So smerovaním ústavu nie je spokojný ani ďalší člen skupiny, poslanec SaS Jozef Viskupič. „Jiří Kodet, ktorý vo filme Pelíšky z okna kričí: Proletári všetkých krajín, vylížte si prdel, urobil z hľadiska vyrovnania sa s komunizmom oveľa viac ako ÚPN za posledné štyri roky."
Komunizmus je podľa Viskupiča veľkou traumou, keďže ide o zločinecký režim, ktorý má na svedomí veľa ľudských životov. „O tomto by mal ústav oveľa viac hovoriť. "
Odborníci ÚPN, ktorí sú tiež členmi skupiny, nechceli priebeh stretnutia komentovať. „Z diskusie mám výborný pocit. Verím, že dospejeme k riešeniu, ktoré zefektívni činnosť ústavu dovnútra aj navonok. Myslím, že zhoda bude veľmi rýchla," povedal podpredseda správnej rady ústavu Ján Ondriaš.
„Bolo to prvé stretnutie, najbližšie sa zídeme okolo 10. januára. Zhodli sme sa na potrebe zmeny," hovorí člen dozornej rady ústavu Ladislav Bukovszky.
O výmene Petranského (na snímke), ktorého do funkcie nominovala SNS, sa na stretnutí nehovorilo. „Najskôr treba pripraviť kvalitnú novelu zákona, až potom môžeme diskutovať o osobách," tvrdí Viskupič.
Výsledkom rokovaní však zrejme bude aj zmena šéfa ústavu. „Petranský má v odborných kruhoch podporu len časti historikov. Na čele ÚPN by mala byť výraznejšia osobnosť," povedal v septembri predseda KDH Ján Figeľ.
Podobný názor má aj poslanec Smeru Dušan Čaplovič. „ÚPN je jednostranný, chýba mu určitá vyváženosť."
Kto nahradí Petranského?
Ústavu sa zastal poslanec SNS Rafael Rafaj. „Koalícia asi potrebuje aj do ÚPN umiestniť svoje nomenklatúrne kádre."
Uvažovalo sa, že novým šéfom ÚPN by sa mohol stať František Mikloško. Ten to však odmietol.
Petranský pripomína, že členovia komisie, ktorí „boli označení za expertov, sú v skutočnosti nominantmi koaličných strán".
„Chcem veriť, že skutočným cieľom komisie nemá byť účelová novela zákona, ktorá by znamenala začiatok konca nezávislosti tejto inštitúcie," povedal šéf ÚPN.

description.hltext_display: A number of Reasons Why Bamboo Treatments Can Make Your House Considerably More Cozy
description.content: Bamboo blinds are used tremendously outside the house to be able to protect from the sunlight patios or maybe your deck. Most of these blinds are often manufactured in China, because of this they are not very expensive. This kind of shutters are usually made via slicing bamboo stems top to bottom creating lengthy branches if hooked up width wise.What's intriguing to be aware of would be the fact that bamboo shades will make any kind of house seem considerably more remarkable as well as intriguing with all the cozy atmosphere they could offer for an area. Among the most popular styles regarding interior room decoration this coming year happens to be an eco-friendly, renewable product which may be transformed into a variety of goods. In case your office or home is really Asian manufactured, then selecting shades that are made from bamboo is the foremost approach to take. Me personally, We installed this type of blinds simultaneously in the home as well as office and now we are really satisfied.Do you like the concept regarding using components from your outside on the inside to coat the house's windows? In this instance these kind of blinds are a fantastic choice intended for you. Bamboo blinds are usually a cheap approach to decorate your living space using strong wood, integrating a cozy degree to your house or other places which you consider upgrading. Perhaps you have thought about that? Were you aware that you could protect yourself from the sun light by utilizing these kind of amazing shades?Despite the fact that bamboo blinds are usually acquired in their specific typical pigmentation, that color choice could vary out of gentle yellow-colored dark brown closer to a highly golden. Adding to the bamboo blind's attractiveness is actually the ability to provide strong heat maintaining material as well as separate out light to provide an area a brand new muted atmosphere. Purchasing bamboo shades is usually a wise expense choice when you realize that these kind of natural window blinds will definitely transform your residence or even apartment to make it much more secure and quiet.Many people are trying to purchase this kind of blinds. So just how come actually bamboo this sort of great anti warmth solution to choose? Initially, bamboo may be gathered just after not too long, as opposed to real wood that will demand fourteen or maybe a lot more years so as to develop fully. One of the terrific advantages of bamboo window shades is that they are usually much more beneficial to the environment when compared with vinyl as well as timber blinds. Bamboo window shades are a fantastic substitute for common material blinds.Bamboo window treatments are the environmentally friendly strategy for combining protection from the sun's rays for your living space as well as deliver that special spotlight to your lounge room, living room or maybe bedroom. Surprisingly, many of these shutters are an amazing alternative to the common shades that almost all of us got used to.

description.hltext_display: US slaps fresh sanctions on Iran
description.content: The United States has slapped fresh sanctions on Iran for the latters refusal to roll back its nuclear-missile programme, and also for Tehrans support for the Lebanon-based Hezbollah extremist group. The US Department of the Treasury says that it has blacklisted another five Iranian companies, namely two banks, an insurance company and two shipping companies. The United Nations imposed its latest sanctions on Iran in spring this year. Tehran rejects the international communitys suspicions of that it has been secretly developing nuclear weapons.

description.hltext_display: China: Robot waiter service 'better than humans'
description.author: Ken Teh
description.content:
SERVICE with a smile also comes with an electronic voice at the Dalu Robot restaurant, where the hotpot meals are not as famous yet as the staff who never lose their patience and never take tips. The restaurant, which opened this month in Jinan in northern Shandong province, is touted as China's first robot hotpot eatery where robots resembling Star Wars droids circle the room carrying trays of food in a conveyor belt-like system.
More than a dozen robots operate in the restaurant as entertainers, servers, greeters and receptionists. Each robot has a motion sensor that tells it to stop when someone is in its path so customers can reach for dishes they want.
The service industry in China has not always kept up with the country's rapid economic growth, and can be quite basic in some restaurants, leading customers in the Dalu restaurant to praise the robots. "They have a better service attitude than humans," said Li Xiaomei, 35, who was visiting the restaurant for the first time. "Humans can be temperamental or impatient, but they don't feel tired, they just keep working and moving round and round the restaurant all night." Inspired by space exploration, robot technology and global innovation, the restaurant's owner, Zhang Yongpei, said he hopes his restaurant will show the world China is a serious competitor in developing technology.
As customers enter the dimly lit restaurant lined with blinking neon lights to simulate a futuristic environment, a female robot decorated with batting eyelashes greets people with an electronic "welcome". During the meal, crowds of up to 100 customers, are entertained by a dancing and talking robot that looks more like a mannequin with a dress, flapping its arms around in a stiff motion.
Mr Zhang said he hopes to roll out 30 robots - which cost $6000 each - in the coming months and eventually develop robots with human-like qualities that serve customers at their table and can walk up and down the stairs.

中国IDC评述网12月22日报道：亚太互联网络信息中心（APNIC）首席科学家Geoff Huston 专门为展示全球互联网IPv4地址剩下可以分配的地址数量网站显示，到北京时间2010年12月21日1时28分止，仅剩下约8600万个IP地址（2%）。预测58天内，即至2011年2月20日止，余下的最后7块265大的IPv4地址块将分配完毕，42年前启用的IPv4互联网40亿个地址池中，将彻底分配完，今后全球互联网用户再需要用IP地址，在所有IPv4地址在电信运营商（ISP）手中己经没有备用地址后，只能使用IPv6地址。

description.hltext_display: Biggest storm yet heads for Calif; homes evacuated
description.content:
LOS ANGELES -- After days of relentless rain, Southern California is awaiting the most intense storm system yet, with evacuations ordered, rescue crews on standby and residents anxiously eyeing already saturated mountainsides denuded by wildfires.
Forecasters expected more rain across the state Wednesday, but the focus clearly was on Southern California where a monster storm was expected to bring torrential rain, thunderstorms, flooding, hail and possible tornadoes and water spouts. Forecasters warned of possible rainfall rates of .75 inch to 1 inch an hour and thunderstorm rates of 2 inches an hour in the region.
Steady rain began falling late Tuesday and was expected to intensify into early Wednesday.
"It's going to be a three-ring circus," said National Weather Service spokesman Bill Hoffer. "There's going to be a six-hour time frame in the early morning when it's really going to be dumping on us."
Officials on Tuesday ordered evacuation of 232 homes in La Canada Flintridge and La Crescenta, foothill suburbs of Los Angeles below steep hillsides that burned in 2009 and where mudslides inundated homes and backyards in February.
Walt Kalepsch said his backyard filled up with mud and debris last winter, but he planned to stay the night with his wife and daughter.
"If it gets really terrible, we'll leave. But we've been evacuated so many times, it's like the city's crying wolf," he said. "During the rest of the year, it's absolutely gorgeous. It was just one big wildfire that changed everything."
As the "Pineapple Express" system swept Pacific Ocean moisture across Nevada, Arizona and Utah, Gov. Arnold Schwarzenegger declared a state of emergency in six counties.
The huge and powerful low pressure system off the West Coast pushed precipitation right into the Great Basin.
"It takes a lot of energy to push that moisture over the mountains," said NWS meteorologist Dave Bruno. "This kind of storm could march right across the country and create a lot of bad weather along the way. It could affect the Southern Plains on Thursday and Friday. If it sticks together it'll hit Florida by Saturday."
With rain falling up and down the state, Sierra Nevada ski resorts boasted of record-breaking December snowfall, with the storms bringing a total of 10 1/2 to 15 1/2 feet to Mammoth Mountain.
Rescuers had to pluck some stranded motorists from rain-swollen creeks. Shoppers dodged puddles while buying last-minute Christmas gifts. Disney resorts canceled a plan to shower visitors with artificial snow.

description.hltext_display: Макаревича продвинут на место Собянина. Макаревич выдвинут в совет директоров Первого канала
description.content:
Теги: ТВ, Макаревич Андрей, Собянин Сергей
Андрей Макаревич может заменить Собянина на его предыдущей должности
В письме Минкомсвязи за подписью заместителя министра Александра Жарова, адресованном Федеральному агентству по управлению госимуществом, содержится предложение по новому составу совета директоров ОАО «Первый канал». Как стало известно «Коммерсанту», список кандидатов планируется утвердить на собрании акционеров компании в 2011 году.
Причиной изменения состава совета директоров стало назначение Сергея Собянина мэром Москвы. Ранее он возглавлял совет директоров «Первого», представляя интересы правительства. На место нынешнего градоначальника столицы Минкомсвязи рекомендует министра Игоря Щеголева с полномочиями председателя совета директоров телекомпании. Кроме того, вместо первого вице-губернатора Ханты-Мансийского автономного округа Ильи Петрова выдвинут известный музыкант, лидер группы «Машина времени» Андрей Макаревич, сообщает ER-Portal.ru.
В остальном состав прежний: заместитель главы администрации президента РФ Алексей Громов, заместитель министра связи Александр Жаров, кинорежиссер Никита Михалков, ректор МГИМО Анатолий Торкунов, глава «Мосфильма» Карен Шахназаров, гендиректор «Первого канала» Константин Эрнст и его заместитель Кирилл Клейменов. Представителей частных акционеров, которые контролируют 49% акций «Первого канала», в этом списке нет.
Между тем, в ноябре начальник управления по информационной политике компании Millhouse Джон Манн заявил, что этот пакет акций принадлежит структурам Романа Абрамовича. Впрочем, в списке кандидатов еще могут произойти изменения. Утверждение кандидатов происходит в правительстве. Год назад распоряжение об изменениях в совете директоров «Первого канала» подписывал лично Владимир Путин.

description.hltext_display: Firma Obama derogación de prohibición a militares gays
description.author: emorales
description.content:
"¡Este día ha llegado!", exclamó eufórico Mike Almy, un mayor de la Fuerza Aérea que fue dado de baja hace cuatro años cuando se supo cuál era su orientación sexual.
Washington.- En cumplimiento de una promesa de campaña y reafirmando su convicción de que se trata de básicos derechos humanos, el presidente Barack Obama firmará el miércoles una histórica ley que permite que los homosexuales sirvan en las fuerzas armadas de Estados Unidos sin tener que ocultar su orientación sexual como hasta ahora.
Era tan voluminoso el número de defensores de los derechos gays y activistas demócratas que se prevé asistirán a la ceremonia de la firma de la ley, que la Casa Blanca ha adaptado un auditorio más grande en el Departamento del Interior.
"¡Este día ha llegado!", exclamó eufórico Mike Almy, un mayor de la Fuerza Aérea que fue dado de baja hace cuatro años cuando se supo cuál era su orientación sexual. "La prohibición ha quedado atrás y uno ya no tiene que sacrificar su identidad", destacó.
Aunque el júbilo es real, los funcionarios del Pentágono advirtieron que podría ser prematuro, en vista de que la ley dice que el presidente y sus principales asesores militares deben certificar que eliminar la prohibición de ejercer siendo abiertamente gay no perjudicará la capacidad de lucha de las tropas, tal como afirman sus detractores. Luego de eso, habrá un período de espera de 60 días para el ejército.
Además se deben completar las directrices sobre el asunto integralmente, a fin de abarcar una serie de preguntas prácticas, desde cómo educar a la tropas hasta cómo se debe manejar la orientación sexual al hacer las asignaciones en los cuarteles militares.
Aunque los funcionarios han evitado establecer una cronología, el proceso podría tomar meses. Sin embargo para los gays y lesbianas estadounidenses el miércoles es un día decisivo. Y para Obama, es un día para deleitarse por el logro de un objetivo que buscaba desde hace mucho.
Asimismo se trata de la segunda de tres victorias en lo que se convirtió para Obama, una etapa sorprendentemente productiva en las últimas semanas del cierre de la actual legislatura. Semanas después de lo que calificó de "paliza" en las elecciones de noviembre, Obama tiene una aprobación parcial sobre su compromiso para reducir los impuestos con los republicanos del Senado, y el Senado se apresta a cumplir con el principal objetivo de su política exterior: la ratificación de un nuevo tratado de armas atómicas con Rusia.
La decisión de anular la ley desató críticas de inmediato de quienes consideran que el ejército no debería ser usado para ampliar los derechos de los gays y que el permitirles ejercer abiertamente perjudicará la moral de los soldados y su unidad en las operaciones militares.
Pero activistas que apoyaban la abolición de la ley calificaron la votación del Senado como un hecho histórico.
Aaron Belkin, director del Centro Palm en California —que estudia el asunto de los soldados gays— dijo que la votación "marca el comienzo de una nueva era en la cual el principal empleador de Estados Unidos trata a los gays y lesbianas como seres humanos".
Por miles de años, dijo, uno de los requisitos para ser ciudadano de primera en cualquier nación es el derecho a ejercer en el ejército, y la votación del sábado "es un paso histórico hacia eso".
Al menos 25 naciones permiten que gays expresen abiertamente su sexualidad en el ejército, inclusive Gran Bretaña, Canadá e Israel, según el Centro Palm.
La derogación de la ley, que fue producto de un compromiso entre el presidente Bill Clinton y un reacio Pentágono hace 17 años, significa que por primera vez en la historia de Estados Unidos, los gays serán aceptados públicamente en el ejército y podrán reconocer su orientación sexual sin temer ser expulsados.
Más de 13.500 miembros de la institución fueron destituidos bajo la ley desde que fue aprobada en 1993. Antes de eso, los gays habían tenido explícitamente prohibido el servicio militar desde la Primera Guerra Mundial."¡Este día ha llegado!", exclamó eufórico Mike Almy, un mayor de la Fuerza Aérea que fue dado de baja hace cuatro años cuando se supo cuál era su orientación sexual.

description.hltext_display: Girls basketball: Duda's late jumper fuels Framingham
description.content: Senior forward Rachael Duda hit a game-winning 15-footer with 10 seconds left in overtime to lift Framingham over Weymouth 53-51 in a thrilling Bay State Conference girls basketball matchup last night.

description.hltext_display: Nuova era per le regole internet: la Fcc americana vara la neutralità della rete. Ecco cosa significa
description.author: di Alessandro Longo
description.content:
Ieri gli Stati Uniti hanno posto la prima pietra di una internet futura: Fcc (Federal communications commission, l'Authority tlc Usa) ha approvato, di misura, la legge sulla , attesa da due anni. Segna un nuovo corso per l'internet mondiale: l'era delle regole, per stabilire che cosa gli operatori possono e non possono fare, con il traffico dei propri utenti e con quelle delle aziende web. Da una parte, le nuove regole portano una tutela più forte dei diritti degli utenti; dall'altra, autorizzano la nascita di una rete a più velocità. Sono questi i due aspetti contrapposti del regolamento che Fcc ha approvato tre voti contro due (, a partire dal minuto 40). Voluto dai democratici e osteggiato con forza, fino all'ultimo, dai repubblicani (in minoranza). Un regolamento che il presidente di Fcc, Julius Genachowsky, ha presentato sotto la bandiera dell'urgenza di difendere internet e di mantenerla libera e aperta, a sostegno della democrazia e del mercato. Ma per gli stessi valori i repubblicani si sono opposti, sostenendo che le nuove regole soffocheranno internet, danneggiando l'innovazione e l'economia. I punti di vista sono opposti appunto perché è la prima volta che un grande Paese occidentale pone leggi di questo tipo, i cui effetti restano quindi dubbi. L'incertezza è dovuta anche all'articolato della norma, che contiene principi a favore sia dei consumatori sia degli operatori, cercando di tenere insieme diritti e richieste di entrambe le parti. . 1) Principio della trasparenza. Tutti gli operatori banda larga (fissi e mobili) dovranno dire agli utenti e agli innovatori (cioè aziende di servizi web) come gestiscono il traffico, le caratteristiche prestazionali del servizio e i termini commerciali dell'offerta. Al momento, gli operatori (americani ed europei) lasciano oscuri alcuni di questi aspetti.
2) Niente blocchi. Gli operatori banda larga fissi non potranno bloccare applicazioni, servizi, terminali non dannosi alla rete e contenuti legali. Fcc vuole così evitare due situazioni: che gli operatori impediscano agli utenti di accedere a certi contenuti; oppure che chiedano ai fornitori un pedaggio per traghettare i loro dati fino agli utenti.

description.hltext_display: Holmen: Holmen tecknar avtal med Vattenfall om elleverans
description.content:
Holmen tecknar avtal med Vattenfall om elleverans
Holmen och Vattenfall har tecknat ett nytt långsiktigt avtal om
elleveranser. Överenskommelsen innebär att Holmen under en sexårsperiod
- med start 2016 - köper cirka 0,9 TWh el årligen av Vattenfall,
motsvarande cirka 30 procent av Holmens köpbehov av elkraft.
Holmen är till cirka en tredjedel självförsörjande på elenergi genom
produktion i hel- eller delägda vattenkraftverk samt mottrycksproduktion
vid bruken. Koncernens elförbrukning i Sverige uppgick 2009 till cirka
3,9 TWh.
- Detta är ett viktigt avtal för Holmen, som verkar i en omvärld där
osäkerheten om framtida elförsörjning är stor, säger Holmens VD och
koncernchef Magnus Hall. Vi är glada
över att kunna utöka vårt långvariga och goda samarbete med
Vattenfall.
- Långsiktig energiförsörjning och effektiv förbrukning
är viktiga faktorer för våra kunder i basindustrin. Vi gläder oss därför
mycket åt att ha fått Holmens fortsatta förtroende i
detta samarbete, säger Torbjörn Wahlborg, chef Vattenfall Norden.
______________________________________________________________________
För ytterligare information, kontakta:
Brynolf Alexandersson, Holmen Energi , tel 076-110 55 01
Torbjörn Wahlborg, vVD Vattenfall AB och chef Vattenfall Norden, tel
08-739 51 71
Ingela Carlsson, informationsdirektör, Holmen, tel 070-212 9712
Mikael Björnér, pressekreterare Vattenfall Norden, tel 073-054 8229
I egenskap av utgivare offentliggör Holmen AB enligt 17 kap. lagen
(2007:528) om värdepappersmarknaden informationen i detta
pressmeddelande. Informationen lämnades till medierna för
offentliggörande onsdagen den 22 december 2010 kl. 08.30.
------------------------------------------------------------

http://www.cisionwire.se/holmen/holmen-tecknar-avtal-med-vattenfall-om-elleverans69013

description.hltext_display: 런던 전기동 매점사태 "현물 90% 단일투자자 보유"
description.author: UNTIE
description.content:
[뉴스핌=노종빈기자] 국제 상품시장에서 구리에 대한 매집사태가 발생한 것으로 나타나 관계당국이 정밀 조사에 들어갔다고 월스트리트저널(WSJ)이 지난 21일 보도했다.
현재 단일 투자자가 런던금속거래소 측이 보관하고 있는 현물 구리 물량의 80%내지 90%를 보유하고 있는 것으로 나타났다.
이는 글로벌 상품 거래소의 전체 구리 현물 거래물량의 절반 가량에 이르는 것이며 거래가액으로는 무려 30억 달러(약 3조 4665억원)에 이르는 막대한 규모다.
21일 런던 상품거래소에서 거래된 구리 선물 3개월물은 톤당 9353.50 달러를 기록해 전일 대비 1.6% 상승했다.
뉴욕상품거래소에서 구리가격도 파운드당 4.2705 달러를 기록하면서 연중 최고치를 기록했다. 올해들어서만 28.3% 상승한 상태다.
이날 상품가격이 강세를 나타내면서 미국 뉴욕증시도 상승세를 보였다.
뉴욕증시 다우지수는 전일대비 0.48% 오른 11533.16을 기록, 지난 2008년 8월 이래 최고수준을 기록했다.
시장에서는 미국 투자은행인 JP모간이 최근 대규모로 구리 매매포지션을 변동한 것으로 나타났지만 실제로 JP모간이 대규모 구리 포지션을 보유하고 있는 상태인지는 확인되지 않았다.
금속시장 분석업체인 리졸브드의 데이비드 트레켈드 대표는 "누가 포지션을 들고 있는지는 중요하지 않고 현재 정밀 조사가 진행중인 상황"이라고 말했다.
구리 이외에도 알루미늄의 경우도 런던 거래소 보유 현물 물량의 90%를 단일 투자자가 매집하고 있는 것으로 나타났다.
또한 니켈과 아연, 알루미늄합금괴의 현물 거래 물량도 단일 투자자가 50% 에서 80% 물량을 매집한 것으로 나타났다.
이에 따라 런던상품거래소(LME) 측은 이같은 매집의 동기가 무엇인지를 조사할 것으로 보인다.
이같은 물량의 대부분은 중개기관이 고객을 위해 물량을 확보한 것으로 관측되지만 이로 인해 시장가격이 왜곡되었을 가능성도 제기되고 있다.
최근 글로벌 경제 회복세가 지속될 것으로 전망되면서 상품시장으로는 막대한 자금이 현물 매입 또는 상장지수펀드(ETF) 매수 형태로 몰려들고 있는 상태다.
LME 측은 현재 개별 포지션 거래상황을 면밀히 주시하고 있다고 밝혔다.
LME는 현재 단일 투자자가 보유할 수 있는 포지션 규모에는 제한을 두지 않고 있으나 이를 통해 가격을 왜곡할 경우에는 엄격한 규제를 적용하고 있는 상황이다.
반면 미국 상품거래소 규제당국은 선물 거래에서 일정 계약 이상을 보유할 경우 이를 제한하는 조치를 검토 중인 것으로 알려졌다.
바클레이스 캐피탈의 분석에 따르면 글로벌 구리 시장에서 올해 수요는 공급을 이미 45만 5000톤이나 초과한 것으로 관측되고 있다.
바클레이스는 지난 2월부터 구리 재고량이 감소하기 시작했던 것으로 나타났다고 밝혔다.
이같은 구리 수요 급증의 원인은 중국과 브라질, 미국 등의 구리 소비가 크게 늘어난데다 또한 ETF 신규 거래가 늘어나면서 현물 결제를 위한 구리 보유량이 크게 증가했기 때문으로 풀이되고 있다.
MF 글로벌의 에드워드 메이어 애널리스트에 따르면 지난 10월 알루미늄 시장에서도 LME 현물 보유량의 70% 가 매집된 것으로 분석됐다.
LME 측은 알루미늄의 경우 현재 4만3000톤 가량을 현물로 보유하고 있는 상황이다.
최근 선물가격이 급등하면서 높은 가격에 선물 포지션을 팔고 이보다 낮은 가격에 현물로 결제해 차익을 챙기려는 시도도 늘어나고 있는 것으로 관측된다.
트레켈드 대표는 "구리를 현물로 매입하는 것은 보험료와 금융비용, 창고비용 등을 추가부담하게 된다"며 "결국 최후에 누군가는 급등한 가격에 물량을 사들일 수 있는 매수자를 찾아야 할 것"이라고 말했다.
[뉴스핌 Newspim]노종빈 기자 (untie@newspim.com)

description.hltext_display: Forex: USD/JPY recovery capped at 83.85/90
description.content:
FXstreet.com (Barcelona) - Dollar downtrend from 84.40/50 resistance area, tested last week, extended yesterday to 83.50 low, and the pair bounced up on US session to find resistance at 83.85.90, and pullback in Asia to 83.65 session low.
The pair broke out through the near-term wedge pattern, according to Ian Coleman, technical analyst at FXstreet.com, although there is still room for further decline: "Impulsive break higher out of the wedge formation after reaching 61.8% retracement of the last move higher. The move lower has reached 50% but there is no indication that the correction is complete yet. We could move down to 8365 or 8355 (breakout line) before the next leg higher"
On the upside, the pair should break above 83.90 to add upside pressure: "A move above 8390 and I expect a break of the highs at 8455 (I am long from 8355)."

description.hltext_display: Opera releases WAC-ready widget runtime for Android
description.content:
Tweet Today, Opera Software introduced its new widget runtime platform for Google?s Android operating system. The runtime will support the new (WAC) 1.0 Specification.
WAC is an alliance of the world?s leading mobile operators and OEMs, such as Vodafone, Verizon, China Mobile, Telenor, Telefonica, AT&T, Samsung, Huawei and others, working together to define, create and deploy a common mobile application platform. Uniting a fragmented applications marketplace, WAC will create an open industry platform that benefits the entire ecosystem, including applications developers, handset manufacturers, OS owners, network operators and end users.
This alpha release of Opera?s widget runtime for Android allows developers to get a head start in developing the next step in applications for smartphones. At the same time, the WAC implementation serves as a platform for distribution. ?It is a great pleasure for us to present our public implementation of the WAC 1.0 specification and to get developers going,? said Christen Krogh, Chief Developer Officer, Opera Software. ?Opera is participating in WAC and remains committed to take the WAC platform to the masses.? With the Widget runtime for Android, Opera enters a natural arena for its popular widget system. Currently, Opera has implemented cross-device widgets on the Opera desktop browser, Opera Mobile and Opera for devices. ?We are delighted that Opera is supporting WAC 1.0 with its new widget runtime? commented Peters Suh, CEO, WAC, ?In the year since WAC was announced at Mobile World Congress in 2010 we have consistently hit our deadlines, and this announcement underlines that we are on schedule to launch WAC 1.0 devices and storefronts at Mobile World Congress 2011.? To start developing widgets and begin implementing the WAC APIs, simply go to http://www.opera.com/download/get.pl?sub=++++&id=33389&location=270&nothanks=yes and download the runtime.
Instructions can be found at: http://labs.opera.com/docs/wac/installation_instructions/ This runtime is provided for evaluation and demo purposes and is free of charge for all developers.
Read more about the WAC specifications here: http://www.wacapps.net/
About Opera Software ASA
Opera Software ASA has redefined web browsing for PCs, mobile phones and other networked devices. Opera’s cross-platform web-browser technology is renowned for its performance, standards compliance and small size, while giving users a faster, safer and more dynamic online experience. Opera Software is headquartered in Oslo, Norway, with offices around the world. The company is listed on the Oslo Stock Exchange under the ticker symbol OPERA. Learn more about Opera at http://www.opera.com/.

event_or_fact.property: It is a great pleasure for us to present our public implementation of the WAC 1.0 specification and to get developers going,?
Chief Developer Officer, Opera Software ASA

description.hltext_display: CSU's Ogide excited for chance to play former school Ole Miss
description.author: Natalie Meisler
description.content:
FORT COLLINS Andy Ogide circled two dates going into his senior season at Colorado State. The first is Thursday's potential second-round matchup with Mississippi in the Cancun Governor's Cup. The second comes next May, when he picks up his MBA.
"(Playing Mississippi) has been marked on my calendar since I found out they were in the tournament," said Ogide, who left the Ole Miss program after his freshman season. "I'm excited and can't wait to get a chance to play them."
Ogide left Oxford, Miss., after the 2006-07 season, disappointed with his playing time. He was one of six players to leave in what Ogide called "a mass exodus."
After regrets about Mississippi prompted the transfer, Ogide admits to misgivings his first year in Fort Collins.
"It's hard when you are not playing and you are losing on top of that and (CSU) didn't have a big man," the 6-foot-9 forward said of the Rams' winless league slate in 2007-08. "It was definitely tough, but I think I made the right decision now."
The graduate degree wouldn't have been possible without the transfer. Ogide finished his undergrad degree last spring. Instead of relaxing as a senior and taking a handful of meaningless credits, he started a master's program with a full load of 15 hours.
Had he stayed in the SEC, "I could have started (grad school) but I wouldn't have been able to finish it," he said.
It is difficult to tell who is prouder of his four B's and one A, Ogide or coach Tim Miles. Ask Miles the best story line of his team, and he talks about Ogide's grades. Miles usually has to cajole players into making the cut academically.
Ogide remains CSU's biggest threat. His team-leading averages of 16.3 points and 7.3 rebounds each rank third in the Mountain West Conference. He's first in the MWC with 61 percent shooting.
"He's a heck of a player," Northern Colorado coach B.J. Hill said Monday after CSU's 75-61 defeat of the Bears. Ogide had a relatively quiet night of 13 points and five boards.
To set up the Mississippi pairing, CSU must clear Appalachian State (4-4) today and hot-scoring guard Donald Sims. Mississippi (7-2) is expected to beat Texas State (2-7). The final takes place on Christmas Eve, with consolations earlier in the day.
Ogide does not have any close friends left on the Rebels' roster, only a few acquaintances. The coaching staff is largely unchanged.
If it all works out, Ole Miss coach Andy Kennedy's words in the 2007 season prospectus may come back to haunt him: "Ogide's length and versatility will allow him to help us at multiple positions in the frontcourt."
Natalie Meisler: 303-954-1295 or nmeisler@denverpost.com

description.hltext_display: A Pre-Engineered Metal Building - Use It to Add Space and Save Money
description.content:
Share
It's something you may have never thought of - using metal buildings or free standing mezzanines to add space to your business or industrial area. If you need more room, but want to save money and time, metal buildings and free standing mezzanines could be the perfect solution.
Metal buildings have become a popular option for business in the agriculture, manufacturing, and industrial industries. They are all made in advance. Instead of being constructed from scratch at your site, a pre-engineered metal building arrives at your business in segments. A professional crew simply assembles the building, and it is ready to use.
If you hate trying to work with noisy equipment, inconvenient trucks parked everywhere, and a loud construction crew building things for months on end, investing in metal buildings can end your frustration. They can be up and running in a fraction of the time of a traditional building. You don't have to worry about cement drying. You don't have to worry about drywall getting everywhere. You don't have to worry about costly construction delays. Metal buildings make the entire construction experience much easier.
And, as an added benefit, a pre-engineered metal building is also much cheaper than a custom-built facility. Think about how expensive it would be to have to construct a brand new building - or, worse, have to move to a totally different facility. By getting a pre-engineered metal building, you can get extra space - without spending a ton of extra cash or dealing with the inconvenience of moving to a new place.
But it's not all about adding extra buildings. Free standing mezzanines can go in the interior of your facility - to add some much-needed room on the inside.
Think about your facility. Does it seem like everything is cluttered on the floor - with a great deal of wasted space at the top? With material handling equipment, you can add offices or storage space well above floor level - creating double or even triple the work space.
How?
Material handling equipment is a steel apparatus that is fully self-contained. It can be assembled in virtually any size or shape. Plus, material handling equipment is completely secure - meaning that you can store heavy items or use the area as an office, without worrying that your safety is at risk.

description.hltext_display: Karo Bio: KARO BIOS FÖRETRÄDESEMISSION FULLTECKNAD
description.content:
Stockholm den 22 december 2010 - Karo Bio ABs (publ) (Reuters: KARO.ST)
företrädesemission om cirka 325 miljoner kronor fulltecknades.
Sammanlagt 228 361 055 aktier, motsvarande 98,3 procent av de nya
aktierna, tecknades med stöd av teckningsrätter. Det har även inkommit
anmälningar motsvarande teckning av ytterligare 103 288 239 aktier,
motsvarande cirka 44 procent av emissionen och 145 miljoner kronor, utan
stöd av teckningsrätter.
Karo Bios styrelse har beslutat om tilldelning av de 3 877 328 aktier,
motsvarande 1,7 procent av totalt antal nya aktier, som inte blivit
tecknade med stöd av teckningsrätter, enligt de principer som angivits i
prospektet som publicerades den 25 november 2010. På grund av att en så
stor del av företrädesemissionen tecknats med stöd av teckningsrätter
och det stora intresset för att teckna aktier utan teckningsrätter, har
en gräns för tilldelning av aktier som tecknats utan stöd av
teckningsrätter satts vid 500 nya aktier, det vill säga inga aktieposter
om färre än 500 nya aktier har tilldelats utan stöd av teckningsrätter.
Personer som fått tilldelning av aktier tecknade utan stöd av
teckningsrätter kommer att informeras genom tilldelningsbesked i form av
en avräkningsnota som utfärdas idag.
Personer som har tecknat aktier med stöd av teckningsrätter har fått
betalda tecknade aktier (BTA) inbokade på sina VP-konton. BTA omvandlas
till vanliga aktier när nyemissionen registrerats av Bolagsverket,
vilket förväntas ske omkring den 27 december 2010. En andra serie av BTA
(BTA 2) kommer att omvandlas till vanliga aktier när en slutlig
registrering gjorts hos Bolagsverket, vilket beräknas ske omkring den 7
januari 2011.
De aktier som tecknats med stöd av teckningsrätter förväntas tas upp
till handel på NASDAQ OMX Stockholm den 29 december 2010. De aktier som
har tecknats utan stöd av teckningsrätter förväntas tas upp till handel
den 10 januari 2011.
Företrädesemissionen tillför Karo Bio cirka 325 miljoner kronor före
transaktionskostnader. Antalet aktier och röster i bolaget ökar med
232 238 383 till 387 063 972. Aktiekapitalet ökar med 116 119 191,50
kronor till 193 531 986 kronor. Teckningskursen var 1,40 kronor per ny
aktie och Karo Bios aktieägare ägde rätt att teckna tre nya aktier för
varje två befintliga aktier.
För ytterligare information kontakta
Fredrik Lindgren, verkställande direktör
Telefon: 070-561 61 77
Erika Söderberg Johnson, finansdirektör
Telefon: 070-720 48 20
Om Karo Bio
Karo Bio är ett läkemedelsbolag som tar fram och utvecklar innovativa
läkemedel för viktiga medicinska behov. Karo Bios vision är att bli ett
läkemedelsbolag med uthållig lönsamhet, produkter på marknaden och en
konkurrenskraftig projektportfölj.
Karo Bio driver ett antal utvecklingsprojekt inom indikationsområdena
kardiovaskulära och metabola sjukdomar, neuropsykiatri, inflammatoriska
tillstånd, cancer och kvinnohälsa. Ett fundament för verksamheten är det
unika kunnandet om nukleära receptorer som målprotein för läkemedel och
de därtill knutna verkningsmekanismerna. Viktiga processer och
kompetenser i företaget är forskning, läkemedelsframtagning, preklinisk
och klinisk utveckling samt medicinsk och regulatorisk expertis.
Karo Bio har kapacitet att ta utvalda substanser för nischindikationer
genom hela utvecklingskedjan, medan substanser för breda patientgrupper
kräver utvecklingssamarbeten eller utlicensiering i något skede av
processen. Utöver ett antal egna utvecklingsprojekt i klinisk och
preklinisk fas har Karo Bio tre strategiska samarbeten med
internationella läkemedelsföretag.
Karo Bio, med huvudkontor i Huddinge, har 70 anställda och är noterat på
NASDAQ OMX Stockholm sedan 1998 (Reuters: KARO.ST).
Informationen är sådan som Karo Bio kan vara skyldigt att offentliggöra
enligt lagen om värdepappersmarknaden och/eller lagen om handel med
finansiella instrument. Informationen lämnades för offentliggörande den
22 december 2010 kl.08:30.
Detta pressmeddelande finns även tillgängligt online på: www.karobio.se
och www.newsroom.cision.com
------------------------------------------------------------
Denna information skickades av Cision http://www.cisionwire.se
http://www.cisionwire.se/karo-bio/karo-bios-foretradesemission-fulltecknad69017

description.hltext_display: Auckland: NZ solo kayaker one-fifth of the way there
description.content:
NEW Zealander Tim Taylor has notched up almost 1000-kilometres on his epic attempt to become the first person to complete a solo circumnavigation of New Zealand in a kayak. The 24-year-old winemaker started his journey 25 days ago near his Tauranga home in the Bay of Plenty on the North Island, and by today had paddled 937-kilometres to Cape Palliser, at the bottom of the North Island.
Mr Taylor has been paddling for about 12 hours each day, before coming to shore to set up camp for the night.
Along the way, he's been followed by dolphins and has spotted seals swimming around him.
Mr Taylor said his body was holding up well so far. "I've got pretty good calluses going on so as long as I'm careful with my hands, making sure that they get dried at night time, they seem to be treating me pretty well," he said. Mr Taylor will continue across Cook Strait, around Stewart Island, up to Cape Reinga, and hopes to complete the 5281-kilometre trip by the end of March.

event_or_fact.property: I've got pretty good calluses going on so as long as I'm careful with my hands, making sure that they get dried at night time, they seem to be treating me pretty well

description.hltext_display: Gruveavtale signert i Bidjovagge.
description.content:
Sametinget, mineralselskapet Arctic Gold AB og Reinbeitedistriktene D-34 Ábboráa og D-30A Vestre sonestyre/Oarjjabealli har underskrevet en avtale om faktiske undersøkelsesarbeider etter metaller og en intensjonsavtale om forhandlinger om søknad om gruvedrift i Bidjovagge, Kautokeino kommune, heter det i en pressemelding fra Sametinget.
Tidligere denne høsten ble det for første gang i historien signert en lignende avtale, da Sametinget og Nussir ASA signerte en intensjonsavtale om å forhandle om Nussirs planer om en konsesjonssøknad om gruvedrift i Kvalsund.
Sametingspresident Egil Olli er meget fornøyd med den nye avtalen: Denne signeringen er et sikkert uttrykk for at Sametingets mineralveileder både blir respektert og fulgt av selskaper som ønsker å etablere seg i Sápmi, sier Olli.
I avtalene som nå er underskrevet er også reinbeitedistriktene D-34 og D-30A parter, noe som ifølge Sametingets president Egil Olli, styrker samarbeidet. Det er svært gledelig, og et stort skritt i riktig retning, at også reindrifta er med på denne avtalen. Reinbeitedistriktenes deltakelse gjør dem til likeverdige parter, som Arctic Gold forplikter seg til å spille på lag med, sier Sametingets president Egil Olli.
Sametinget vedtok i juni en egen mineralveileder for hvordan Sametinget og mineralselskaper kan forholde seg til hverandre ved mineralvirksomhet i samiske områder.
Denne mineralveilederen legger opp til at det inngås avtaler mellom Sametinget og selskaper om undersøkelsesarbeider og planer om søknad om driftskonsesjon.
Formålet med avtalen er å legge opp til gruvedrift som skjer i sameksistens med eksisterende og tradisjonelle samiske næringer og høstingsformer, og som er til gagn og utvikling av lokalsamfunn og samisk kultur. Selv om reinbeitedistriktene i hovedsak ikke er interessert i at andre arealkrevende aktører skal etablere seg i områder der mye beiteland allerede er tapt, er avtalene vi nå har inngått bra for oss.
Johan Aslak Logje er fornøyd.
Foto: Nils Henrik Måsø/NRK Avtalen sikrer at vi kan legge premissene og være i forkant av beslutningsprosessene, sier distriktsleder Johan Aslak Logje i reinbeitedistrikt 30A Vestre sonestyre og distriktsleder Nils Isak Sara i reinbeitedistrikt 34 Ábboráa. Også gruveselskapet Arctic Gold sier seg fornøyd med avtalen som nå er signert: Jeg er veldig glad for at vi, etter mye diskusjon, har sikret hvordan vi skal forhandle og samarbeide for sameksistens med det samiske folk i utviklingen av Bidjovaggeprojektet, med sikte på en lønnsom gruvedrift, uttaler Arctic Golds administrerende direktør, Lars-Åke Claesson.

description.hltext_display: Skoda plans to double sales in next 5 years- Report
Airports under fire amid Europe's travel torment (ABC)
description.content:
The European Commission has called a meeting with airport officials to look at new ways of dealing with the extreme weather.
The snow in Europe is still causing chaos for travellers, including many Australians trying to get home for Christmas.Two of the world's busiest airports - Heathrow and Frankfurt - have been among the worst affected.
Heathrow has had five days of chaos, with two-thirds of flights cancelled and many travellers forced to sleep on terminal floors.
Two planeloads of Qantas passengers face a disrupted Christmas after their flights to and from Heathrow were cancelled.
The airline says some flights will go ahead as normal but more delays or cancellations could occur.
The European Commission is so concerned about the travel chaos that it has called airport officials to a meeting in coming days.
"Airports simply must get serious about planning for these kind of severe weather conditions," said Helen Kearns, a spokeswoman for the EU transport commissioner.
"We have seen, in recent years, that snow in Western Europe is not such an exceptional circumstance."
It has been the worst week for airports and airlines since April, when most flights in Europe were cancelled as an ash cloud from a volcano in Iceland drifted across the continent.
When the delays at Heathrow run into days, it is enough to test anyone's patience."[It's] absolutely terrible. There's been no management whatsoever in any shape or form," one passenger said.
But other travellers have been more fortunate, with one man making it through the turmoil in the terminal and on to a flight to Sydney."I've come from London. I've waited about two days. I was meant to catch a flight at 12:00pm on Saturday and I have to say, Heathrow was pretty chaotic. Fist fights and chaos and tears," he said.
Therese Rein, the wife of Foreign Minister Kevin Rudd, is also held up in London and is at risk of missing Christmas at home.
Mr Rudd says his wife had been expected home tomorrow and she is trying to find an alternate way home.
But the former prime minister says her presents will still be under the tree when she returns.
But British prime minister David Cameron says BAA, which runs Heathrow, has no excuse."I'm frustrated on behalf of all those affected that it's taking so long for the situation to improve," he said.
BAA says both runways are now open but that the airport is operating a reduced flight schedule while aircraft and crews move back into position.London's second airport Gatwick has also had delayed flights and cancellations because of the snow.
In Germany fresh snowfall lead to the closure of Frankfurt airport for several hours.

description.hltext_display: Light Snow Wednesday Morning
description.author: Bill Steffen
description.content:
<–current radar. 2:40 AM – an upper level disturbance is dropping southeast across the area this morning. We’ll see periods of light snow and maybe a little freezing drizzle mixed in. Watch for slippery spots on area roads, parking lots and side streets that have not been salted recently. We could see an inch or two of accumulation. The best bet for that would be north of I-96. Once the disturbance passes, we’ll open up some breaks in the clouds for the afternoon. Here’s the NAM and GFS snow forecasts. Overall we remain in a cool and dry pattern. The next system on Christmas Eve will spread snow across central and southern Illinois and Indiana, southern Ohio and down in Kentucky. We may be on the northern edge of the snow south of I-94, or it may pass completely to our south. With a north wind behind the system, lake-effect snows will mainly occur down in Indiana and maybe the SW corner of the state (perhaps also the point by Silver Lake in Oceana Co…perhaps). Check the full national warning map to see the Warnings and Advisories in the Midwest and Great Lakes.
Here’s snowfall totals from the Minneapolis Area , southern Wisconsin , northeast Wisconsin , West Michigan (GRR), northern Lower Michigan , Chicago/N. Illinois .

description.hltext_display: Cortei in tutta Italia contro la riforma Gelmini, «sorprendere» è la parola d'ordine
description.author: Cronologia articolo22 dicembre
description.content:
Nel giorno della definitiva approvazione della riforma Gelmini dell'Università gli studenti scendono in piazza in tutta Italia. Sui siti studenteschi, continuano a ripercorrersi gli appuntamenti in programma negli atenei e nelle città. Il sito «Atenei in rivolta» sta pubblicando le diverse iniziative che, da Nord a Sud, si susseguiranno per tutto il corso della giornata, in concomitanza con il corteo nazionale di Roma il cui itinerario non prevede alcun passaggio dal centro della città. La parola d'ordine degli studenti, dopo le violenze della scorsa settimana, è sorprendere. In ogni calo l'itinerario del corteo principale a Roma , così come avvenuto il 14 dicembre, . Fiori ai poliziotti
Nel pomeriggio di ieri la rete degli studenti e della federazione degli studenti ha organizzato a piazza Montecitorio un sit in contro il ddl Gelmini, che il Senato sta approvando. Gli studenti hanno regalano . Un «segnale quello di dare dei fiori che sono il simbolo del fatto che nessuna guerra è in corso e che gli studenti vogliono far valere il loro diritto a manifestare», spiega primo anno di Giurisprudenza a Padova del coordinamento della rete, determinato nel ribadire che assolutamente «non c'è alcuna contrapposizione stato manifestanti».
Questa, ha spiegato Angelica responsabile organizzativa dell'organizzazione della rete degli studenti medi «è una manifestazione simbolica per ribadire che il movimento è pacifico e non violento. Una rivendicazione piena di contenuti e non vogliamo essere tacciati di essere facinorosi violenti e addirittura assassini (). Sono due anni che ci battiamo».
Il decalogo delle forme di protesta non violente
Sul sito della rete degli studenti è stato intanto pubblicato . Si va dal flash mob (quando un gruppo di persone si riunisce all'improvviso in uno spazio pubblico, mette in pratica un'azione insolita poi successivamente disperdersi) ai girotondi, per arrivare al lancio di aerei di carta (lo inventarono nel 2002, tre cittadini norvegesi che furono arrestati per averne lanciati diversi contro l'ambasciata americana come protesta per i bombardamenti sull'Afghanistan) al cosiddetto "buon risveglio" (il concerto di pentole reso famoso dalle proteste in Argentina ai tempi del crac delle finanze pubbliche).

description.hltext_display: Corea del Sud, iniziate le manovre militari
description.content: Seoul dà il via a massicce esercitazioni militari a ridosso del confine con la Corea del Nord - La marina sudcoreana ha cominciato oggi quattro giorni di manovre al largo della costa orientale della penisola coreana. Le esercitazioni si tengono a un centinaio di miglia dal confine con il Nord e con l'impiego di sei navi da guerra ed elicotteri. Obiettivo delle manovre - secondo quanto riferisce l'esercito di Seul - è prepararsi a rispondere a un'eventuale intrusione di sottomarini o motovedette nordcoreane nelle acque della Corea del Sud. Avviata anche una massiccia esercitazione militare terrestre, che durerà tre giorni, e si svolge nella località di Pocheon a circa venti chilometri dalla frontiera con il Nord. Saranno impiegati circa 800 soldati, elicotteri da combattimento, aerei da caccia, carri armati, cannoni autotrasportati, lanciamissili e razzi anticarro anche con l'impiego di aerei e con l'uso di munizioni vere.

description.hltext_display: Baylor Announces Equestrian Signing Class
description.content:
"We are very excited by the signing of these student-athletes," White said. "These young ladies know what it takes to win and they are going to be a big part of us getting to our goal of a National Championship."
Dubois Barnes - Western - Bryan, Texas (Bryan HS) - Multiple top-10 placings at the All-American Quarter Horse Congress ... Finished in the top-20 at the AQHYA World Championship Show.
Sue Carol Thompson - Hunter Seat - Austin, Texas (Star Charter School) - 2010 top-three finisher in Junior Equitation ... Maclay Regional Qualifier ... Zone 7 Champion ... THJA State Champion ... THJA Reserve Equitation Champion ... CTHJA High Point Rider three-straight years ... CTHJA Medal Finals winner two-consecutive years.
Emily Kinney - Hunter Seat - Traverse City, Mich. (Traverse City West HS) - Qualified for the 2010 USEF Talent Search Finals ... Won several champions and reserve champions in 2009, 2010 NAL Child/Adult Jumper ... Won first place at2009 Horse Shows by the Bay ... Earned several ribbons in Maclay, Pessoa/ USEF Medal, WIHS Jumper and Hunter Phase and Equitation 15-17 classes ... Modified Jumper 1.30m Grand Champion at the 2009 Ledges Classic ... Won first place at the2009, 2010 Marshal Sterling Children's Jumper Classic ... Placed eighth in the 2010HJAM Medal Finals.
Parris Rice - Western - Schonmish, Wash. - AQHYA World Champion in hunter seat ... Finished 10th at the AQHYAWorld Show in trail, while placing eighth in horsemanship ... In 2010, placed seventh in showmanship at 2010 AQHYA World Show, fifth in horsemanship and won the hunter seat for the second-straight year.
Kate Riddle - Hunter Seat - Malvern, Pa. (Villa Maria Academy) - Competed in the 2010 ASPCA Maclay Finals ... Rode in the 2010 USEF Hunter Seat Medal Finals ... Competed in the 2009, 2010 ASPCA Maclay Zone II Regionals ... Accepted into 2009 Emerging Athletes Program Training Session ... Varsity Lettered in Equestrian Sports all four years of high school ... Ribboned in Equitation classes at Devon, East Coast Junior Hunter Finals and many other AA shows ... Qualified for 2009, 2010 Hunterdon Cup Equitation Challenge ... Finished first place in 2008 CCHSA Medal Finals and second in 2008 CCHSA Hunter Championship.
Colby Russey - Hunter Seat - Cooper City, Fla. (Cooper City HS) - Finished sixth in the 2010 WIHS Children's Jumper Championship Standings ... Placed first in 2010 Equine Tack and Nutritionals Children's Humpers ... Finished second in Children's Jumper 3'9" ... Was first in 2009 Perfect Prep Children's Jumper 3'7" ... Finished seventh in the 2009 Bahama Echo Child/Adult Grand Prix 3'9" ... Won one Grand Championship and three Reserve Championships during WEF 2009 ... Earned two Grand Championships in WEF 2010 ... Placed fourth overall in Children's Jumper WEF 2010 Circuit ... Was sixth overall in 2010 USEF Children's Jumper Points.
Jordan Weaver - Hunter Seat - Chesterfield, Mo. (Westminster Christian Academy) - Ranked sixth as the USEF Horse of the Year (HOTY) in the Large Junior Hunters 15 and-under ... Jumper was ranked eighth nationally in the North American League Children's Jumper ... Competed at Harrisburg in Childrens Jumper and Large Junior Hunters 15 and-under, placing thirdrd in the flat ... Received Missouri Hunter Jumper Organization's High Point Hunter and Jumper Champion honors ... Qualified for the USEF National Junior Hunter Championships on east and west coast ... Competed at the USEF Show Jumping Talent Search Finals and Large Junior Hunters at Devon ...Rode in the ASPCA Maclay and USEF Medal Regionals for the past three years ... Competed in both the ASPCA/NHSAA Maclay and USEF Pessoa Medal finals ... Competed in the USHJA Zone 7 3-6 Equitation Finals for the past three years and was recently named the 2010 Champion ... Rode in the 2010 Junior Hunter Finals.

description.hltext_display: La Californie en alerte en raison de perturbations exceptionnelles
description.content:
La région de San Diego inondées en raison de pluies le 21 décembre 2010 en Californie Sandy Huffaker AFP/
Une vague de perturbations exceptionnelle continuait mardi à frapper la Californie, où les fortes pluies enregistrées ces derniers jours ont entraîné inondations, évacuations et sauvetages, mais sans faire jusqu'ici de blessés ni de gros dégâts.
Dans le centre de Los Angeles, il est tombé depuis vendredi plus de 13 cm de pluie, soit plus du tiers de ce qui tombe sur la mégalopole en un an.
Les précipitations ont atteint plus de 25 cm dans certaines montagnes du sud de l'Etat. Dans le nord, la région montagneuses de Mammoth, à l'est de San Francisco, a vu tomber près de 4 mètres de neige depuis vendredi, battant tous les records de la région.
Les services météorologiques nationaux ont appelé à la vigilance et averti qu'une nouvelle perturbation, plus forte encore que celles des derniers jours, allait s'abattre sur la Californie entre mardi soir et mercredi.
Dans la partie sud de l'Etat, la plus affectée par les précipitations, plusieurs rivières sont sorties de leur lit et de nombreuses chutes d'arbres et de pierres ont été observées. Les autorités ont dû procéder à plusieurs sauvetages de personnes surprises par les eaux au volant de leur véhicule.
A Orange County, au sud de Los Angeles, quatre randonneurs avaient été portés disparus lundi soir mais ont été retrouvés sains et saufs mardi matin.
Au nord de la mégalopole, dans le comté de Kern, l'évacuation de 2.000 personnes, ordonnée lundi, a été levée.
Dans toutes les régions affectées par les pluies, les autorités étaient en alerte, craignant surtout des glissements de terrains dans les zones précédemment touchées par des incendies, notamment dans les montagnes aux alentours de Los Angeles. Des sacs de sable ont été distribués par les autorités aux habitants des zones à risque, et des centres d'accueil ont été ouverts pour parer aux éventuelles évacuations.

description.hltext_display: Reappointed Kyrgyz PM to visit Moscow
description.content:
According to the Kyrgyz Governments administration, the reappointed Kyrgyz Prime Minister Almazbek Atambayev is due to visit Moscow this coming Sunday, December 26th.
Atambayev said that Russia would be the first country he would visit as Prime Minister when his candidacy was still under discussion at parliament last Friday. He told the MPs then that he did not rule out Kyrgyzstans joining the Customs Union of Russia, Belarus and Kazakhstan.

description.hltext_display: Rubberduck: Stor innehållssatsning på Rubberduck Media Lab - Vabø leder nytt initiativ
description.content:
Stor innehållssatsning på Rubberduck Media Lab - Vabø leder nytt
initiativ
Rubberduck Media Lab, ett dotterbolag till Aspiro AB och Europas ledande
leverantör av streaming tv-tjänster förstärker sitt innehållsteam med
nya chefen Linda Vabö, som påbörjat sin anställning i början på
december.
Vabø kommer att ansvara för innehållsstrategi och inköp av direktsänd
tv, loopade kanaler samt VOD-klipp. Vabø har lång erfarenhet från
innehållshantering på de nordiska marknaderna och har en bakgrund från
norska betal-TV-operatörena RiksTV och Canal Digital, liksom public
service-bolaget NRK.
"Rubberduck är ett spännande och prisbelönt företag som tillhandahåller
högkvalitetstjänster för tv på multipla skärmar. Jag ser fram emot att
ta denna nya utmaning och utveckla Rubberducks innehållstjänster
ytterligare. Min ambition är att vara den föredragna partnern för
mobiloperatörer, programföretag och ägare av innehåll, och möjliggöra
kraftfulla kombinationer av bra innehåll och användarvänliga
applikationer på ett brett utbud av skärmar", säger Vabø.
Rubberduck Media Lab samarbetar redan med stora innehållsleverantörer
som BBC, CNN, Disney Channel och Turner och levererar tv-tjänster till
ledande operatörer som Deutsche Telekom, Telenor och Hi3G.
"Innehåll betyder om möjligt mer än någonsin tidigare, och vi förstärker
därför vårt innehållsteam nu vid ingången till 2011. Lindas gedigna
bakgrund i kombination med hennes proaktiva och framåttänkande
inställning är den perfekta match för att kunna ta Aspiro och
Rubberducks tv-erbjudanden till nästa nivå", säger Erling Paulsen, VD
för Rubberduck Media Lab.
För mer information vänligen kontakta:
Kristin Breivik Eldnes
IR- och informationschef
Tel: +47 908 07 389
e-post: kristin.eldnes@aspiro.com (kristin.eldnes@aspiro.com)

description.hltext_display: Vagues de froid en Europe: un refroidissement temporaire dans le réchauffement global
description.content:
Les vagues de froid successives en Europe pourraient être liées à un refroidissement temporaire au sein du réchauffement global, mais qui pourrait durer 5 à 10 ans et auquel il conviendrait de se préparer, selon les experts.
Pour le professeur David King, ancien conseiller scientifique du gouvernemnt britannique (2000-2007), l'oscillation nord atlantique (différence de pression entre l'anticyclone des Açores et la dépression d'Islande), phénomène bien connu des climatologues, expliquerait la succession d'hivers froids et d'étés chauds en Europe.
"La fréquence de cette oscillation varie, et c'est ce qui la rend difficile à prévoir, mais la dernière fois que nous avons eu ce type de régime de basse pression, c'était dans les années 1960", a-t-il rappelé sur la BBC mardi.
"A l'époque, celà a duré entre 5 à 10 ans, avec des extrêmes, hivers froids et été chauds, et si nous sommes dans ce type de période, mon conseil serait de nous y préparer", a-t-il ajouté.
Le gouvernement britannique est sévèrement critiqué pour le manque de préparation aux intempéries -réserves de sel insuffisantes, engins de déneigement etc.- et la paralysie des transports.
Le ministre des Transports, Philip Hammond, a annoncé qu'il allait consulter le conseiller scientifique du gouvernement pour savoir si la Grande-Bretagne devait s'attendre à des hivers plus froids et si des investissements à long terme étaient requis.
"Mon conseil, c'est que nous nous préparions. Celà peut ne pas se produire, mais le risque économique est très important, si celà se reproduit et que nous ne sommes pas prêts", a observé M. King.
La phase froide semble amorcée depuis trois ans: "le Royaume Uni a eu deux hivers - 2008/9 et 2009/10 - avec des températures inférieures aux moyennes saisonnières", a confirmé John Hammond, porte-parole du Met Office. Décembre 2010 se profile déjà comme le mois de décembre le plus froid depuis 1910 en Grande-Bretagne, même s'il est trop tôt pour extrapoler sur l'ensemble de l'hiver.
Il rappelle qu'à terme le Royaume-Uni devrait connaître des "hivers plus doux et plus humides", dans le cadre du réchauffement global causé par les activités humaines.
Ce n'est pas un événement global", souligne Julia Slingo, scientifique en chef du Met Office, citée par The Times mardi. "Si vous regardez ce qui se passe au Groënland, vous verrez qu'il y fait exceptionnelement chaud".
Mais elle confirme qu'une phase plus froide, liée à l'oscillation nord atlantique, pourrait être de retour, comme dans les années 1960. "Nous avons eu depuis 20 ans une succession d'hivers relativement doux, et notre résistance à ce type d'événement n'a pas été testée", remarque-t-elle. "Notre mode de vie a aussi changé pendant ces vingt ans, et notre vulnérabilité a changé".
Les voyages ont explosé, conduisant au chaos constaté dans les aéroports et sur les voies ferrées européennes, mal équipées pour ce type de température.
King craint que la prévention des risques fasse les frais des coupes budgétaires décidées par le gouvernement, et appelle l'Europe à investir massivement dans des ordinateurs super-puissants "pour améliorer nos modèles climatiques et nous préparer correctement" aux défis posés par le changement du climat.

description.hltext_display: Neige: le transport aérien européen accusé d'impréparation
description.content:
Passagers bloqués le 20 décembre 2010 à l'aéroport Charles-de-Gaulle à Roissy Bertrand Langlois AFP
Le transport aérien européen était accusé mardi d'impréparation et de manque de transparence vis-à-vis des passagers retenus dans les aéroports, au lendemain des intempéries qui ont provoqué des perturbations jugées "inacceptables" par Bruxelles.
Avions cloués au sol par la neige ou le verglas, voyageurs condamnés à passer la nuit à l'aéroport, manque d'informations: la scène s'est reproduite depuis dimanche dans plusieurs aéroports européens, depuis celui d'Heathrow à Londres, en passant par Francfort, Bruxelles ou encore Roissy-Charles-De-Gaulle à Paris, au coeur des départs en vacances pour Noël.
La Commission européenne a fait part de sa colère. "Je suis extrêmement préoccupé par le niveau des perturbations que la neige a causé pour voyager en Europe. C'est inacceptable", a dit le commissaire aux Transports Siim Kallas.
Il prévoit de demander des explications aux représentants des aéroports lors d'une réunion qui devrait se tenir "dans les prochains jours" et a brandi la menace de mesures législatives "sur les exigences de service minimum pour les aéroports".
Aéroport de Paris (ADP) n'a pas souhaité faire de commentaires sur ces déclarations. Le trafic reprenait progressivement mardi, hormis à Dublin où les vols étaient suspendus dans l'après-midi en raison de chute de neige.
Le gouvernement français a aussi haussé le ton contre les compagnies aériennes, la ministre de l'Ecologie Nathalie Kosciusko-Morizet leur reprochant "un défaut d'information".
"En théorie, les compagnies aériennes sont responsables de l'information des passagers. Là, il y en a qui ont été débordées, notamment du fait de la fermeture d'autres aéroports européens", a déclaré la ministre sur France Info, reconnaissant toutefois qu'il était impossible aux compagnies aériennes d'échapper à des retards de vols.
Une critique reprise par l'Association des tour-opérateurs français (Ceto), dont le président René-Marc Chikli dénonce "un défaut de communication global". Il a toutefois estimé qu'il ne fallait pas dramatiser la situation, 98% des clients des tours-opérateurs ayant finalement pu s'envoler.
"Il faut arrêter de dramatiser: c'est moins grave que de gérer des attentats", a-t-il relativisé.
Le directeur exécutif d'Air France-KLM Pierre-Henri Gourgeon a pour sa part préféré faire son mea culpa sans même attendre les reproches du gouvernement. Mardi matin sur Europe 1, il a présenté ses "excuses à tous les passagers parce qu'on ne peut pas trouver assez de chambres à Roissy".
Il a également admis une "faiblesse": "Pris par le rythme des opérations et des décisions à prendre, nous ne faisons pas assez d'efforts pour donner aux passagers des informations sur le fait qu'on ne sait pas encore quand on repartira, mais qu'on y travaille", a-t-il dit.
Pour les jours à venir en revanche, il s'est refusé à tout pronostic. Même prudence du côté de sa grande concurrente européenne, Lufthansa, qui n'a pas dit quand le trafic devrait revenir à la normale. Le trafic a repris mardi matin à l'aéroport de Francfort.
Dans le sud de la France, il n'y a pas eu de neige, mais une grève des employés d'une entreprise de sécurité a provoqué l'annulation de nombreux vols à l'aéroport de Marseille Provence, où environ 3.000 passagers n'ont pas pu embarquer à temps. La grève a pris fin dans l'après-midi.

description.hltext_display: Mozambique: Cove Energy provides drilling update - Lagosta operations complete, Tubarao spud imminent
description.content:
Cove Energy has announced that the Belford Dolphin drillship has arrived on location at the Tubarao well site. This follows cessation of operations on the Lagosta gas discovery which has been suspended to allow for future flow testing. As announced on 29th November the Lagosta well encountered over 550 feet of natural gas pay in Oligocene and Upper Eocene high quality sands.
John Craven, CEO of Cove Energy said:
'We are very pleased with the major success at Lagosta which found substantial gas pays in the main Oligocene and Upper Eocene objectives.
'The significance of this discovery means that the partnership can now confidently proceed to advance commercialisation options - particularly as the operator believes that the three gas discoveries already made, Windjammer, Barquentine and Lagosta, exceed the resource size threshold to support a Liquefied Natural Gas (LNG) development in our extensive 2.6 million acre block, offshore Mozambique.
'Cove is excited by the continuous exploration and appraisal programme planned for 2011 and beyond. Drilling operations at the Tubarao well are expected to take 6 to 8 weeks and we look forward to announcing results from that well as and when appropriate.'

event_or_fact.property: We are very pleased with the major success at Lagosta which found substantial gas pays in the main Oligocene and Upper Eocene objectives.

description.hltext_display: 薬剤師意識調査（薬剤師になって良かったと思ったこと、患者さんから言われたうれしい言葉、私の気分転換方法）
description.content:
株式会社ネグジット総研
医療経営コンサルティング、薬剤師を対象としたプロモーション及び調査を行う株式会社ネグジット総研（本社：兵庫県神戸市、代表取締役社長：八田光）は、このほど薬剤師を対象に薬剤師になって良かったこと、患者さんから言われてうれしかった言葉について薬局勤務薬剤師１９４名を対象に調査を実施した。
薬剤師になってよかったと思いますか？の問いについては「はい」と回答された方が８５％であった。
よかった理由については医療従事者の面から患者さんからの感謝の言葉を聞けること、職業としての薬剤師の面から安定した収入があるなどが挙げられた。
【調査概要】
本調査は、ネグジット総研薬剤師モニター４８００名に対して告知、１９４名の回答を元に集計した調査レポートです。
■調査実施期間：2010年7月13、14日
■調査対象（サンプル数）：薬局勤務薬剤師：194名
■調査方法：WEBアンケート
■調査実施機関：株式会社ネグジット総研 薬剤師調査ＭＭＰＲ
【調査項目】
Ｑ１．薬剤師になってよかったと思いますか？
Ｑ１－２．Ｑ１で「はい」を選択された方にお聞きします。薬剤師になってよかったと感じた事、体験について教えてくださ
い。
Ｑ２．患者さんから言われたうれしい言葉、感謝された体験について教えてください。
Ｑ３．あなたの気分転換方法について教えてください。
＜株式会社ネグジット総研の会社概要＞

description.hltext_display: Let kids discover how fun math can be with Math Easy HD
description.content:
Tweet OneLamp Studios today announces 1.0 for the iPad. Developed to provide young children with a digital arithmetic learning utility that is as fun to use as it is informative, uses entertaining games with vibrant graphics to teach users basic math skills. To help celebrate the winter holidays, will be discounted by 40% percent for both Christmas as well as New Years. Beijing, China ? OneLamp Studios, an emerging developer focused on creating learning apps for mobile platforms, has announced the release of . This innovative children?s app is designed to engage users by teaching them math through a framework of exciting and entertaining puzzle based games. Developed specifically for the iPad, offers kids six years or younger a concise overview of fundamental arithmetic concepts in a simple and clear manner that they can utilize with or without direct adult supervision as the app?s interface and games are specifically designed with young children as the primary users in mind. Currently available at a 40% discount for the duration of the winter holiday season, is available for the iPad worldwide exclusively through the App Store in the Education category.
This app employs ten unique puzzle games to teach young users basic math. These games cover fundamental concepts of arithmetic to an extent that not intimidating to young children. This app is geared to teach kids how to count from zero to twenty and identify even and odd numbers between zero and twenty. Furthermore, children will learn how to add and subtract numbers between zero and twenty. Once they have gotten these fundamental mathematical concepts mastered, they can also begin learning how to multiply numbers between two and five. The limited range of numbers children are given to work with in this app ensures that the concepts they are learning stay simple enough for them to understand while wide enough to challenge them as they begin to learn.
Created to provide an entertaining and dynamic learning environment, includes both features to make it more visually attractive, as well as features that ensure its usability. The app includes vivid game animations and sound effects to help engage users while an astonishingly simple user interface ? designed specifically for young children to use ? makes navigating through this learning tool easy and hassle free. The app also includes clear written prompts together with vocal guidance to ensure all learning points are clear and easy to understand. Made to make learning basic math a fun and enlightening experience, is the perfect way for parents to introduce their children to arithmetic in a manner that will captivate them and encourage them to learn.
Device Requirements: * Compatible with iPad * Requires iOS 3.2 or later (iOS 4.0 Tested) * 20.4 MB
Pricing and Availability: 1.0 is currently $2.99 USD (40% discount) or equivalent amount in other currencies and available worldwide exclusively through the App Store in the Education category.
OneLamp Studios: http://www.onelamp.com/index.html 1.0: http://www.onelamp.com/math-easy-hd.html Purchase and Download: http://itunes.apple.com/us/app/id408820364?mt=8 App Icon: http://www.onelamp.com/images/boxshot/maths-made-easy.jpg Screenshot 1: http://a1.phobos.apple.com/us/r1000/036/Purple/f4/bb/31/mzl.tmisqzir.480�480-75.jpg Screenshot 2: http://a1.phobos.apple.com/us/r1000/007/Purple/ff/ea/2f/mzl.hvuljoio.480�480-75.jpg OneLamp is focused on providing consumers with the highest quality educational mobile games. The developer is committed to creating engaging and entertaining mobile learning experiences for the pleasure of modern audiences. (C) 2010 OneLamp Studios. All Rights Reserved.
