description.hltext_display: Mega-Sena acumulada por pagar R$ 29 milhões hoje
Blejnar, ANAF: Dispar peste 30% din administratiile fiscale
description.content:
Restructurarea la nivelul sectorului fiscal va duce la disparitia a peste 30% dintre cele 424 de administratii financiare existente in teritoriu, urmand sa existe si disponibilizari la Garda Financiara, Vama si Trezorerie, potrivit presedintelui ANAF, Sorin Blejnar.
"Probabil in ianuarie - februarie va incepe procesul. Vor fi desfiintate multe administratii fiscale locale, dar nu cred ca se va injumatati numarul. Vor disparea toate administratiile financiare fara trezorerii. Sunt circa 50 de administratii care au doar partea de administrare financiara", a declarat Blejnar, citat de Financiar.
"De asemenea, vom desfiinta administratiile care sunt foarte apropiate geografic. Romania nu-si poate permite administratii financiare la 5-6 km una de alta. Vor disparea peste 30% din administratiile financiare, care au fost infiintate in ultimii 20-30 de ani pe criterii administrative", a spus Blejnar.

description.hltext_display: Koli gets death in 4th Nithari murder case
description.content:
New Delhi: A special CBI court on Wednesday awarded death penalty to Surinder Koli in the Deepali rape and murder case. Earlier, special CBI Judge AK Singh pronounced the verdict and held Koli guilty in the case of rape and murder of a 12-year-old girl Deepali.
Koli, the domestic help of Moninder Singh Pandher, was the prime accused in the case. The body parts of Deepali were found in a drain in Nithari in Noida in 2006.
Koli has already been awarded death sentence by the special court in three of 19 cases filed in connection with the rape and murder of children and a young woman in Nithari.

description.hltext_display: Monroe City Payroll Document
Confusion over Benitez's future
description.content:
Confusion continued to surround Rafael Benitez's future as coach of Inter Milan on Tuesday night.
Nerazzurri president Massimo Moratti insisted the Spaniard was still in charge as further reports emerged that he has been sacked.
Speculation regarding Benitez has only intensified since he called on the club to back him or sack him following their FIFA Club World Cup triumph, comments Moratti did not take well.
The club president attended a meeting on Tuesday night at the club's offices in Milan, and said Benitez was still the coach when he emerged.
Asked if Benitez was still in charge, Moratti said: "Yes, yes. There are no other thoughts. I have heard of and read about contacts being made with other coaches, but the club has not made contact with any other coach and will not until the situation is clarified."
Former AC Milan manager Leonardo has been strongly linked with a move to Inter, but Moratti would not be drawn further on the Brazilian.
Benitez, 50, is currently on holiday in Liverpool as Inter have begun their winter break.
Inter have been decimated by injuries and are 13 points adrift of city rivals AC Milan in the Serie A title hunt, albeit having played two games fewer than the Rossoneri.
They next take to the field against Napoli on January 6, after the league's winter break.
Copyright PA Sport 2010, All Rights Reserved

description.hltext_display: Louisiana Loses Seat in House of Representatives
description.content:
Since the last census in 2000, Louisiana's growth has been minimal growing just over 1%, bringing the state's population to a total of 4.5 million people.
When Washington announced Tuesday that each member of the house must represent 710,000 citizens, that spelled the loss of a congressman in Louisiana dropping the state from seven representatives to six.
In District 5, that means Congressman Rodney Alexander will have to represent 100,000 more citizens.
"Anytime a district grows by 100,000, it's going to affect the strength of that member of congress," said 5th District Representative, Rodney Alexander.
According to Alexander, Hurricane Katrina was the biggest factor in Louisiana's lack of growth causing 300,000 people to move from the gulf coast. The population north of I-10 has been steady, meaning the state will likely keep districts 4 and 5 north of Alexandria.
"If you look north of I-10, our population has been stable enough that it will still require 2 seats," said Alexander.
While north Louisiana is likely to keep its representatives, local leaders are concerned that the congressmen may be forced to cover too much ground.
"We've seen what happens when we have a representative that lives in the area, and they're just more dedicated," Sue Nicholson from the Monroe Chamber of Commerce told NBC 10 News.
"Our district becomes bigger making things more difficult for the person who represents us," said West Monroe mayor, Dave Norris.
Congressman Alexander expects preliminary reports on redistricting to be released by the end of January with the maps officially drawn this spring.

description.hltext_display: Jakarta 'compiling list of Temasek's assets'
Shoppers spending more, but only just
description.content:
Shoppers are expected to spend more money in Queensland leading up to Christmas than they did last year, but only just, the Australian Retailers Association (ARA) says.
The peak industry body has projected that for Queensland from the last two weeks of November through to Christmas Eve consumers will spend $8.2 billion of the $39.9 billion it expects to be spent across the country.
But that is not a big increase, up from $8.1 billion over the same period last year.
ARA executive director Russell Zimmerman said retailers were hoping that having five full weekdays of shopping before Christmas would give retailers a slight advantage.
"It is going to be a very ordinary Christmas with a techno twist," Mr Zimmerman told AAP.
He said goods like iPads and iPhones were selling well, but some of the normally popular items at Christmas like small electrical goods and packaged perfumes had already gone on sale because they were not selling well.
"Clothes are also doing poorly, mainly because of the weather, with people reluctant to buy when it has been wet and cooler than normal," Mr Zimmerman said.
He said the tourist areas of Queensland like the Gold Coast would also be hit hard because of the drop in the number of visitors spending their money.
Mr Zimmerman said there were a number of reasons for the sluggish pre-Christmas sales.
He said the wet and cooler than normal weather and the Melbourne Cup Day interest rate rise when banks almost doubled the Reserve Bank increase were two of the main ones.
"It was just like someone turned the tap off," Mr Zimmerman said.
He said figures released on Tuesday by Fitch Ratings showed in Queensland there had been a significant increase in the number of people in arrears on their mortgage payments and that also had to be a factor.
The aftermath of the global financial crisis and the big increases in electricity and water bills were also having an impact, Mr Zimmerman said.
However, despite hopingconsumers would keep on spending over the final two days before Christmas, Mr Zimmerman also adopted a cautious approach and urged people to "spend wisely".

description.hltext_display: FA set to choose new leader
description.content:
Football Association board members were due to gather today for one of their most important meetings in recent history.
The board are expected to choose the new FA chairman - with former Arsenal vice-chairman David Dein the clear favourite - and will also hear a postmortem of England's failure to host the 2018 World Cup and the first details of a review of international player development.
The appointment of a new permanent chairman follows Lord Triesman's enforced resignation in May.
Bolton chairman Phil Gartside is head of the nominations committee appointed to find Triesman's successor, and he is expected to present one name, or possibly two, to fellow board members today.
Acting chairman Roger Burden was initially the favourite until he withdrew his application following England 2018's controversial World Cup defeat on the grounds that he "could not trust" FIFA.
Sir Keith Mills, the deputy chairman of the London 2012 Olympics and a Tottenham board member, was viewed as another potential candidate but he has ruled himself out on the grounds of lack of time, leaving Dein as the outright favourite.
Other names linked with the post include Andrew Croker, son of ex-FA general secretary Ted Croker, and ex-Football League chairman David Sheepshanks.
Appointing Dein would also be welcomed by the Government who are watching proceedings carefully before making any moves to reform the governance of the organisation.
Dein impressed ministers as international president of the England 2018 bid, even if his efforts came to nothing, and he has good connections to UEFA and FIFA.
The only possible fly in the ointment is in respect of his age - under current rules the chairman has to stand down when he is 70, meaning Dein would only have three years in office.
Copyright PA Sport 2010, All Rights Reserved

description.hltext_display: Vil tjene millioner på bygninger
description.content:
Viborg Kommune håber at få et stort millionbeløb for sine gamle administrationsbygninger
Til august flytter Viborgs politikere og embedsfolk ind på kommunens nye rådhus. De efterlader en række overflødige administrationsbygninger, som kommunen nu vil sætte til salg.
Først skal man dog vedtage en ny lokalplan for det centrale Viborg, men når den er klar, forventer kommunen at kunne sælge bygningerne for 80 millioner kroner.
- Vi går nu i gang med at finde en mægler. Vi stiller en række krav til den som vinder udbuddet, således at ikke kun prisen kommer til at afgøre, hvem vi vælger, siger borgmester Søren Pape Poulsen (K) til Viborg Stifts Folkeblad.
Viborg Kommune bruger 300 millioner kroner på at bygge sit nye rådhus.

description.hltext_display: Nuggets' K-Mart a game-day decision
description.author: John Henderson
description.content:
The Nuggets play the hottest team in the Western Conference tonight and still won't know if their defensive star will play until today.
Forward Kenyon Martin, out all season from offseason knee surgery, practiced again Tuesday and sounded optimistic.
"It feels great," Martin said. "I didn't have any problems. It's about the same."
Will he play?
"I didn't say that," he said. "We'll see (today)."
The Nuggets visit the San Antonio Spurs, who sport the best record in the NBA at 24-3, including a nine-game win streak that tops the conference.
Nuggets coach George Karl has been getting along fine without Martin, not to mention point guard Chauncey Billups (wrist) and backup center-forward Chris Andersen (back).
But with Denver only 2 1/2 games out of first place in the Northwest Division, Karl said he won't push Martin back onto the court until he's ready, as well as the others.
"Let's wait until (today)," Karl said. "Let's see how they wake up and see how they feel. Let's see how they do in the shootaround. Chauncey and Kenyon both want to play, and I think there's a chance of that to happen."
The knee has bothered Martin since last season. He returned for the playoffs but had surgery to get back to full strength. Right now his defense is further along than his offense.
"Those (defensive) things don't go nowhere," Martin said. "Offense is rhythm. You need a certain number of games."
If Martin plays, he will take the spot of Shelden Williams, who has started all 26 games. Williams is averaging 5.2 points and 6.1 rebounds in 20 minutes a contest.
Last season, fighting through injuries, Martin averaged 11.5 points, 9.4 rebounds and 34 minutes.
"He's working his way into a good place," Karl said of Martin. "It's going to take some time for him to get his confidence and his touch back and his feel for the game back. Veteran players have a way of doing it very fast, but he's been out a long time, so we have to respect his progress."
Billups, who has missed the past three games, sees a Martin who's ready to contribute.
"Kenyon's looking well," Billups said. "It's good to have his presence back down there defensively. He's not probably in the shape that he's going to be in, as far as game shape, but it's really good having him back."
John Henderson: 303-954-1299 or jhenderson@denverpost.com
Denver at San Antonio
6:30 p.m. tonight, ALT, 950 AM
Spurs: The Spurs have lost their last three home games to Denver; conversely, the Spurs have won their last three games in Denver. . . . Overall, the Nuggets did pretty well against Manu Ginobili in their most recent matchup. While he got hot in the fourth quarter, he finished just 5-for-15 from the field and 2-for-10 from 3. . . . Tim Duncan's numbers are down this season (14.1 points per game), but he had a vintage Duncan night against Denver: 28 points, 16 rebounds and four assists in the win.
Nuggets: Forward Carmelo Anthony (right elbow) is expected to play. He didn't practice Tuesday. . . . Guard Arron Afflalo might be playing his way into the NBA's 3-point shooting contest. He's eighth in the league with 46.7 percent shooting from beyond the arc, and only one player ahead of him on the list has more 3-point attempts (Atlanta's Mike Bibby). Afflalo has made 10 of his past 16 3-point attempts.
Benjamin Hochman, The Denver Post

description.hltext_display: Former Banks teacher’s license pulled
description.content:
Michael Weaver, who taught math at Banks High, admitted providing alcohol to students
More than two years after he provided alcohol off campus to two minor students, the teaching license of a former Banks High School math teacher has been revoked by the Oregon Teacher Standards & Practices Commission.
Michael James Weaver, who worked for the Banks School District for three years, admitted to commissioners he provided alcohol to two minor students during the 2007-08 school year.
He resigned from his position in June 2008.
Victoria Chamberlain, the commission’s executive director, signed an order Nov. 15 revoking his license. The order said, in part, that Weaver’s conduct had constituted “a gross neglect of duty” in terms of professional judgment and “honoring appropriate adult boundaries” with students.
“In this case, Mr. Weaver surrendered his license,” Chamberlain said last week, adding that he was not permanently barred from teaching in Oregon.
“By law he has the right to apply for reinstatement after one year,” Chamberlain said.
The 17-member commission, which is charged with governing the performance of all public educators in the state, could decide to give Weaver his license back “if he were to convince them this behavior is unlikely to happen again,” Chamberlain said.
Banks superintendent Jim Foster said an internal investigation of Weaver began in May 2008 in response to reports of potentially inappropriate communications between Weaver and a female student. Those allegations turned out to be false, Foster said, but they led to “a conversation with him about alcohol” and Weaver’s eventual admission.
“He’s a guy who’s lost his career because he made a bad choice,” Foster said.
The News-Times could not reach Michael James Weaver for comment on this story.

description.hltext_display: On The Streets - Monroe Payroll Investigation
description.content:
When Mike Rhymes, the city of Monroe’s human resources director, approached two men in the engineering department about a worker’s overtime hours, they told of a lazy employee who missed many days of work and even told other employees that “you go, I ain’t going.”
After their meeting with Rhymes, Clovis Hailey and Paul Oxley were apparently approached by their boss, city engineer Sinyale Morrison, and the minions then recanted their previous statements saying everything is just fine and dandy at the old engineering department down on Jackson Street.
Rhymes had been asked to check out a complaint about overtime being paid to Ricardo Nance, who had used up all of his medical leave by Oct. 22. The city then started counting his sick and vacation days Oct. 25. Nance then went on disability Nov. 8 before returning on Nov. 22 in the middle of the controversy. Nance is a convicted felon who has pleaded guilty to at least five drug charges in Ouachita Parish (according to records researched at the Clerk of Court’s office) and attempting to burn his mother’s house.
Morrison is known to be one of Mayor Jamie Mayo’s favorites and word is out on the streets that the two have been meeting regularly over the current situation.
The mayor says there is a personality conflict between Morrison and Rhymes and that he will do his own investigation into the situation.
Rhymes believes the state’s Legislative Auditor’s Office should be called in along with possibly the city’s outside auditor and law enforcement, if needed.
Morrison, who is a six-figure employee, alleges that Rhymes is trying to ruin her reputation and has filed a grievance against the human resources director. Before joining the city, Rhymes was a labor attorney.
One might wonder how a convicted felon becomes a city employee. Nance applied for work at the city in 2007 and was hired in the garbage department. That was about the same time as law enforcement officers accused him of trying to burn his mother’s house. He pleaded guilty to simple arson in 2007 and was sentenced to one year at hard and released for time already served. Nance describes the incident on his city application for employment as an “accident.”
The mayor says a felon can work for the city if he has not been convicted of a violent crime and depending on other circumstances in each case.
This one could go on for a while. To give you the reader an idea of what’s going on, we’ve provided the following initial report by Rhymes and Morrison’s responses.

event_or_fact.property: Rhymes is trying to ruin her reputation and has filed a grievance against the human resources director.

description.hltext_display: Kakuta wants regular football
description.content:
Chelsea forward Gael Kakuta set his sights on earning a regular place in Carlo Ancelotti's first team after committing his future to the club by signing a new four-and-a-half year deal on Tuesday.
Reports had suggested the French youngster could be set to leave Stamford Bridge at the end of the season after talks that opened in September failed to come to an agreement over a contract extension.
"Since I signed for Chelsea when I was 16 all I was thinking about was to get to the first team," said Kakuta, who has made nine appearances for the club this season.
"Now I have been playing a few times with the first team and I have signed for four-and-a-half more years, I have to make a way for myself into the starting 11 and make my dream come true.
"The manager said to me it is the right time to play and I think for me it is as well. It's my job to do my best and try to play more often and show the coach that I am good enough to play in the team."
Blues boss Carlo Ancelotti has put faith in Kakuta, Dutch youngster Jeffrey Bruma and English prospect Josh McEachran, rather than dip into the transfer market this season.
The Italian also hopes to add 15-year-old Feyenoord defender Nathan Ake in January.
The Londoners are understood to have come to an agreement with the Dutch club over the transfer of the youngster, who is expected to sign a professional contract at Stamford Bridge when he turns 16 in February - a deal which will see Feyenoord receive compensation set by a tribunal.
The move for Ake has caused controversy in Holland, where Feyenoord sporting director Leo Beenhakker, without naming Chelsea specifically, expressed his dismay at how he thinks Premier League clubs are taking youngsters from their clubs before their 16th birthday.
"It's driving me crazy that hot prospects are walking away from us like this," Beenhakker told Dutch newspaper Algemeen Dagblad. "The Premier League clubs spoil the market with their behaviour. Other clubs in Europe aren't doing this kind of things, but the English sides just don't care."
Copyright PA Sport 2010, All Rights Reserved

description.hltext_display: Thick fog is forcing flights to be canceled in Tri Cities and Yakima
description.content:
Posted:
Updated:
Wednesday, December 22, 2010 3:17 AM EST
PASCO, Wash. -- Thick fog is preventing a lot of people from getting to their holiday destinations.
No flights were able to get into the Tri Cities Airport Tuesday while departing flights were canceled after about 8:30.
Flights in and out of the Yakima Airport were canceled as well.
One flight from Salt Lake City to Pasco Tuesday night was diverted to Spokane, with the passengers bussed to the Tri Cities.
"They put us in a holding pattern for about half an hour, then they said can't do it, we'll have to go to Spokane," said Raymond Kelzer from Pueblo, Colorado, who's in the Tri Cities to visit his daughter.
The airport was busy Tuesday with travelers trying to rebook their flights, however many can't get out for a few days.
"A lot of our folks, they've been going up to Spokane and flying out. We've had seats available out of Spokane. We don't have many seats so they've been booked out to Thursday or Friday, out to Christmas Eve," said Andrew Dorman from Horizon Air.
Early Wednesday morning flights have already been canceled out of Tri Cities and Yakima, however the fog is expected to lift by late morning, so later flights are still listed as on schedule.
Dorman says if you're flying out Wednesday, or are going to the airport to pick someone up, it's a good idea to check with the airline either online or by calling to find out what the status of the flight is.

description.hltext_display: 【有馬記念】スポニチ予想陣討論４ ルーラーシップに勝負気配 （競馬）
description.content:
Photo By スポニチ
【スポニチ予想陣緊急討論４】矢内デスク 昨年の１、２着馬のジャッジがきっちり明暗を分けたところで、次の話題にいってくれ！！今年は３歳馬が目立っているよな。
浜田 僕はジャパンＣで◎ヴィクトワールピサ、○ローズキングダムに打ったし、現実にあそこまで頑張った。有馬でも注目してます。
鈴木 先週の栗東ではルーラーシップに勝負気配を感じましたよ。鳴尾記念を岩田で勝ったのに、本番はルメール。ノーザンファームの執念を感じませんか。
鳥谷越 実はこの馬、正月版でダービー候補に推したけど…。
岡本 阪神外回りや東京でズドーンというイメージで、中山を経験してないのはどうかな？
万哲 ルーラーは怖い１頭。確かに中山未経験は引っ掛かるけど、経緯はともかく、最終的にルメールが乗っている現実も不気味。ほかにも３歳は充実しているし、昨年の上位２頭を崩せば３歳から出るのでは。
鳥谷越 確かに今年の３歳は強力。
鈴木 僕も３歳に実は注目馬が…。
万哲 寺下君も３歳派？
寺下 いや、僕は…。
[ 2010年12月22日 07:40 ]
ＰＲ

description.hltext_display: Ministrul britanic pentru Afaceri, Vince Cable, "a declarat razboi" magnatului media Rupert Murdoch
description.content:
Ministrul britanic pentru Afaceri, Vince Cable, a spus unor reporteri sub acoperire ca "a declarat razboi" magnatului media Rupert Murdoch (foto), care vrea sa preia integral compania BSkyB, si are de gand sa castige, comentariu care il poate costa functia si ar putea destabiliza coalitia.
News Corp, grup detinut de Murdoch, vrea sa cumpere participatia de 61% pe care nu o detine inca la operatorul de televiziune prin abonament BSkyB, pentru 7,8 miliarde de lire sterline (12,2 miliarde dolari), pentru a consolida compania la a carei dezvoltare a contribuit, transmite agentia Reuters, citata de Mediafax.
Comisia Europeanaa aprobat neconditionat oferta de preluare, dar decizia finala privind continuarea tranzactiei depinde de Cable.
Ministerul condus de Cable nu a comentat informatiile.
Cable este unul dintre cei mai cunoscuti membri ai liberal-democratilor, partenerul Partidului Conservator in guvern. Plecarea lui Cable risca sa destabilizeze coalitia care a format guvernul in luna mai, care a aprobat un program drastic de austeritate.
"Am blocat oferta folosind prerogativele legale pe care le am. Nu pot politiza, dar stiu de la persoane in cunostinta de cauza ca este vorba de o chestiune de mare amploare", a afirmat Cable in fata reporterilor sub acoperire de la Daily Telegraph, inregistrarea conversatiei fiind difuzata de BBC.
News Corp, care detine publicatiile britanice The Sun, News of the World, Times si Sunday Times, a reactionat rapid.
"News Corporation este socata si ingrozita de comentariile lui Cable. Ridica serioase semne de intrebare despre corectitudinea procesului", se arata intr-un comunicat al companiei.
Laburistii din opozitie au afirmat ca remarcile provoaca dubii daca ministrul sa isi pastreze functia.
"Aceste comentarii pun sub semnul intrebarii capacitatea lui Cable de a-si exercita corect responsabilitatile in acest proces cvasi-judiciar", a declarat John Denham, purtator de cuvant al Partidului Laburst in probleme de afaceri.
Denham a mai spus ca ministrul ar trebui sa nu se mai implice deloc in decizia legata de oferta News Corp pentru BSkyB.
"Este dificil de vazut cum premierul David Cameron si liderul democrat-liberalilor, Nick Clegg, pot continua sa aiba incredere in Cable", a adaugat Denham.
Ministrul de Finante George Osborne si Danny Alexander, seful Trezoreriei, s-au grabit la resedinta premierului Cameron, dupa aparitia informatiilor.
Cable si-a cerut scuze pentru afirmatii. El a spus insa ca, daca va fi presat prea mult, dispune de "optiunea nucleara" de a se retrage si a prabusi guvernul.
In prezent, autoritatea de reglementare a pietei, Ofcom, analizeaza tranzactia pentru a vedea daca nu confera News Corp un control prea mare in media britanica, in privinta continutului, audientei, platformelor media si a companiilor de profil.

description.hltext_display: Sagsbehandling får filialer
description.content:
ATP opretter midlertidige filialer i Århus og Odense, når selskabet overtager den objektive sagsbehandling
Fra 2012 skal den objektive sagsbehandling på socialområdet flyttes fra kommunerne til fem centre i Frederikshavn, Haderslev, Hillerød, Holstebro og Vordingborg.
Men ATP, der får ansvar for Udbetaling Danmark, opretter i første omgang syv centre. To midlertidige filialer i Århus og Odense skal lette overgangen for de medarbejderne eller give dem tid til at finde et andet job.
Svært at holde på folk
Rasmus Edelberg, leder af KLfs sekretariat for Udbetaling Danmark, vurderer, at kommunerne på Fyn og i Østjylland vil få svært ved at holde på medarbejderne frem til overgangen i 2012.
- Afstanden til nærmeste center er så stor, at nogle medarbejdere givetvis vil lede efter anden beskæftigelse allerede nu. Risikoen påvirker muligheden for sikker drift i kommunerne, men også Udbetaling Danmarks drift i overgangsperioden, siger han.
Overvejer at søge væk
I Odense er social- og arbejdsmarkedsrådmand Peter Rahbæk Juel (S) tilfreds med beslutningen om at oprette de to filialer.
- Udsigten til at skulle til Haderslev hver dag har allerede fået mange af vores medarbejdere til at overveje at søge andet job. Sker det, at for mange siger op på én gang, mister vi stor kompetence på området, da vi i Odense har et stærkt fagligt miljø inden for objektiv sagsbehandling. Nu er vi imidlertid sikret ro til at få overdraget området til ATP på en ordentlig måde, siger han.
Filialen på Fyn skal høre under centret i Haderslev, mens Århus-filialen ligges under Holstebro. Filialerne skal eksisteret i et til to år.

description.hltext_display: MOSTI beri dana RM5.5 juta selidik Empurau
description.author: elya
description.content:
Oleh Dhia Daniel
KUCHING: Jabatan Pertanian Negeri Sarawak (JPNS) akan menerima dana sebanyak RM5.5 juta daripada Kementerian Sains, Teknologi dan Inovasi (MOSTI) bagi menjalankan kerja-kerja penyelidikan dan pembangunan (R&D) ikan Empurau di Stesen Pertanian Tarat.
Timbalan Ketua Menteri merangkap Menteri Pemodenan Pertanian, Datuk Patinggi Tan Sri Alfred Jabu Numpang berkata sebagai permulaan, RM1 juta daripada dana keseluruhan yang diperuntukkan di bawah Rancangan Malaysia Kesepuluh (RMK-10) itu akan diterima mulai tahun depan sebelum bakinya diserahkan dalam tempoh dua tahun selepas itu.
Pada masa sama jelasnya, status Stesen Pertanian Tarat di Serian turut akan dinaik taraf menjadi Pusat Penyelidikan dan Pembangunan Empurau yang terulung seumpamanya di peringkat nasional mahupun dunia.
Jabu berkata, "fokus utama kita (kerajaan) adalah untuk menternak ikan Empurau berikutan potensi besar ikan yang bernilai tinggi ini bagi tujuan pengkomersialan.
"Walaupun kita telah berjaya menternak ikan jenis ini di dalam sangkar, penyelidikan lanjut diperlukan beserta teknologi berdaya maju dan lengkap untuk meningkatkan pengkomersialan Empurau," katanya.
Beliau berkata demikian ketika berucap pada Majlis Anugerah Perkhidmatan Cemerlang (Tahun Penilaian 2009) dan Malam Jasamu Dikenang di Hotel Pullman malam semalam.
Seramai 164 warga kerja JPNS telah menerima Anugerah Perkhidmatan Cemerlang dengan 28 pesara turut diraikan pada majlis berkenaan.
Pembiayaan R&D
Sambil menambah, beliau memberitahu pembiayaan R&D daripada MOSTI itu juga akan memberi tumpuan terhadap penyelidikan untuk mendapatkan lebih banyak benih ikan Empurau.
"Di Stesen Pertanian Tarat, kita juga mampu melakukan proses aruhan pembiakan yang menghasilkan penetasan anak benih ikan jenis ini secara besar-besaran serta mempunyai nilai komersial yang tinggi," katanya.
Dalam pada itu, Jabu yang juga Menteri Pembangunan Luar Bandar memaklumkan jabatan yang diterajuinya itu turut bakal menerima peruntukan tambahan sebanyak RM19 juta bagi tempoh pelaksanaan projek di bawah RMK-10.
Dana itu katanya akan digunakan untuk membuka semula 18 buah stesen pertanian luar bandar di seluruh negeri Sarawak yang telah ditutup operasinya sebelum ini.
Beliau berkata, "tindakan membuka semua stesen ini adalah amat penting agar industri pertanian kita di Sarawak dapat digerak semula demi mempertingkatkan lagi kualiti hidup penduduk di kawasan luar bandar khususnya dalam mentransformasi pendapatan mereka ke tahap golongan berpendapatan tinggi," tambahnya.
"Antara stesen pertanian yang akan dibuka semula oleh kerajaan bagi tujuan tersebut ialah Stesen Pertanian Tarat (Serian), Stesen Pertanian Layar (Betong), Stesen Pertanian Sebiew (Bintulu) dan Stesen Pertanian Punang (Lawas)," katanya.

description.hltext_display: 神秘兮兮的 VAIO 平板電腦現身 FCC，明年一月二十號解密？ (0 回應)
description.author: Casper Kao
description.content:
沒多久前，一位VAIO Business Group的神秘客（都說哪來的了，何神秘之有？！）上傳了一份文件到FCC，目前只知道它跟『平板電腦』一類的產品有關，然後無線網路的部份僅支援WiFi上網（802.11b/g+單頻的n），型號部份有PCG-31211L、PCG-31311L、PCG-312xxL（xx不是髒話，而是尚未給正式編號）等。
以上那些看似不痛不癢的資訊，很抱歉，就是該文件目前僅公開的部份，Sony要求要將照片、使用手冊等資訊，藏龍到明年1/20以後再公開，不過想必Sony在CES 2011上面，應該就會讓大家一睹它的廬山真面目了吧？

description.hltext_display: Los técnicos corroboran que Acciona es la mejor puntuada para gestionar el agua de Cáceres
description.content:
El informe que hoy votará la mesa de Contratación del ayuntamiento concede a Acciona la máxima puntuación para gestionar el agua. Esta empresa logra 23,42 puntos, de un máximo de 40 que se asignan a la oferta técnica, y sobrepasa a Aqualia, 7,15, y a Aguas de Cáceres, 6,05. Este informe certifica que la oferta de Acciona cumple con todos los requisitos para que no se le tengan que restar puntos, motivo por el que se pone muy por encima de los otros dos candidatos.
En principio este informe podría contar con siete de los once votos de la mesa. Si saliese adelante, se da un paso importante en el proceso de adjudicación de la gestión del agua, al menos ya se cerraría la primera de las dos puntuaciones de las ofertas después de que han pasado dos meses desde que se inició el estudio de las propuestas técnicas.
La mesa tomó el lunes dos decisiones que han dado un vuelco al proceso de la adjudicación del concurso: excluir a Canal de Isabel II y revisar la puntuación de las ofertas técnicas. Lo que faltaba por decidir es si esta revisión de puntos afectaba a todos los licitadores que quedan (Aguas de Cáceres, Aqualia y Acciona) o solo a los dos primeros. Se trataba de un asunto que es fundamental, dado que el licitador que gane la parte técnica tiene muchas posibilidades de ganar el concurso, ya que en la oferta económica, que es la que queda aún por puntuar, las empresas ofrecen el máximo, lo que reduce una posible diferencia entre ellas.
La cuestión que se tenía que resolver era si las empresas aportaban en su propuesta técnica el dato de lo que iba a costar cada uno de los servicios que pueden prestar (personal, material, mantenimiento de redes...). El interventor y el secretario general del ayuntamiento habían coincidido en que la inclusión de dicho coste es básica para poder puntuar.
Según ambos, en base a la opinión del técnico de la Inspección de Servicios Municipales, Aguas y Aqualia no lo incluyen, por lo que no se podía contabilizar hasta 32 de los 40 puntos. La duda era si los costes incluidos por Acciona --gráfico-- son válidos.
Había dudas de la validez de los mismos expuestas por el PP y por una de las empresas licitadoras, Gestagua, que es el socio mayoritario de la sociedad Aguas de Cáceres. Estas dudas, expresadas el pasado lunes, se fundamentaban en una valoración que el jefe de la Inspección de Servicios Municipales planteó en un informe del pasado 13 de diciembre, que indica que los costes presentados por Acciona en su propuesta son datos "muy generales" y añade que no se usaron los datos económicos (costes) en el primer informe con las valoraciones de las ofertas "al no estar incluidos ni bien detallados en ninguna".
"En un principio se votará en contra --del nuevo informe--", indicó ayer Valentín Pacheco, viceportavoz del PP, que, no obstante, recordó que la decisión definitiva dependerá de los razonamientos que estén recogidos en la nueva puntuación (el viceportavoz hizo esta valoración antes de que el documento se repartiera a los grupos políticos).
En el informe que determina la nueva puntuación, rubricado por el jefe de Inspección de Servicios, se indica que tanto el interventor como la secretaría general estiman que son "suficientes" los costes que se incluyen en la oferta de Acciona y que por lo tanto se pueden valorar. El resultado es que Acciona gana la puntuación técnica del concurso.
ESCRITO DE CANAL En el informe ya no está Canal. La empresa presentó el lunes un escrito en el registro del ayuntamiento solicitando medidas provisionales (no sería un recurso en sí) y que se continúen abriendo todos los sobres de su oferta hasta que se produzca la adjudicación definitiva para evitar perjuicios mayores a esta empresa. Sería una medida previa a la presentación del recurso en sí contra su exclusión del concurso.
El comité de empresa de Canal se pronunció ayer en el mismo sentido y calificó de "error de graves consecuencias" la exclusión cuando había "dos informes favorables a la no exclusión contra uno".
Preguntado por la petición de Canal, el presidente de la mesa, Lorenzo de la Calle, indicó en una primera impresión, a la espera de analizar en profundidad la solicitud, que tiene que hacer valer el acuerdo de la mesa, exclusión de Canal, y que los intereses de Cáceres y la necesidad de resolver el concurso prevalecen en esta situación.Intervención y secretaría reafirman que es la única que cumple las condiciones y se pone a la cabeza del concurso.Canal de Isabel II pide como medida ´cautelar´ que se siga tramitando su oferta hasta la adjudicación del concurso.

description.hltext_display: U.S. Census Bureau announces 2010 Census population counts -- apportionment counts delivered to President
description.author: U.S. Census Bureau
description.content:
Census population counts -- apportionment counts delivered to President
By U.S. Census Bureau
Dec 22, 2010 The U.S. Census Bureau announced Tuesday, December 21, 2010 that the 2010 Census showed the resident population of the United States on April 1, 2010, was 308,745,538.
Click on link: http://2010.census.gov/2010census/data/ and then click on each state to see state to state information.
The resident population represented an increase of 9.7 percent over the 2000 U.S. resident population of 281,421,906. Commerce Secretary Gary Locke, Acting Commerce Deputy Secretary Rebecca Blank and Census Bureau Director Robert Groves unveiled the official counts at the National Press Club in Washington, D.C.
"A big thanks to the American public for its overwhelming response to the 2010 Census," U.S. Commerce Secretary Gary Locke said. "The result was a successful count that came in on time and well under budget, with a final 2010 Census savings of $1.87 billion."
Rebecca Blank, now Acting Deputy Secretary of Commerce who has overseen the 2010 Census as Under Secretary for Economic Affairs, echoed Locke. "The 2010 Census was a massive undertaking, and in reporting these first results, we renew our commitment to our great American democracy peacefully, fairly and openly for the 23rd time in our nation's history."
The U.S. resident population represents the total number of people in the 50 states and the District of Columbia.
The most populous state was California (37,253,956); the least populous, Wyoming (563,626). The state that gained the most numerically since the 2000 Census was Texas (up 4,293,741 to 25,145,561) and the state that gained the most as a percentage of its 2000 Census count was Nevada (up 35.1% to 2,700,551).
Regionally, the South and the West picked up the bulk of the population increase, 14,318,924 and 8,747,621, respectively. But the Northeast and the Midwest also grew: 1,722,862 and 2,534,225.
Additionally, Puerto Rico's resident population was 3,725,789, a 2.2 percent decrease over the number counted a decade earlier.
Just before today's announcement, Locke delivered the apportionment counts to President Obama, 10 days before the statutory deadline of Dec. 31. The apportionment totals were calculated by a congressionally defined formula, in accordance with Title 2 of the U.S. Code, to divide among the states the 435 seats in the U.S. House of Representatives. The apportionment population consists of the resident population of the 50 states, plus the overseas military and federal civilian employees and their dependents living with them who could be allocated to a state. Each member of the House represents, on average, about 710,767 people. The populations of the District of Columbia and Puerto Rico are excluded from the apportionment population, as they do not have voting seats in Congress.
"The decennial count has been the basis for our representative form of government since 1790," Groves said. "At that time, each member of the House represented about 34,000 residents. Since then, the House has more than quadrupled in size, with each member now representing about 21 times as many constituents."
President Obama will transmit the apportionment counts to the 112th Congress during the first week of its first regular session in January. The reapportioned Congress will be the 113th, which convenes in January 2013.
Beginning in February and wrapping up by March 31, 2011, the Census Bureau will release demographic data to the states on a rolling basis so state governments can start the redistricting process.
In February and March well begin to see the portrait of America really take shape, as each state receives local-level 2010 Census data on race, Hispanic origin and the voting age population. As required by law, the Census Bureau will provide these key demographic data to the states (on a state-by-state basis), so the state governments can redraw the boundaries of their U.S. Congressional and state legislative districts.
Article I, Section 2 of the U.S. Constitution calls for a census of the nation's population every 10 years to apportion the House seats among the states. The 2010 Census is the 23rd census in our nation's history. ©

event_or_fact.property: A big thanks to the American public for its overwhelming response to the 2010 Census; The result was a successful count that came in on time and well under budget, with a final 2010 Census savings of $1.87 billion.

description.hltext_display: [아시안컵] 뒤숭숭한 일본 대표팀, 문� �가 ...
description.content:
[일간스포츠 장치혁] 일본 대표팀은 뒤숭숭하다. 주전 수비수들의 부상이 걱정인 가운데 선수들은 단체행동을 벌이며 일본축구협회와 대립하고 있다.
중앙 수비 잇단 부상
일본은 주전 센터백 없이 아시안컵을 치러야 할지도 모른다. 툴리오(29·나고야)의 결장은 이미 확정됐다. 오른쪽 무릎 내측 인대 부상으로 지난 5일 발표된 예비명단에 빠졌다. 8일 고향인 브라질로 돌아가 수술을 받고 내년 시즌을 준비하고 있다. 강인한 투지로 일본 대표팀의 사기를 좌우하는데다 세트피스 상황 때 공격가담 능력이 좋은 그의 부재는 클 수밖에 없다.
툴리오의 센터백 파트너 나카자와 유지(32·요코하마)도 출전을 장담할 수 없다. 왼쪽 무릎 부상 때문에 2달간 전력에서 제외된 그는 부상 회복 후 재차 부상을 당해 재활을 해왔다. 이달 초 팀훈련에 합류했지만, 빨라야 1월부터 경기출전이 가능하다. 실전감각을 회복하려면 시간이 더 필요하다. 오랫동안 일본 대표팀의 주장을 맡아온 나카자와의 결장 역시 일본에는 큰 일이다.
출전 수당 놓고 갈등
이런 가운데 일본축구협회와 선수단은 대표팀 수당을 놓고 맞서고 있다. 일본프로축구선수회(JPFA)는 일본축구협회에 4가지 요구조건을 제시했다. ▶10~20만엔(약 130~260만원)인 승리수당을 유럽 수준인 100만엔(약 1300만원)으로 인상 ▶대표선수 초상권 수입분배 ▶대표선수 부상 시 보상 ▶J-리그 연금제도 창설을 등 이다. 합의가 안될 경우 평가전 보이콧까지 불사한다는 강경한 태도다.
양측이 물밑 협상을 시작했지만 원만한 타협을 기대하긴 어렵다. 오구라 준지 일본축구협회 회장은 "보이콧를 하겠다고? 그렇게 해보라. 대표팀에서 뛰고 싶은 선수로 경기를 하면 된다"며 발끈했다. 그는 "아시안컵 상금은 1엔도 없다. 수십억엔이 우승상금으로 걸려 있는 유럽선수권과는 상황이 틀리다"며 항변하고 있다.
해외파 활약이 위안
감정의 골이 깊어가고 있지만 해외파 활약은 그나마 위안거리다. 독일 분데스리가에서 전반기를 마친 대표 멤버들이 속속 금의환향했다. 올 시즌 8골을 넣은 가가와 신지(도르트문트)를 비롯해, 이적 첫 시즌부터 선발출전 기회를 늘려간 우치다 아쓰토(샬케) 역시 이적 첫 시즌 연착륙에 성공했다.
알베르토 자케로니 일본 대표팀 감독은 일본 선수들이 속한 이탈리아 팀을 방문해 차출에 문제 없도록 협조를 구했다. 브라질 월드컵을 대비해 예비명단에 젊은 선수를 대거 발탁했다. 감독의 의욕은 넘치지만 현실의 상황은 만만찮다.
Tip… 주전 골키퍼 나라자키 세이고(나고야)가 지난 9월 은퇴를 선언하면서 일본은 갑작스레 세대교체를 맞았다. 현재 주전 골키퍼는 가와시마 에이지(27·리르세)다. 올시즌부터 벨기에 리그로 진출했다. 2007년부터 대표팀에 발탁됐지만 A매치 15경기 출장 정도로 경험은 많지 않다. 순발력과 킥, 그리고 펀칭 능력이 좋다. 특히 페널티킥에 강해 팬들에게 인기가 높다.
장치혁 기자 [jangta@joongang.co.kr]

▶ 강승윤·YG 극비 회동, 예상치 못한 만남에？

description.hltext_display: CATANIA: LOTTA STUDENTESCA COLORA DI ROSSO FONTANE CITTADINE
description.content: CATANIA (ITALPRESS) - In concomitanza con la discussione in Senato della riforma Gelmini, i militanti di Lotta Studentesca hanno simultaneamente colorato di rosso stamattina l'acqua delle fontane di un centinaio di citta' italiane. A Catania interessate alcune fontane del centro cittadino e della provincia. Secondo Gaetano Bonanno, responsabile provinciale del movimento giovanile Forza Nuova "il blitz vuole stigmatizzare cio' che sta succedendo in questi istanti nelle stanze del potere italiano: verranno tagliati fondi alla scuola pubblica - un miliardo di euro solo per quest'anno -, verra' distrutto il libero sapere e la ricerca delle universita' per metterle in mano ad enti privati". (ITALPRESS). abr/com 22-Dic-10 09:06 NNNN

description.hltext_display: Protest der bayerischen Hausärzte Die Wunden der Ärzte
description.content:
Steigen Bayerns Hausärzte aus dem Kassensystem aus? Durchaus möglich. Doch so einen radikalen Weg wählt nur, wer sich aufs äußerte provoziert fühlt.
Im Märchen vom Fischer und seiner Frau angelt ein Mann einen Fisch, der eigentlich ein verwunschener Prinz ist. Weil er ihn wieder frei lässt, erfüllt der Fisch ihm fortan jeden Wunsch: erst ein Haus, dann ein Schloss und schließlich einen Palast. Am Ende aber wird der Mann maßlos in seinen Wünschen - und verliert alles.
Bayerns Hausärzte haben eine wichtige Entscheidung zu treffen: Sollen sie ihre KAssenzulassung zurückgeben? Der Ausgang der Abstimmung am morgigen Mittwoch ist ungewiss. (Archiv) (© dpa)
Wer die Proteste der bayerischen Hausärzte beobachtet, kann sich fragen, ob den Medizinern Ähnliches droht. Auch sie haben viel erkämpft: Unter den Hausärzten in Deutschland verdienen die bayerischen am besten. Sie haben außerdem Extra-Honorare mit den Krankenkassen durchgesetzt, die ihre Umsätze nochmal um 25 Prozent verbessert haben und die Bundesgesundheitsminister Philipp Rösler nun abschafft. Deshalb wollen die Ärzte aus dem System aussteigen - und könnten darüber am Ende all ihre Privilegien verlieren.
In Bayern tobt ein Kampf, den viele Patienten nicht mehr verstehen, den aber Ärzte in ganz Deutschland genau beobachten. Ausgerechnet jene Mediziner, die so viel erstritten haben, wollen nun kollektiv ihre Kassenzulassung zurückgeben. Der so provozierte Notstand soll die Kassen zwingen, ihnen weiterhin die Extra-Honorare anzubieten. Sollten die Ärzte den Schritt wirklich wagen und Erfolg haben, könnten andere Arztgruppen in Deutschland folgen.
Für die Hausärzte steht viel auf dem Spiel: Wer im überversorgten Bayern einmal seine Zulassung abgibt, bekommt sie nicht mehr zurück. Verlieren die Ärzte also den Machtkampf, verlieren sie auch ihre Existenzgrundlage.
Einen derart radikalen Weg schlägt nur ein, wer sich aufs äußerste provoziert fühlt. Tatsächlich haben die Allgemeinmediziner Grund zum Ärger. Schließlich hat Minister Rösler ihnen eine ihrer größten Errungenschaften genommen. Damit ist eine wunderschöne Einnahmequelle der Ärzte erst einmal tot. Das schmerzt und passt auch nicht zu dem Loblied, dass der Minister sonst auf die Landärzte singt. Seine Idee, Hausärzte mit allerlei Anreizen aufs Land zu locken, müssen die Mediziner als Hohn empfinden, da er zugleich ihre Verdienste beschränkt.
Der Schmerz über den Verlust der gerade erkämpften Privilegien allein erklärt die Wut der Mediziner aber nicht. Die Hausärzte fühlen sich in dem System der ärztlichen Selbstverwaltung seit jeher benachteiligt. Tatsächlich hatten in der Interessenvertretung der Ärzte lange die Fachärzte das Sagen. Gerätemedizin wurde höher angesehen und auch besser bezahlt als die sprechende Medizin.
(Sie sind jetzt auf Seite 1 von 2) nächste Seite
In diesem Artikel:
Sie lesen jetzt Die Wunden der Ärzte

description.hltext_display: Tar farväl med "Drottningoffret"
description.content:
Det började med en kronprinsessa och slutar med ett drottningoffer. I jul sänder SVT den sista delen av Hanne Vibeke Holsts trilogi om kvinnor och makt i politiken. (""); Stockholm. De kallar sig för ett kvinnligt A-team. Regissören, manusförfattarna och huvudrollsinnehavarna i "Drottningoffret" är alla kvinnor - en ovanlighet i en mansdominerad bransch. Men i en tv-serie som skildrar kvinnors förhållande till makt hade något annat varit otänkbart.
— Den här produktionen är kvinnodominerad. Det drar upp statistiken i branschen så att den inte blir så pinsam, konstaterar regissören Kathrine Windfeld.
Det är sex år sedan tv-tittarna för första gången fick stifta bekantskap med den unga, idealistiska miljöministern Charlotte Ekeblad och hennes kollegor och politiska fiender. "Kronprinsessan" innebar ett genombrott för den danska regissören Kathrine Windfeld, liksom skådespelaren Alexandra Rapaport. I "Drottningoffret", som börjar sändas den 27 december, är det dags att knyta ihop trådarna och ta farväl av Charlotte Ekeblad och de andra karaktärerna.
— Jag kommer inte att sakna min Charlotte-roll. Den har jag gjort nu - men jag kommer att sakna sammanhanget och mina kollegor. Det här har varit ren lyx att jobba med, säger Alexandra Rapaport.
Ordet "lyxproduktion" nämns ofta under mötet med Alexandra Rapaport, skådespelarkollegan Suzanne Reuter och regissören Kathrine Windfeld. SVT har satsat ordentligt på filmatiseringen av Hanne Vibeke Holsts tre romaner och inte prutat på kvaliteten.
I "Drottningoffret" är det Elizabeth Meyer, socialdemokraternas partiordförande, som står i centrum. Suzanne Reuters rollfigur får mitt under brinnande valrörelse veta att hon lider av Alzheimers sjukdom. Hon bestämmer sig dock för att dölja sin sjukdom och genomföra valrörelsen.
För de allra flesta är Suzanne Reuter mest känd för sina komiska roller. I "Drottningoffret" ger hon visserligen prov på sin komiska tajming, men får också spela ut hela sitt dramatiska register i en ångestladdad skildring av begynnande demens.
— Jag har träffat folk som har fått diagnosen alzheimer, det är alltid intressant att göra sådan research. Men mestadels har jag använt mig av texten och jag vet inte, lurats och härmats, säger Suzanne Reuter.
Tv-serien innebar också att Suzanne Reuter för första gången fick spela mot sin egen mamma, 84-åriga skådespelerskan Bojan Westin som gör rollen som Elisabeth Meyers moster. En upplevelse, inte minst för tv-tittarna, hävdar Kathrine Windfeld.
— När de står i bild tillsammans uppstår en magi som är obetalbar. Deras relation har ju varat i nästan 60 år - thank you! säger hon.
Även om det är svårt att skiljas från Hanne Vibeke Holst-trilogin gläder sig teamet åt det beröm som tv-filmatiseringen fått under årens lopp. Lovorden har kommit ända från Rosenbad.
— När Göran Persson fick frågan vilken som var den bästa film han sett under året svarade han "Kronprinsessan". Det var väldigt roligt, säger Kathrine Windfeld. TT

description.hltext_display: Premier business leaders to debate the Asian Voice in World Shipping at key maritime event in Singapore, SEA ASIA
description.content:
Key players representing major maritime sectors will unite in Singapore for three days next April from 12th to 14th to project The Asian Voice in World Shipping.
The central theme of SEA ASIA, the region’s leading maritime event, the Asian Voice is to be debated by top executives of leading international companies from China, India, Japan and Singapore among others as they tackle this challenging subject.
“Over 50% of the world fleet is being owned and operated in Asia and 85% of global shipbuilding capacity based in the region. The Asian maritime players play a vital role in global shipping and Sea Asia’s aim is to reflect that and discuss ways in which Asia can ensure that its voice is heard clearly and coherently on the global stage,” said Christopher Hayman, Chairman of co-organiser Seatrade.
The first day of SEA ASIA’s conference (12th April) will focus on the central theme, The Asian Voice in World Shipping, with the first session on Container Shipping & Logistics and the second on the Major Bulk Trades.
Pacific International Lines’ (PIL) MD and President of the Singapore Shipping Association, S.S.Teo, will chair the container and logistics session, which explores the scale and rate of the economic recovery and its implications for both container operators and cargo interests in international and intra-Asian trades. Speakers for this session will include APL’s President Eng Aik Meng, “K” Line’s President and CEO Kenichi Kuroya, Maersk Line and the Container Business’ CEO Eivind Kolding, SK Shipping’s CEO Dr Kyuho Wang, SITC International Holdings Company’s Chairman and Executive Director Yang Shaopeng, and Wan Hai Lines’ Special Assistant to the President Randy Chen.
Yudhishthir Khatau, Vice Chairman and MD of India’s Varun Shipping, also President Designate of the Baltic & International Maritime Council (BIMCO), will chair the session on major bulk trades, examining prospects for dry and liquid bulk trades in light of recovery-led growth vis-à-vis demand, and an expanding fleet. Speakers for this session will include TCC Group’s Group Chairman and CEO Kenneth Koo, among others.
The second day of SEA ASIA (13th April) will deal with ship finance, cardinal aspects of the LNG market and other wide-ranging technical issues.
Two sessions on ship finance will run during the day, the first on the Global Ship Finance Market and the State of the Shipping Industry. This will be chaired by Harald Serck-Hanssen, Global Head of Shipping, Offshore and Logistics at DnB NOR ASA, with key leaders from other banks including Standard Chartered Bank and DVB Bank SE focusing on supply/demand for the major sectors, making sense of the orderbook and scale of cancellations and deferrals, and looking at changing trends in traditional relationships in shipping, and the move by pure charterers into ship owning. Continued momentum of the offshore sector will also be on the agenda.
The second session will address Alternative Instruments of Ship Finance. Chaired by Philip Clausius, President and CEO of FSL Trust Management, speakers including Eton Park Capital Management’s Senior MD and Partner Andreas Beroutsos, Seaspan Corporation’s Director and Tiger Group’s Chairman Graham Porter as well as Delphin Shipping’s President Andreas B. Polvsen will assess the availability and cost of finance for shipping in Asia, the expanding shipping portfolio of the Chinese banks, equity and the capital markets, alternative sources of capital (including hedge funds), and private equity and Asian family funds.
LNG Activities in the Far East will also be debated in a parallel session that day, chaired by the Society of International Tanker and Terminal Operators’ (SIGTTO) Principal Technical Advisor, Roger Roue. Presentations will include Coal bed methane projects in Queensland (LNG Limited), LNGC ship repair (Sembawang Shipyard), and Fibre-optic ship-to-shore links for ESD systems (NFI Limited).
The second day is also designated Technical Day and will feature two sessions addressing Regulations, Rules and Legislation (with opening remarks by Ueda Noburu, Chairman and President of Japan’s Class NK, also Chairman of IACS Council), and Sustainable Approaches to Technology – featuring a new presentation from Siemens on the benefits and paybacks of green ship technology, among others. There will also be an open-floor debate on HazId/HazOp: prescriptive versus qualitative.
The last day of SEA ASIA (14th April) will be dominated by the offshore & energy sector, with sessions on Drivers of the Offshore Industry in Asia and the Interface with the Asian Maritime Sector. The first, debating China’s exploration and production strategy, the extent of India’s offshore commitment to meets its energy needs, and subjects under the broad umbrella of offshore drilling, will be chaired by BW Maritime, Group CEO, Andreas Sohmen-Pao. The second, which will look closely at opportunities created in and for Asia’s maritime sector by the offshore energy industry, will be chaired by CH Tong, CEO of Keppel Offshore & Marine.
As SEA ASIA delivers a siren call to the international maritime community, now recovering from the global economic crisis, Seatrade and co-organising partner, Singapore Maritime Foundation (SMF) have reported satisfaction with the event’s continued growth and reputation – not only as a platform for the exchange of knowledge and opinion, but as a recovery tool for sales and marketing teams seeking to expand customer bases.
More than 80% of the exhibition space has already been booked by over 200 companies from close to 40 countries, and the organisers confidently expect to surpass the numbers of the last SEA ASIA, when over 10,000 executives from 62 countries came for the three-day event. The three-day event at Marina Bay Sands is expected to host over 12,000 participants. SEA ASIA 2011 is principally sponsored by DnB NOR Bank ASA, Executive Ship Management, Lloyd’s Register, NOL Group and RightShip. Other sponsors include ABB Pte. Ltd., ABS, Nippon Kaiji Kyokai (ClassNK), DNV, DVB Bank, GAC, HMS Far East Pte Ltd, Ince & Co, Jurong Port, Keppel Offshore & Marine, MTM Ship Management, Panama Maritime Authority, Pacific International Lines (PIL), PSA, Sembcorp Marine, ShipServ, Standard Chartered Bank, The Standard P&I Club, Tiger Oil Marine and V.Ships.
For more information about SEA ASIA, go to www.sea-asia.com.

description.hltext_display: BE Group AB: BE Group levererar 1 450 ton stålbalk till Peab Grundläggning
description.content:
BE Group Sverige AB har vunnit en affär för att under perioden december
2010 till februari 2011 leverera cirka 1 450 ton stålbalk till Peab
Grundläggning.
Stålbalken levereras från BE Group i fullastade järnvägsvagnar och ska
användas till en bro som behövs för att genomföra pålningen av en pir i
Gävle Hamn. Ordervärdet uppgår till cirka 9 Mkr.
"Balk är ett av de produktsegment där BE Group är som allra starkast och
det känns mycket positivt att gå in i 2011 med denna typ av projekt",
kommenterar Stefan Eklund som är affärsområdeschef för BE Group Sverige.
Vid frågor, vänligen kontakta:

description.hltext_display: Fandango do Pontal se apresenta no Engenho de Folguedos
Where’s the beef?
description.content:
Jerky business is up at Old Trapper, and the company’s adding square feet and employees
Signs of life are often hard to find in the dim conditions of the Great Recession, but in Forest Grove, economic growth can be found in a packet of beef jerky.
Old Trapper Smoked Products, a family-run beef jerky manufacturer, is gearing up for a big expansion, paid for with the proceeds of strong sales despite the weak economy.
In February, Old Trapper will open the doors of its new factory, which will be almost twice the size of their current one.
“We’re expanding our processing areas, adding smokehouses and adding equipment that allows us to produce and sell more product,” said Eric Evenson of Old Trapper.
The expansion is good news for a city that’s been hard hit by the economic turmoil of the past two years, during which good-paying jobs at companies like Cedar Canyon or Times-Litho have disappeared.
“We didn’t have any layoffs,” Evenson said. “We’re not in an industry that was hurt significantly. Our items are impulse, immediate, consumable.”
Shoppers still grabbing jerky
Despite the trend of “buying down,” or substituting a lower cost brand for a premium brand, according to Richard Kosesan, executive director of the Oregon Neighborhood Store Association, Old Trapper remained strong through the recession.
Hugh Zheng, who owns Hello Market in Forest Grove, was impressed with how well Old Trapper’s products performed right through the recession, in part because impulse buys were not greatly affected by the downturn.
“[Old Trapper’s] product, according to my observation of about eight years, is really, really recession-proof,” Zheng said.
Instead, he said, beef jerky sales are more dependent on the season.
“Sales spike in two seasons, summer and late fall … fishing, hunting, especially outdoor [activities], what else would you take with you? People take beef jerky,” Zheng said. “People, especially in our area, are constantly looking for protein.”
Zheng isn’t the only one impressed by how Old Trapper weather

description.hltext_display: Fondpengar till Lundaforskare
description.content:
(""); Lund. Hjärtkirurg Johan Nilsson, biträdande överläkare vid Skånes universitetssjukhus i Lund, får ett treårigt stöd för sin forskning kring hjärttransplantationer. Pengarna kommer från Hjärt-Lungfonden.
Han forskning ska leda till att fler överlever efter en hjärttransplantation.
"Trots förbättrade resultat så dör drygt 18 procent av patienterna första året. Målet är att förbättra matchningen mellan donator och patient med målet att halvera dödligheten under första året efter en hjärttransplantation", säger han i ett pressmeddelande. TT

description.hltext_display: 2011年數位廣告5大預測
description.author: TechOrange
description.content:
隨著大批消費者聚集在社群網站，主流社群網站正積極開發新的廣告產品，滿足品牌行銷的需求。美國科技部落格Mashable特別在年終預測了2011年網路廣告5大趨勢：
｜辨識消費者所在位置而發送的地方性廣告將繼續增加
Facebook、Foursquare、Yelp、Google等網站都能根據消費者所在位置提供交易或優惠券。其中Facebook和Google擁有強大的社交數據，最能促成讓消費者滿足需求的「客製化交易」。
｜名人明星將在社群發揮影響力
越來越多消費者依賴社群網站的訊息來決定今天要到哪吃飯、買哪款商品、旅行要住哪家飯店。眾多品牌正努力分析社群網站的文章和評論，試圖了解誰擁有最多的觀眾，能發揮最大的影響力，讓粉絲們甘願跟隨名人掏錢消費。
｜小社群變成主流
最適社群規模可能不是動輒上萬人的大型社群，而是50人小社群。Facebook也意識到人們更喜歡小社群互動，因此推出新群組功能，可以把朋友再細分不同群組，例如同事、家人、有相同興趣的朋友，社群互動將更加聚焦且深入（有些言論再也不會讓主管或不相干的人看到）。
｜品牌變得更像媒體公司
品牌不再侷限於透過廣告代理商或公關公司幫忙傳播訊息，更多的預算將投入在經營社群媒體，製作更高品質的內容。
｜「Facebook讚」對品牌非常重要
消費者按了「 讚」等於建立起和產品的關係。 精明的品牌或代理商可以利用新技術同時展示1萬種以上的廣告，並在消費者按「讚」之後直接導去付費購物，如此就能精準追蹤廣告效益，不用再像過去為了挑哪一支廣告好，還要找焦點團體來測試。
（消息、圖片來源：Mashable）
Go to Source

description.hltext_display: PALERMO: NUOVA PROTESTA STUDENTI, GIORNATA DIFFICILE PER AUTOMOBILISTI
description.content: PALERMO (ITALPRESS) - Si prepara un'altra giornata difficile per gli automobilisti palermitani, alle prese con l'ennesima protesta degli studenti contro la riforma Gelmini. Previsto l'"assedio", come e' stato definito, "dei palazzi del potere - Comune, Provincia, Regione - ed economici, Confindustria, oltre che delle sedi dei partiti, per ribadire la distanza da tutta la costellazione partitica-istituzionale e da tutto il ceto politico e parlamentare". Tre i cortei previsti fino a questo momento: partiranno dalla facolta' di Lettere di viale delle Scienze, da quella di Scienze di via Archirafi, mentre gli studenti medi si sono dati appuntamento in piazza Politeama. (ITALPRESS). abr/red 22-Dic-10 09:00 NNNN

description.hltext_display: Prudent capex funding key to yarn mills' profitability
description.content:
/p> More recently, south-based KPR Mill Ltd announced an addition of 1.5 lakh spindles to its existing capacity of 2.2 lakh spindles per annum.
The going has been good for yarn mills for the past five quarters: Resurgent demand for yarn from the garments industry has helped them bounce back from the throes of global recession, despite soaring cotton prices. Most yarn mills are operating at high utilization rates of at least 90%. Besides, industry estimates indicate a 10-11% increase in demand for cotton yarn over the next couple of years. Together, these signal a coming capacity expansion. A report by rating agency Crisil Ltd that covered 156 spinning units accounting for around 30% of the country's total capacity says, "Capital expenditure (capex) may be necessitated because operating rates in the industry are already high, and current capacities may not be sufficient to meet expected demand." For example, integrated textile company Alok Industries Ltd added around 68,000 spindles taking its total capacity to 4.2 lakh spindles per annum. More recently, south-based KPR Mill Ltd announced an addition of 1.5 lakh spindles to its existing capacity of 2.2 lakh spindles per annum.
This augurs well for cotton yarn spinners. Still, history has taught them lessons that merit a relook. After most companies added capacity in mid-2000s, they were hit by an unexpected global recession that saw their operating profit margins (OPMs) dropping by around 300-400 basis points year-on-year (y-o-y) to an average of around 13% in fiscal 2009. Debt-funded expansions compounded the problem. Despite getting a 5% interest subsidy, rising interest costs increased the debt-equity ratio of most firms. Interest costs as a percentage of sales rose, hurting profits. As revenues bounced back in fiscal 2010, textile firms such as Vardhman Textiles Ltd saw their net profit margin (NPM) jump to 9% from 6% in the previous year. In contrast, those such as Alok with higher interest burden registered a dip in NPM to 6% from 9% despite robust revenue expansion. Hence, it may be prudent for firms to take a cautious approach on capital structures given the cyclicality of the textile industry.
"Firms that plough back internal accruals and follow a judicious mix of debt and equity to fund capex could see improvement in credit risk profiles," says Gurpreet Chhatwal, director, Crisil Ratings. The agency's report further adds that the financial risk profiles of the firms under its coverage may deteriorate in the short-term. The sector's average interest coverage ratio (the ratio of profit to interest payout) dropped to 1.7 in fiscal 2009 from peak levels of 3 in fiscal 2007. Meanwhile, the government has also levied a cap on both exports of raw cotton and yarn for the year at 5.5 million bales and 720 million tonnes respectively which, in turn, could soften domestic prices. Analysts expect the OPM of yarn spinners to moderate from the present 16% to around 14% in the near term. Other factors, such as buyers' resistance to higher yarn prices, power costs and currency exchange rates could affect profitability too.

event_or_fact.property: Firms that plough back internal accruals and follow a judicious mix of debt and equity to fund capex could see improvement in credit risk profiles

description.hltext_display: Google laat vijf eeuwen boeken doorzoeken
description.content:
Het woord spiderman duikt al in de jaren 20 op in boeken, lang voor de superheld van Marvel zijn intrede maakte begin jaren 60. En de term smartphone werd al een eeuw voor de iPhone gebruikt en staat zwart op wit in boeken die dateren uit de jaren 1900. Hoe we dat weten? Door een nieuwe tool die Google heeft voorgesteld: Ngram Viewer. Met dit gereedschap kun je het gebruik van een specifiek woord of een zin achterhalen door te zien hoe vaak het opduikt in boeken van de laatste vijf eeuwen.
Vijf miljoen boeken doorzoeken De analyse van Ngram Viewer gebeurt uiteraard dankzij de gigantische hoeveelheid boeken die Google digitaliseert meer dan 15 miljoen sinds het project begon in 2004. Volgens Google gebruikt Ngram zowat een derde van dat aantal: vijf miljoen boeken, of ongeveer vier procent van alle boeken die ooit gepubliceerd zijn.
Door de meer dan 500 miljard unieke woorden uit de boeken te halen, kan de tool een overzicht geven van de geschiedenis van bepaalde woorden, en hun populariteit door de jaren heen.
Verschillende talen Ngram Viewer werkt eenvoudig. Als je een woord of een zinsnede (tot maximaal vijf woorden) ingeeft, krijg je een grafiek die aangeeft hoe vaak jouw term is voorgekomen het voorbije halve millennium. Standaard zoekt de tool in Engelstalige boeken, maar je kan dat specificeren (Amerikaans Engels, Brits Engels, Engelse fictie) of voor een andere taal kiezen (Chinees, Frans, Duits, Russisch of Spaans).
Net zoals bij Google Trends kun je verschillende zoektermen ingeven die je wilt vergelijken. Dat doe je door ze van elkaar te scheiden met een komma. De Ngram Viewer kan je wel vertellen hoe vaak een woord voorkomt, maar het geeft weinig context. Het is mogelijk om de periode waarin de resultaten opduiken te verfijnen en een overzicht te krijgen van de boeken waarin je woord vermeld wordt. Met wat geluk kan je de gedigitaliseerde paginas bekijken en krijg je zo een zeker inzicht over waarom het woord daar staat.
Hulp van Harvard Het project kreeg een duwtje in de rug door onderzoekers van Harvard, die Google de datasets bezorgden die nodig waren om de informatie te genereren. Science Magazine noemt het een kwalitatieve analyse van cultuur met behulp van miljoenen gedigitaliseerde boeken. Ngram Viewer lijkt vooral nuttig voor onderzoekers en lingusten, maar iedereen met affiniteit voor woorden, en voor de geschiedenis en de evolutie van taal zal er het nodige plezier aan beleven.
bron: ZDNet

description.hltext_display: New mayor in Cornelius wants city manager out
description.content:
Mayor-elect Neal Knight says he doesn’t believe he can work with manager Dave Waffle
On Monday, Cornelius City Manager Dave Waffle was asked to resign. The man doing the asking is Neal Knight, who beat the sitting mayor, Bill Bash, in the November election.
Knight won’t take office until January and Waffle hasn’t given up his job yet, but so far it looks as if his ouster is in the cards.
That’s because joining Knight on the new city council are two allies, Jamie Minshall and Mari Gottwald. Both beat incumbent city councilors and so far have stood resolutely behind Knight’s decisions.
When the three take their seats on Jan. 3, they’ll have the votes to fire Waffle, an outcome Knight says he'd rather avoid by having Waffle walk away from the job.
But either way, Waffle said he expected to leave the city post soon.
“On or before the new council meets, I’ll be gone one way or another,” Waffle told the News-Times Tuesday.
The news of the ouster rankled sitting city councilor Steve Heinrich. “He’s stepping out of bounds,” Heinrich said. “He’s not mayor yet.”
But Heinrich says neither he nor the other councilor who will remain in January, Jeff Dalin, can do much to oppose Knight’s agenda. As long as Minshall and Gottwald vote with Knight, the council seems set to split 3-2.
“I won’t have a choice because the people voted in a gang,” Heinrich said.
Knight says he wished the situation could be better, but after being told to leave a pair of executive sessions of the city council and not being specifically invited to a meeting in Forest Grove with current and incoming elected officials, he says the relationship with Waffle has broken down.
“It isn’t like Dave’s this horrible, evil guy – it’s just that we haven’t been able to make things work together,” Knight said.
Knight indicated that he’d come to the conclusion the two couldn’t work together by the time Waffle had his damaged car towed to Knight’s auto body shop Monday.
Before starting work on the job, Knight felt like he had to say something.
“I didn’t feel right about fixing his car and making $10,000 off the guy and then saying, ‘By the way, you’re fired,’” Knight said.
But the ouster reminded some in Cornelius of the political ruckus caused by former mayor Terry Rilling, who wound up in the center of a political battle in 2005 that led to the ouster of then city manager Dick Kline.
Ralph Brown, a former mayor of Cornelius, said Knight was following in the footsteps of Rilling.
“He and [Knight] don’t know anything about politics,” Brown said. “They’re buffoons.”
Brown said if Waffle is ousted, the city would have a hard time finding a suitable replacement.
“They have no reason to fire the guy,” Brown said. “Who’s going to want the job if a person of his quality, with his experience, is fired with no reason at all?”
Severance pay could cost the city
If the city terminates Waffle, his contract requires the city to pay six months of salary, or about $55,578. The contract also mentions a requirement to provide health insurance for those four months, though it’s unclear in its wording if that would be an add

description.hltext_display: ENIRO: BANKERNA TAR NOLL I NYEMISSION - VD (OMS)
description.content:
(Förtydligar ingress)
STOCKHOLM (Direkt) Eniros långivande banker kommer
inte att behöva teckna någon andel i bolagets nyemission. Den
del av emissionen som inte tecknades via teckningsrätter går
till de externa garanterna, exempelvis Fjärde AP-fonden,
Skandia Liv och Zenit Asset Management.
Det bekräftar Eniros vd Johan Lindgren för
Nyhetsbyrån Direkt. "De externa garanterna tar 20 procent, det vill säga
Fjärde AP-fonden och så vidare. Bankerna tar noll", säger han till Nyhetsbyrån Direkt.
Den preliminära sammanräkningen visar att cirka 79
procent av de erbjudna aktierna i emissionen tecknades med
stöd av teckningsrätter.
Därutöver kommer preliminärt cirka 1,7 procent att
tilldelas personer som anmält sig för teckning utan stöd av
teckningsrätter.
Cirka 20 procent tilldelas det konsortium av banker
som åtagit sig att garantera hela företrädesemissionen, vilka
i sin tur kommer att omfördela samtliga dessa aktier till
undergaranterna. "För oss i bolaget är det oerhört positivt, det visar
att ägare och institutioner utanför banksektorn ändå ger oss
det förtroendet. Vi hade inte gillat scenariot att vara ägda av bankerna", fortsätter Johan Lindgren.
Bolagets nya ägarlista kommer att sammanställas i
slutet av året. Johan Lindgren säger sig i dagsläget inte ha
någon vetskap om någon ny ägare har tagit en större del av
emission.
På frågan hur status i verksamheten och i säljkåren i
dagsläget svarar han: "Man vänder inte Eniro på en femöring, det gör man
inte. Men vi har förberett oss väl för att komma in med en
bra start 2011. Det vi har guidat på i samband med rapporten
för det tredje kvartalet ser jag ingen anledning att ändra", säger Johan Lindgren.
Martin Hävner +46 8 5191 7919
Nyhetsbyrån Direkt

description.hltext_display: Dr Zeti terima Anugerah Pencapaian Sepanjang Hayat
description.author: elya
description.content:
KUALA LUMPUR: Gabenor Bank Negara Tan Sri Dr Zeti Akhtar Aziz menambah pingat kebesaran yang diterima apabila dirai dengan "Anugerah Pencapaian Sepanjang Hayat" pada Majlis Tahunan Anugerah Kewangan dan Perniagaan Islam Kelima di Dubai semalam.
Sementara itu, CIMB Islamic menerima anugerah bank komersial terbaik manakala Stadard Chartered Saadiq, Malaysia diisytihar sebagai bank antarabangsa terbaik.
Majlis Tahunan itu direkacipta untuk mengiktiraf, menggalak dan memberi anugerah terhadap prestasi dan pertumbuhan kewangan dan perniagaan yang cemerlang dalam masyarakat Islam.
Sementara hadiah-hadiah individu diberi kepada para profesional kewangan di mana sumbangan mereka yang cemerlang menyebabkan pertumbuhan baik sektor itu.
Dalam satu kenyataan pada 21 Disember, CPI Financial, penerbit majalah bulanan Kewangan dan Perniagaan Islam berkata, kategori korporat yang telah disenarai-pendek dikumpul oleh ahli-ahli panel hakim antarabangsa.
Maklumat yang dikumpul ini diberi kepada para pengundi bagi menentukan para pemenang di kalangan institusi terbaik manakala kategori individu dipilih berdasarkan undi secara tulisan.
Mereka menulis nama-nama individu dalam industri perkhidmatan kewangan Islam yang layak menerima anugerah.
-theedgefinancialdaily

description.hltext_display: Hausärzte vs. Krankenkassen Verliere ich den Arzt meines Vertrauens?
description.content:
Sollten sich die Hausärzte aus den Reihen der Kassenärzte verabschieden, hätte das weitreichende Konsequenzen für Patienten. Die wichtigsten Antworten im Überblick.
Der Erlanger IT-Fachmann Erwin Wirth ist nur einer unter Zigtausenden von Krankenversicherten in Bayern, die mit Sorge beobachten, wie der Konflikt zwischen den Hausärzten und den Krankenkassen eskaliert. "Ich bin keiner, der jetzt wegen jedem Wehwehchen zum Doktor rennt, aber ich habe doch Angst um meine Versorgung, wenn mein Hausarzt jetzt seine Kassenzulassung zurückgibt", sagt der 53-Jährige - auch wenn er die Motive seines Arztes voll verstehe. Er sei extra zur AOK Bayern hinübergewechselt, um sich in deren Hausarztvertrag einzuschreiben. Nun hat die Kasse den Hausarztvertrag als Antwort auf den drohenden Systemausstieg der Hausärzte aufgekündigt, und Erwin Wirth steht zwischen den Fronten. Anbei Fragen, die derzeit ihn und viele andere Versicherte beschäftigen.
Verliere ich den Arzt meines Vertrauens, wenn er seine Kassenzulassung zurückgibt?
Hausärzte, die ihre Kassenzulassung zurückgeben, dürfen nach der Übergangszeit bis Ende Juni 2011 grundsätzlich keine gesetzlich Versicherten mehr behandeln. Der Bayerische Hausärzteverband vertritt indes die Meinung, dass er nach einem kollektiven Systemausstieg eigene Verträge mit den Kassen durchsetzen kann. Ausgestiegene Hausärzte dürfen im Gegensatz zu ihren Kollegen, die im System bleiben, streiken. Diesen Weg halten Kassen und Staatsregierung jedoch für illegal. Wer sich in diesem Machtkampf durchsetzt - der, wenn er denn nun stattfindet, sehr lange dauern kann - ist aus Patientensicht völlig unberechenbar.
Gibt es Ausnahmen, die weiterhin eine Behandlung auf Chipkarte ermöglichen?
Grundsätzlich gilt: "Gesetzlich Versicherte haben das Recht auf freie Arztwahl", sagt Gabriele Hartl, die Patientenbeauftragte der Staatsregierung. Aber: Versicherte können von einem Arzt ohne Kassenzulassung nur noch als Privatpatienten behandelt werden. Die Kassen übernehmen die Kosten nicht. Es gibt allerdings Ausnahmen. Findet die Kasse bei unaufschiebbaren Behandlungen keinen anderen Kassenarzt, der den Patienten übernehmen kann, so muss sie ihrem Versicherten mitteilen, dass ein "Systemversagen" vorliegt. Sodann hat sie auch die Behandlungskosten zu übernehmen.
Und wie sieht es im Notfall aus?
In Notfällen ist jeder approbierte Arzt zur Behandlung verpflichtet, die Kassen müssen die Notfallleistungen bezahlen. Dies gilt auch bei Systemaussteigern.
(Sie sind jetzt auf Seite 1 von 2) nächste Seite
In diesem Artikel:
Sie lesen jetzt Verliere ich den Arzt meines Vertrauens?

description.hltext_display: YouTube Sensation Antoine Dodson Premieres 'Instant Classic' Christmas Video on 'Lopez Tonight'
description.content:
The overnight internet celebrity behind the hilarious "Bed Intruder" music video has made a song for the most famous "intruder" in the world.
On Tuesday, Antoine Dodson appeared on "Lopez Tonight," unveiling his new "Chimney Intruder" music video dedicated to Santa Claus.
"He's climbing in your chimneys, snatching your cookies up," Antoine warns over a Christmas melody. "So ya'll need to hide your gifts, hide your trees… And hide your egg nog 'cause he's taking everything up in here."
The "Bed Intruder" viral video that catapulted Antoine to stardom comprised clips of his actual news interview conducted after saving his sister from a would-be rapist. The clips were edited into a song with Antoine's voice altered by the use of auto-tune.
Since the release of "Bed Intruder," which now has over 54 million views, Antoine has made appearances on "Today" and the 2010 BET Hip Hop Awards.

description.hltext_display: BRIEF: Girl bites herself after watching show
Plump? Here's why.
Aachen träumt von der nächsten Tivoli-Party
Toys for needy kids ready to roll
description.content:
Toy drive heads into home stretch holiday weekend with pile of loot
It’s not every day that a 10-year-old girl gets to spend an afternoon in a room packed with Barbies and baby dolls.
But for Kayla Limbeck, rummaging through a stack of pink boxes Monday wasn’t about finding a plaything with which to while away the hours. It was charity.
Kayla was at the Forest Grove fire station helping her older sister, Lana Limbeck, 18, apportion care packages for the hundreds of families that will be aided the yearly toy drive centered in western Washington County.
“It’s a great way to get out into the community,” said Lana Limbeck, who graduated from Forest Grove High School last June and now is a volunteer with Forest Grove Fire & Rescue. “I’m really proud to have this opportunity.”
And while the stack of toys gathered this year by firefighters in Forest Grove and Cornelius is high, the collecting isn’t over.
Dave Nemeyer, Forest Grove’s fire marshal, said firefighters would collect toys until Christmas Eve and afterward. Once the Christmas holiday has passed, firefighters box up extra toys to be held onto for next year, or if disaster strikes and a three-year-old displaced by a fire needs a teddy bear.
And just as the collections – and the giving – don’t have a real deadline, Forest Grove and Cornelius firefighters won’t turn away the needy during the season of giving, no matter how late the they might ask for help.
Nemeyer said that some families have asked for help as late as Christmas Eve or Christmas Day.
Limbeck and her younger sister were busy Tuesday getting care packages ready. Age-appropriate toys are chosen for kids on the firefighters’ list and delivered by volunteers.
Kayla said she was excited to be asked by her sister to help this year, her sister was happy for the extra hand. “I figured she’d be great because she can give me an idea of what kids her age like,” said Lana Limbeck.
To donate, drop a new unwrapped toy off at the Forest Grove fire station, 1919 Ash St., in Forest Grove.

description.hltext_display: ELANDERS: ANSÖKER OM OMPRÖVNING AV MOMS
description.content:
STOCKHOLM (Direkt) Elanders ansöker om omprövning av
moms för år 2004 för att få återbetalning av 73,9 miljoner
kronor före skatt.
Skälet är att en del av Elanders momspliktiga

Elanders har för avsikt att under nästkommande år

Det framgår av ett pressmeddelande.
